headline: ICS learn has been very supportive…
reviewBody: ICS learn has been very supportive including the tutors they are always there if you are stuck with anything. E.g. maths, English and Science. I always needed help with the science, as Science is my weakest study area and the tutor was always there for support and given great feedback on areas I need to improve on including Biology, Physics and chemestry. I managed to book my exam for November to do my Maths GCSE exam and ICS is the best online learing college. I could use them when I have free time from university work instead of going to college which I be tired from univeristy and online I find it convinent for me. Thank you for all the support ICS Learn you guys rock :)

headline: Great experience
reviewBody: Great experience, helpful advisor.

headline: Student services
reviewBody:
Student services have always been very friendly, helpful and professional at the same time. Always answered my queries in a timely manner.

They're all very polite and nice to talk to, both in writing and on the phone.

It was a pleasure to study with ICS Learn and be supported by such a great student services team.

headline: Great Online Lessons
reviewBody:
Hi,  I’m studying the Maths GCSE and just wanted to say how great the online lessons are. I watch them on YouTube so I can stop and practice as I go along.
Melissa Lieberman is brilliant, very engaging and explains the content clearly. I always struggled with maths at school but have chosen to study it now, in middle age, for fun! 
The lessons with Melissa are well structured and interesting with lots of opportunities for practice afterwards as she always adds lots of links. The live sessions have a chat box for students to comment and get advice from her as they go along. I can’t access this at the moment as I watch from my phone but it’s a friendly community and everyone gets all the help they need.
I would thoroughly recommend ICS for online learning and many thanks to Melissa for helping me on my rediscovered maths journey!
Best wishes
Jane

headline: Excellent student support team
reviewBody: Beautiful student support team. Especially Ciaran who got me on board and explained things properly. Also very quick in answering queries. Highly recommended.

headline: Ciaran was a great help in giving me…
reviewBody: Ciaran was a great help in giving me all the information I needed and made me feel very comfortable and reassured that this course was the right one for me and ICS was the platform to do it on.

headline: Not a great experience
reviewBody:
I found two of the tutors to be extremely unhelpful and not supportive, to the point where I had to ask to change. I was really struggling with one module and the particular tutor asked to put a call in with me. When he rang, he had no idea what module I was referring to and just told me to follow the webinar slides. 
Alot of the online learning crashed, I didn't find the place in user friendly and had to chase when I'd completed my studies as I heard nothing, not even that I'd passed the final assignment.

headline: Started my biology course just over two…
reviewBody: Started my biology course just over two weeks ago, was very nervous and unsure about everything but spoke to Colin Urquhart who got me started onto the course. Colin was very knowledgable and approachable over the phone. Really appreciate the support he gave me. Thank you very much

headline: A fantastic and supportive service.
reviewBody:
The support you will receive from Student Services is instant, personal, truly of a diamond standard.
They've been available even during the COVID Pandemic.

I decided to embark on my CIPS and, I thought at the time, would go it alone, but I was mistaken. When you study with ICS you don't do it alone. ICS offer all the support you want and need. I promise you, you won't be disappointed or dissatisfied. Distance learning with a difference.

I couldn't recommend them highly enough. The material available from the resource centre alone is worth every penny, the excellent service you'll receive from your Tutor and Student Services, well that's just a bonus!!

headline: Positive experience
reviewBody:
The experience of studying with ICS learn has been very positive. Contact with all tutors was very professional, fast and helpful. Assignments were marked in good time.

The one negative thing is that within a few hours of completing the course, access to all content was removed, making it impossible to download all feedback files etc. as they had disappeared. There was no warning that this would happen. I would recommend any future students reading this make sure they download anything they want to keep before letting ICS learn know that they have finished their assignments.

headline: Great advisor!
reviewBody: Ciaran was great and patient in responding to any queries I had and advising me with the way everything works from sending breakdowns of the courses through so I could get a real idea of what the course entails to working out a payment plan to get me set up. Thanks for all your help Ciaran!

headline: I can only recommend them!
reviewBody: Ciaran was really helpful with all the queries I had. Getting information and enrolling on the course was easy and hassle free. His communication was prompt and professional all the time, making it an overall pleasant experience!

headline: Enrolled
reviewBody:
Enrolled, but had technical difficulties, due to new software being used.
Colin collected relevant details and then phoned back which was much appreciated.

headline: Small problem with paperwork which was…
reviewBody: Small problem with paperwork which was easily sorted with one phone call.Course just started and going well.

headline: Rude and unhelpful tutors, total waste of money.
reviewBody: Customer service advisor was lovely and really helpful, once I enrolled it's been a total nightmare and waste of money. Course materials are appalling and full of typos and spelling mistakes and my tutor has been unbelievably rude and completely unhelpful. No useful feedback on assignments and no attempt to help you in any way. Considering the amount I am paying I am absolutely fuming with this level of service, if I'm paying for a course that provides a tutor I expect them to at least help in some way other than just being rude and grading which by the way falls way behind the five working day timeline. On top of this the site is a total mess and not user friendly at all. I've spent a lot of money on this crap but am seriously considering cancelling, paying the fee and going somewhere else. Lesson learned: the cheapest is not the best.

headline: I enjoyed my learning experience with…
reviewBody: I enjoyed my learning experience with ICS learn. It was easy and very well structured. Feedbacks from all tutors were fair and sometimes even same day but never delayed. Thank you for your support and encouragement!

headline: I had some problems when I first…
reviewBody:
I had some problems when I first enrolled online by not receiving the emails for my student ID and login , but after a few calls to a member of ICS it was quickly rectified and I was on my way to learning the GCSE I was after. Everyone I worked with was professional and took matters seriously and it's good to see.

When it comes to actually studying on the course it's been really easy to understand and when I do have a problem I can start a new topic and my tutor replies quickly and gives me the right direction for what I don't understand.

headline: Registration process, super helpful advisor
reviewBody:
Registration process was super easy with help of CIPD advisor. Before registering I got sufficient information and was able to have a look on the online learning platform. Advisor is really helpful, I got answers really quickly. Paying deposit and setting up direct debit went also smoothly. 
First time around time needed to wrap my head around the structure of the course and platform. Definitely need time to get used to studying online and find resources. Before starting first unit it is essential to read student handbook and watch introduction videos.

headline: Great way to Distance learn
reviewBody:
I'm finding myself understand math at GCSE level a lot more now than when I did back in school. Everything is broken down to a level where I find it a lot more easier to process and take in. Even when you miss an online lesson the recorded version with Melissa allows you to pause and take each session at your own pace (this is what I do). You get given more than enough resources to go away and complete and tips to free websites and even demonstrations on how to use those sites, so even if you aren't computer savvy you still get support in that area. you can message your course tutor or post your query on a forum and get answers that way. You can start right away from when you sign up, without waiting around for standard start dates like in colleges. 
Honestly, I was dubious at first and always saw myself as someone who needed to be taught in a classroom environment. I just set time aside through the week and just get on with the work then, you have access to the course for 2 years with friendly tutors just a click or phone call away.
Really recommend.

headline: I found the process really easy and…
reviewBody: I found the process really easy and Michelle Kerr was really helpful to me from the start till i had everything up and running. I have now started my online course and its going really well. I would recommend ICS Learn.

headline: Fraser Cameron has been very helpful…
reviewBody: Fraser Cameron has been very helpful with regards to enrolling on to the course. It was a very straightforward, simple procedure. My tutor Stephen Mathers has also been in contact and I’m aware of the full support I will receive from the team. I look forward to sitting my exams and hopefully finally achieving a GCSE in Maths!

headline: Easy Enrolment, Helpful Advisors!
reviewBody: My advisor was Paul Martin, he answered all questions (which I had quite a few of!), got back to me really quickly and nothing seemed too much trouble. Enrolment was really quick and easy and I've already used my referral link for 2 of my colleagues looking to boost their qualifications to the next level! Shortly after I completed my enrolment, my course tutor introduced themselves and gave me a really through overview of how things would work. Everyone seemed so much more interested in my learning journey than other companies I enquired with.

headline: Great Service!
reviewBody: From the moment I made contact ICS have been fantastic. There wasn’t any pushing to buy when I first enquired, and when I decided to join the process was so easy!

headline: Fantastic experience..
reviewBody: Fantastic experience... the team are always so helpful in my learning

headline: Webinar math lessons with melissa Lieberman
reviewBody: I have just completed the foundation unit on Math with ICS learn and the lessons on the WebEx videos were just so helpful. I was watching the recorded versions as I have only been doing them for just over a month. When I was at school I struggled so much with math and didn't enjoy it. 10 years later I'm understanding so much more and for the first time enjoying math. I find Melissa Lieberman who does most of the videos so helpful and she is great at explaining each subject. Thank you.

headline: After purchasing this course
reviewBody:
After purchasing this course. I have had nothing but trouble. 
I lost my dad to suicide shortly after purchasing , and as it was A FEW DAYS after the cancellation period, i was told i would have to pay 250 quid to have it cancelled. I hadnt touched the course and had already paid £75 to open the account. DAYLIGHT ROBBERY.

So i asked for a payment break of three months. I was not in the emotional state to deal with this. 
Then i have been made redundant recently. I have no money to pay my rent or utility bills... What they did instead is lower it to £50. If i have NO money, and may be facing homelessness. How will i make £50 appear for a course i didnt use?! 

Yet the company are still asking for me to pay the fee at the end of the month or my standing order will go ahead. 

Mid mental health breakdown l call the office to explain that i will have to borrow money, crying and inconsolable explaining that i am completely stuffed at the moment. Where i was told with no consideration or care. That if i paid the final amount before the payment date that i wouldnt be charged as normal. 

Do not use this company. They have no morals and just want your money and i have gone to the financial ombudsman service about this.

headline: Ics bookeeling course
reviewBody: The enrolment to the course was quick and easy, you get access to your personal online tutor as well as online classroom lessons  the course has sections that you work through  as I have only just started the course, for me it is better than going to a college to do this course as you can do this  at any time of day/njght when it convenient to you.

headline: excellent
reviewBody:
I am a mature student who explored several different online learning platforms and I am glad I chose ICS. I think this is a very genuine platform, with motivated and proactive tutors and it's all built around providing the best learning experience for the student. I have signed up for the GCSE maths course but also had a week's taster of A level maths and it's been very good so far. I will update this review by the end of my course to reflect on the study experience.
Also special thanks to the excellent customer service I received from Frazer Cameron making the enrolment process a breeze. And thanks to ICS for giving the option to pay for this course in interest free instalments. Go for it.

headline: Made redundant whilst on maternity leave
reviewBody: I was made redundant in April whilst on maternity leave with my now 5 month old daughter. It was a huge shock to have to not only think about a newborn, but also a new career after 9 years. I decided to look into studying and gaining more knowledge for when I went back to work, and having had some experience of HR in my previous job as a manager, I thought it would be suitable for me. I contacted ICS via the course page and my advisor Paul Martin was very helpful and friendly with talking me through the course, how to get set up and payment options. It is incredibly flexible and I know I can work around my daughter and her schedule. I don't feel pressured into doing a specific amount of hours each week, although I do manage to study most days. I have been very happy with the course so far and the knowledge it has given me to apply in whatever role I go for next!

headline: Good course content, crap learner experience
reviewBody:
The content of the course has been good, but the learner experience has been really poor. It doesn't help that I am doing a Learning and Development Award at a time when we are seeing an explosion in innovative on-line learning platforms while ICS seems stuck somewhere in the early noughties. 

Particularly surprising and annoying has been the total lack of a bibliography for any of the learning materials, despite my repeat requests for them. I'm sure this is breaking intellectual property rules. When I queried it with my tutor I was told to simply go and 'google it'! Because of course most academics only produce one paper per year?!?! Really, really poor - if I was an academic and knew my work wasn't being referenced properly so an on-line learning provider could get rich quick I would be really unimpressed. I have raised this with both by tutor and ICS direct and still have yet to receive a satisfactory response. 

Some of the generic learning guidance along with course text was littered with typos, some of it so bad that it didn't really make any sense. When I raised this with ICS, I was just told 'thanks for letting us know'. Clearly zero quality checking of material going on. 

A completely transactional relationship with the tutor. Short, one-line replies. An introductory phone call would take 10 minutes. 

I recognise that on-line learning is a different mode and should be entirely  self-directed, but ICS need to keep up with the learning landscape and see what the likes of Coursera and others are up to if they want to hold on to their learners.

headline: Excellent Exam Support
reviewBody:
I’ve just finished studying with ICS Learn and although it was challenging adapting to distance learning at first given the lack of face to face interaction, I found the experience overall quite good, with most of the tutors being really helpful. 

I would like to specifically highlight the great support I got during the two exams for the course. On the day of the exams I was extremely nervous and unwell but the exam assistant, Nicola (exam centre in Edinburgh) went above and beyond to make sure I was okay and really settled my nerves. I don’t think I would have gotten through the exams without that support so I’m extremely grateful for that! The whole process of registering for exams was straight forward and well explained too. 

I do feel that having to contact your tutor through email for support can slow down the process significantly which is not ideal if you have timescales you’re looking to keep to but I understand that a function such as live chat may not be possible given the tutors’ other commitments. I also feel that sometimes the feedback given or your questions are a bit lost in translation so some facility to have a chat over the phone would have been beneficial for me. 

There was also an occasion where the course materials were not updated and one of the assessments asked you to read a source that was no longer available so this caused some confusion. 

Overall the dashboard and platform was really easy to use and I liked the flexibility you have in terms of which modules you do and when. The Student Services function is also great and a really easy way to get quick answers on non course specific questions.

headline: It was a great experience learning with…
reviewBody: It was a great experience learning with ICS Learn. I acquired my CIPD Level 5 Diploma with them. The tutors are amazing and holds periodic webinars on assignments to ensure students students submit their assignments correctly and once.

Tutor support is outstanding, Nicola, Keith, Stephen, Kathy and Carol are all amazing people. Assignment marking is speedy and feedback is boosting. I have just successfully finished my CIPD Diploma Level 5 and it was made easier with ICS Learn. They also have great webinars live and recorded which are seriously helpful. headline: L5 L&D Diploma
reviewBody:
I have recently completed my L5 Diploma in L&D through ICSLearn. The course is structured so that you can manage your own time and choose when to submit your assignments. When I initially enrolled I thought that this would be the best structure for me however I found that ended up delaying my studies and only completing my assignments within the last 6 months of my course. This was obviously my own fault but I feel that a more structured system with unit deadlines would have been more appropriate for me. 
The system itself is currently being updated and is becoming much more userfriendly which is great. The quality of the content varies between each unit but I have found most of it useful when studying for my assignments.
I haven't used the tutor support feature much but when I did I received a quick response. The majority of tutors provided quick feedback on my unit assignments with one tutor in particular providing feedback the next day!

headline: Good Customer Service
reviewBody:
After nightmare experience with another school of accountanting software I been recommended by other student to check this school. And based in their review I decided to go a head. 
I just signed up for second and third level of accounting course. The registration process was so quickly and clear.  All the enquired that I had were explained included steps, policies of return, pricing and payment methods. 

Thanks Nicole for all the information and customers services.

headline: After not enjoying my university…
reviewBody:
After not enjoying my university psychology course I took the decision to enrol with ICS learn instead and the only regret is I wish I had done this in the first place!

The enrollment process was quick and easy. The student support staff (especially Eva) were very helpful and professional with a great attitude and quick in responding to emails and queries. The same with the tutors, Paula has been very helpful so far and is also very responsive to emails. 

The CIPD level 3 course content is very interesting and enjoyable, as well as easy to follow. I'm very much looking forward to working through the rest of the course. ICS learn is very motivating and enjoyable to be a part of :)

reviewBody:

I do feel however that there was no encouragement from tutors at all during the course which I feel may have helped in 'getting' through a lot more before my time was up! 
It has left me feeling like a complete failure because I was unable to complete in time.  Such a shame.  And an expensive shame.

headline: Great experience with ICS Learn so far
reviewBody: I signed up for an ICS Learn Maths A-Level course about three weeks ago.  My experience so far has been excellent.  It was easy to get set up, the website is intuitive and technical support was excellent.  They have a help chat functionality, where a tech support person will help you out immediately.  The course material is well organised.  You get an assigned tutor and mine (Ailie) has been responsive and very helpful when I contacted her.  The best feature is the webinars, where a subject is handled in a roughly one-hour video.  Most of them are previously recorded, but there are also live videos that you can join which are excellent.  Melissa Lieberman has run all the ones I have watched so far, and she does a fantastic job at explaining the material.  Very impressed with the program so far!

headline: ICS Learn Enrollment
reviewBody: Advisor answered all my questions and I received all the required information via email that made the decision to enrol on my course really easy.

headline: The operative
reviewBody:
The operative would of received an exta star if he wasn't so over familiar.  He seems to forget that I am a customer not one of his buddies down at the pub.
He is sadly not alone here, even the tutor calls me by my first name without having the courtesy to ask first.

headline: I enjoyed my experience overall but my…
reviewBody:
I enjoyed my experience overall but my major frustration comes from the fact that the tutors do not seem to follow same guidelines. 
For example the tutor who graded my assignment disagreed with the approach I of the tutor who run a webinar and whose guidelines I followed.  It was very frustrating as you can probably imagine.

Also talking to other students studied with ICS Learn it became apparent that something one tutor would fail the student for, will get a pass with another tutor. 

Additionally a proper webinar on DVP2 would probably be a good idea. Here again I followed the guidelines of the tutor who run DVP1 webinar and gave an advise how to complete DVP2, which apparently was not in line with the expectations of the tutor who graded my DVP2 assignment.

reviewBody: I recently enrolled on the HR Level 3 course. My enrolment was carried out by Paul M, who I have to say was amazing throughout the process. The process was efficient and in depth. Really recommend anyone looking at gaining further education in HR to go through ICS Learn. I am looking forward to qualifying within my 10 month deadline I have given myself.

headline: Fast reply for any questions....

reviewBody: My course adviser was Anne Marie, she was very friendly and polite. She provided me with plenty information and answered all questions i had. Starting my course was so easy and it took only 5 minute.  Thank you so much

headline: MORE WEBINARS FOR MORE SUBJECTS PLEASE!
reviewBody: I'm currently taking GCSE Maths, and I absolutely LOVE the webinar format. I wish more of their classes had them, to be honest. It's one thing reviewing written words, but having that human element, especially to have someone explain and interpret the lesson as we go along, makes the class that much better. I finally understand Maths now because Melissa Lieberman takes the time to go through the problems and talk about them in real-time.

headline: Great service
reviewBody: Anne Marie was very friendly and so helpful in getting me enrolled. She followed up on my online inquiry, answered all of my questions clearly and gave me additional phone numbers in case I needed any extra help.She gave me adequate time to make a decision with no unnecessary pressure. She made me feel very confident in my decision to finally get started on my accountancy course and I'm really glad I got to speak to someone that put me so well at ease. She is a credit to your team and I'm really looking forward to getting started.

headline: The advisor was very helpful in getting…
reviewBody: The advisor was very helpful in getting me enrolled and the whole process was very easy

headline: Amazing
reviewBody:
Amazing
I was so worried it would be a stressful and time consuming process, however that was not the case. Katy was so helpful and so quick to respond and even after I had finished my enrolment she even emailed to check up on me to see if she could help me further in anyway.

Thank you Katy.

headline: Accountancy diploma
reviewBody: Spoke to Nicola whose signed me up after weeks of me probably driving her mad with all my questions. She has helped me feel confident in signing up and knowing there's help if I struggle.

headline: Very pleased with communication and…

headline: ICS Enrollment
reviewBody: I thought Colin was very clear and concise with the information I requested and in his description of how the process works as a whole. I couldn't have asked for more. Excellent.

headline: Quick service
reviewBody: Quick service. Friendly and efficient. Easy process. No problems at all

headline: Registration with ICS was great
reviewBody: Registration with ICS was great! They are so flexible and accommodating to your needs. Their payment plans are definitely the best out of all the CIPD providers for someone who has been living in the UK for less than 3 years since they do not require a credit check unlike all the other providers I came across. Their price match guarantee is also amazing. My course advisor Paul Martin was very helpful and a pleasure to work with.

headline: Great and invaluable support and resources
reviewBody:
Great and flexible customer service, they are completely aware of your situation and are very helpful and supportive and wonderful at communication.

As for the course, the hub page is really well designed and has a tutorial that guides you and it seems like support is constantly available as well as a significant amount of resources, free ebooks, a large amount of lessons and most importantly, your own tutor.

Highly recommend.

headline: Really impressed with how easy it was…
reviewBody:
Really impressed with how easy it was to enrol with ICS.  I contacted a few providers at the same time but ICS came back first with all the details I required and a very competitive price.  I really liked that I could study the modules at my own pace. 
With the help of the Advisor Paul I was able to sign up that day and start my course the next morning.

headline: Thank you
reviewBody: Thank you very happy with the service

headline: GCSE Mathematics Course
reviewBody: Maggie was fantastic at explaining the process of the course and how the online account works etc. I was contacted by my tutor less than 24hrs after I signed up. I can’t wait to get started, the online account has so many resources for me to use including online classrooms. I am feeling very confident for once in my life about maths and it’s all down to the ease of use and support that ICS Learn offers.

headline: Did not provide any hard copies
reviewBody:
Did not provide any hard copies, only E-Books. So, when I wanted to unfortunately cancel my course, I had ended up paying £480 in total for 1 E-Book - they wont even let you save the E-Book as a PDF so you can print and keep a copy, so I have paid all that money for basically nothing.

They then had the audacity to demand a further £50 cancellation fee.

headline: Just started the maths course.Have been…
reviewBody: Just started the maths course.Have been well informed of were to seek advice if needed. Everything going well up to now.

headline: It was very smooth and easy enrollment.

headline: review on the enrolment experience
reviewBody: Paul Martin was my course advisor and he was very helpful throughout, he answered all my questions and explained everything clearly. Thankfully made the enrollment experience much easier for me and so far it has been going on so great.

headline: From the very beginning my needs have been met…
reviewBody: From the very beginning my needs have been met by Fraser Cameron, who has been very helpful and very committed to me figuring out a plan that is well suited to me. So far I've really been impressed and I look forward to continuing my studies with ICS Learn.

headline: Thank-you for getting me set up
reviewBody:
Thank-you for getting me set up! 
Paul Martin was my course advisor

headline: Simple process and lots of information to make an informed decision
reviewBody:
The process is rather straight forward, materials were very useful and I had a great advisor, Paul Martin, who provided me with ample information to read up on before making a decision. 

Paul also ranged me up to address questions that couldn't be answered by the information, contributing to me making an informed decision. Also, the payment process was very simple; the instalment program is indeed very helpful. As soon as I signed up; I received a good number of emails and my tutor, Wendy Chippendale also contacted me within 24 hours of joining. 

I feel that I am about to receive as much as help as advertised to aid me throughout the course.

headline: My enrollment went very smooth
reviewBody:
My enrollment went very smooth. Appreciate my advisor Paul Martin was very helpful. Excellent advisor hope always to keep dealing with him. Before I enroll I was very nervous but he did the needful for me to understand and join the course.

Paul Thank you very much and keep it up 

Regards,

Zainab Al Harthi

headline: Thanks ICS Learn!
reviewBody:
I took the decision to enroll in this course in a very short time and was really happy that ICS Learn was so responsive.
My Advisor, Paul Martin, was super patient, walked me through the procedure and made it all very easy for me to enroll. He even gave me some career advice! Thumbs up for that! I am 100% sure that I am where I need to be right now.
Accessing the platform is very easy and the content is organised in a very structured way - everything is done and set to encourage learning and success.
Now it's only up to me to get it done. 
Thanks ICS Learn!

headline: Helpful tutors
reviewBody: Helpful tutors. Some of them come back to you really quickly with feedback and answers to your questions. Good learning experience.

headline: Glad I am pursuing CIPD 7 through ICS Learn
reviewBody: I found ICS learn on google and immediately sent an email to find out more . Mr Paul Martin immediately responded and one thing that attracted my attention was his patience and willingness to always help and answer any questions I have and without pushing me to take a quick decision. I felt safe and immediate trust towards him as my course advisor and though him trust towards ICS learn. Everything is running smoothly as as promised emails and CIPD support and of course my online tutor touching base with me. I live how simple it was to sign the agreement and I am looking forward to starting the journey . Thank you for a great experience so far .

headline: Studying online with ICS learn
reviewBody:
I have just started my course with ICS learn, hence I am still exploring the materials and tools, nevertheless I find it easy to understand and learn the subjects with ICS, I would say that the online layout, tools, materials available is equivalent to when studying at a University.

Special mention for my course advisor, Mr.Paul Martin, who was persistent, yet patient with me as I had requested information more than a year ago and he still emailed me. I appreciate him taking the time to listen to my queries and advise accordingly with regards to the right course for me.

headline: course advisor Mr. paul Martin
reviewBody: The course advisor was very helpfull and he was there r for me evry time I need him, also I appreciate that the response was fast and quick.

headline: ICS Learn for CIPD course
reviewBody: I am currently studying with ICS learn for an advanced level CIPD diploma.  Paul Martin was my course advisor and he was extremely helpful and friendly to deal with, as well as answering my questions very promptly without being in any way ‘pushy’ for me to choose ICS Learn through which to study. The overall experience so far as been easy and well communicated and I would highly recommend.

headline: Thank you
reviewBody:
Paul was so lovely to talk to and so helpful with the whole process. The enrolment was really easy and he managed to get me on the best path to further career in HR.
Thank you to all the team at ICS Learn. I really appreciate it.

A very professional and friendly service offered by the good folks at ICS Learn. 

Definitely the best distance learning provider for A level courses out there. Would highly recommend to anyone interested in gaining the qualifications offered by them. 

Fraser made the entire signing up process easy from the start. In a nutshell, brilliant provider!

headline: Enrolment process was straightforward
reviewBody: Enrolment process was straightforward. Plenty of support from the ICS Learn team. Corse advisors will be in constant contact with you to make sure your happy and understand all the information. Overall a really simple process that gives you confidence that you've chosen the right distance learning programme.

headline: Annie was great
reviewBody: Annie was great, kind.

headline: I was very nervous about signing up and…
reviewBody: I was very nervous about signing up and committing to this as I work full time and am studying for a degree through work. However  the guys at ICS Learn have been in touch and walked me through how it works and I feel much more at ease that I can do this! I would recommend watching the induction class as this really helps with guides and tips to getting started and the student guide/handbook answered all of my questions. Having a planner of what you need to cover that you can print off is really helpful so you can work back from your exam date and see clearly how much time you need to commit each week. My ICS tutor is really friendly and is available whenever I need him so I feel supported. All in all a very comforting experience! Just need to crack on now and start putting in the work!

headline: Friendly and helpful advisors
reviewBody: Friendly and helpful advisors, was incredibly quick and easy to enrol and I had access to the learning material almost straight away. The website is easy to use and there are guides for how many hours to spend on each topic, making it easier to plan my study time and keep on track. Great option for someone wanting to study around other commitments.

headline: Just started a book keeping course
reviewBody: Just started a book keeping course. Can highly recommend Anne Marie. Supported and guided me through the decision. Would highly recommend. So far the first part has been straight forward

headline: Great support
reviewBody: Very supportive easy and clear to follow and all correspondence were very quick. Anne Marie was great in advising the best options and answering my many questions. Would definitely recommend.

Now that I have full acces to the online course I can say that my goal is fully achievable and I do have all the support needed to complete my GCSE. All the process was facilitated in an easy and professional way by Fraser- my contact who has been really polite and helpful. Thank you ICS Learn for your great job and for supporting education in such an efficient and explicit manner.

headline: Waste of time and money

No contact unless you had a problem and needed a tutor.

No chasing up on work.

Therefore my daughters 2 years of hard work down the pan for Sociology A Level!!

headline: AAT Level 2 & 3 Bookkeeping
reviewBody:
Having considered returning to study for the past year, I finally took the plunge and enrolled on the AAT Level 2 & 3 Bookkeeping course.

The course advisor (Anne-Marie) has been absolutely great, keeping in touch every once in a while during my period of contemplation and then helping me to get started.  In no time at all after enrolling, my student number was sent, an introduction email from my tutor, along with a link to log onto the learning platform...all the resources, advice and support I need are there to help me reach the end goal. 

If like me you couldn't manage going to learning environment at a set time, on a weekly basis, home learning and ICS Learn is definitely for you.

I can't wait to get cracking
x

headline: Great staff and great course!
reviewBody: Colin was great. I sent an email enquiring and got a response pretty much immediately. He gave me a call and got me enrolled within minutes and was very helpful in answering my questions. The system is very easy to use and the course is easy to follow.

headline: I had been trying to call through but…
reviewBody:
I had been trying to call through but given the circumstances there were long wait times to speak to the right person I needed, Instead I used the Live chat feature and managed to connect to Colin, He immediately asked for a contact number and called me back. He was very informative and set things up swifty and answered all my questions. 

Fantastic and would have given more stars if I could have

headline: The enrolment process for ICS Learn

headline: AMAZING SERVICE ALWAYS!!
reviewBody: I have always had the best experience with ICS during my studies - they are always on hand for full support and to answer any queries! I recently lost my job due to Covid19 and was concerned about not being able to afford an extension for my course as my support period had ended but assessment had been stopped by AAT due to this pandemic however Dominic extended my support period for 3 months as a goodwill gesture which has helped me massively and can’t thank him enough!!!

headline: Anne Marie was incredibly helpful…
reviewBody:
Anne Marie was incredibly helpful throughout the enrolment process, answering all my questions thoroughly and honestly. She was available via text/phone call/ email and always got back to me quickly. I signed on to do a Certificate in Professional Marketing, and if I have any queries she either directs me to the correct department or answers what she is able to. 

The course is fantastic so far and I am very impressed with the level of support across the board.

headline: I decided to do a second course with…
reviewBody:
I decided to do a second course with ICS Learn, because of their excellent course prices, which is then, compounded by the flexible number of ways in which I can learn or access my learning (whether it by via tablet, laptop etc). 

Additionally, upon signing up for a another course, with affordable, monthly, payments, I was quite astonished to learn or ascertain that I would be subject to a 10% discount! 

In essence, it's no wonder as to why or how they have become Britain's leading online learning provider; since, there are a multitude of factors which are unique to ICS Learn - which also includes their excellent customer Service; their Customer Advisors are always informative and polite, but never rude, pushy and just target driven.

headline: As an adult learner
reviewBody: As an adult learner, I'd been looking for the right course to improve my Maths skills for a few months now and was looking for something that easily accessible online but with some support as well if needed. ICS Learn came up as highly rated and having spoken to the team, I knew then that this was accurate and perfect in terms of a high quality course on an online platform. Getting signed up was really easy, took only the deposit being paid, and the admin team were enormously helpful, warm and welcoming, answering questions and offering guidance on getting the payments set up as well. As soon as I signed up I got a flurry of emails with a welcome, personal introduction from the tutor and all the details I needed to get signed in to the website. The way the content is set up, you can easily follow the lessons and there are plenty of practice questions if you need them. I'm making a weekly study schedule for the rest of the Summer and can't wait to sit the exam so I can say that my Maths skills are now officially approved. I'd highly recommend ICS Learn!

reviewBody: Two of my tutors were very helpful, the other two less so. Some of the course material was out of date too and I found so little interaction difficult which I understand is personal preference.

headline: Worst online qualification provision ever experienced! Do not recommend!
reviewBody:
I am studying for my Chartered Institute of Marketing, Level 3 qualification and I have never experienced such bad quality from an online institution. 

The powerpoints which contain the information are of extremely bad quality making it difficult to read, there are numerous spelling mistakes, numerous errors regarding the page numbers in textbooks you are supposed to read, repeated information where it has been cut and pasted incorrectly, wrong words used for titles and sections i.e. describing quantitative research but saying qualitative research and some of the answers on the self check questions are wrong and contradict what they have written earlier. With the constant errors and mistakes found, it makes me question the validity of what I am learning and whether I am learning incorrect information that will lead me to not pass my exams. 

Honestly, I am hugely disappointed, I have never come across such a shamble of an online qualification provision and would highly recommend that anyone wanting to study through ICS Learn reconsider and find someone else.

headline: A positive new learning experience
reviewBody:
I enrolled on the course to change direction in my career, the ICS Learn programme allowed me to complete the modules in my own time with lots of support from the tutors and CIPD. This was a real eye-opener for me as I completed my law degree in 1994,  learning and accessibility to materials has significantly changed which took a little time to adjust to.
I successfully completed the course in 13 months whilst working full-time and would recommend the course to anyone looking to add to their skills or looking to change their career.

However, the enrolment process and looking through the website, getting used to how it works is a doddle. Everything is easy to use and well laid out. All in all, so far so good

headline: Great learning experience
reviewBody:
My learning journey with ICS Learn was excellent. Tutors, student  and technical support teams were extremely helpful and supportive. Modules contents were well-covered, comprehensive and informative, and also demonstrated theories and practices very well. 

I feel better equipped and more confident to progress in my career after completing this course. All the assessment activities were relevant to the ‘real world’ HR scenarios. 

I would recommend ICS Learn as it provides a great e-learning experience with a high level of flexibility that would fit anybody's busy life. 

A big thank you for the ICS Learn community.

headline: Ciaran was great and super patient with…
reviewBody: Ciaran was great and super patient with me. He answered all my questions and was easy to get ahold of anytime I called. He even spoke with my boss to discuss the funding situation and did all he could on that end of things as well. Overall great guy and great experience!

headline: Excellent Customer Service & Support!
reviewBody: Ciaran was excellent! Very helpful and knowledgeable about the courses I enquired about. Very quick response time for all queries, which were answered clearly and concisely. Excellent communication, ensuring a very straight forward registration process!

headline: Very helpful!
reviewBody: ICS learn was very helpful both over email and the phone to help me decide the best course for me.

headline: Brilliant CIPD Provider
reviewBody: I've just signed up with a second course with ICS Learn, and the sign up process has been perfect each time. I signed up this time with Ciaran (I'm not sure who I signed up with the first time). The course itself is really helpful and informative, and though ICS Learn I have gained employment within HR, which I wouldn't have done without them I'm sure. Plus there was a discount as I've studied with them before!

headline: Beneficial and pleasurable experience
reviewBody: Having worked in an HR management position for more than a decade without a formal qualification in the field, I enrolled ICS Learn’s course in CIPD Level 7 Diploma in Human Resource Management. The course enabled me to obtain a firm theoretical grounding in HRM and close familiarity with a broad range of organisational practices, and to enhance my ability to critically evaluate different HR solutions and apply theory to practice, thus ultimately benefitting my organisation’s performance. I appreciated ICS Learn’s flexible approach to learning and the patience their tutors demonstrated throughout the course. The Distinctions I achieved in the two nationally run Level 7 exams speak not just of my commitment but also of the level of support I had received from ICS Learn’s tutors.

headline: Thank You
reviewBody: It was a pleasure to chat to Nicola Dexter who made signing up to ICS Learn extremely easy.  I would like to thank her for answering all my queries and constant questions.

headline: Very helpful and efficient
reviewBody: Very helpful and efficient

headline: Informative and clear
reviewBody: Informative and clear. ICS were able to answer all my questions and were extremely efficient with my application and subsequent enrolment. The flexible payment options make studying very affordable.

The help and advice I received from Ann Marie was exceptional, there was no pressure and she responded very quickly to my messages and was always very helpful and patient with me.

Very easy to get started.  They were quick to set everything up and helped with any questions I had- meant I could get started with my studies straight away!

Thanks x

headline: Supportive
reviewBody: Supportive, understanding and easy to follow instructions. A smooth and easy going process to get set up. Very happy now I'm all set up thanks to Nicola Dexter.

headline: ICS learn enrollment
reviewBody:
i couldn't be happier with how easy it's been to choose the courses & get enrolled onto them.
Fraser has been very helpful & professional with keeping in touch & keeping me updated on the progress of my application, pointing me in the right direction for who i need to contact if i need any help & making sure i'm happy with everything so far!

i would highly recommend using ICS learn as there is a huge support network by phone, email or online webinars & it's designed to fit in around your working and personal life so there are no monthly deadlines to meet or course work & you can work at your own pace

headline: I have been looking into re taking my…
reviewBody:
I have been looking into re taking my Science GCSE now for quite some time as I didn't achieve the grade needed for me to go on to study Midwifery at UNI. 

After almost 8 years since being in education I was feeling quite apprehensive about this. 

I exchanged emails with Colin and he arranged a phone call with me to discuss my options the day after.

He provided me with very clear information and we were able to enroll this morning! 

I am really looking forward to studying and hopefully achieving what is needed for the next step in my future. :-)

headline: Would highly recommend!
reviewBody: I was hesitant to initially do the course but having completed it I am glad I did it. The administration is very supportive and flexible, response times are excellent. My tutor support was also very good, every question I asked was answered quickly, thoroughly and accurately. The qualifications and experience of the tutors is re-assuring and gives you a 'real-world' practical feel. Having everything online allowed me to do the course at my own pace from wherever I wanted to - would highly recommend.

headline: I was assisted with enrolling on the Level 3 CIPD L&D Diploma
reviewBody:
I was assisted with enrolling on the Foundation L&D diploma with ICS Learn by Ciaran McEachen. Ciaran was quick to respond to my queries and was very helpful when explaining the enrolment process, course content, and payments. When delivering advice on which level of the course to take, Ciaran suggested going with the lv.5 instead of the lv.3 course, due to the fact that I already had a lv.3 qualification in HR practice, however since I do not have experience in L&D, I decided it would be more beneficial to get a foundation of learning in this first before developing further. As such, this is the only recommendation I would make for improvement. 

When taking the payment over the phone, Ciaran explained everything again and confirmed that I am happy to proceed. There was a system error the first time I entered my details and Ciaran was able to calmly rearrange for the payment to be attempted again, which was successful. 

I am very happy with the service received from Ciaran and would be happy to speak with him again.

headline: Have nothing but praise from beginning…
reviewBody: Have nothing but praise from beginning to end x

headline: CIPS Level 4
reviewBody:
I contacted ICS, within a short while I had a response back from Anne Marie. After a short discussion, Anne Marie provided me with all the information that I required and I then enrolled on the course. Since enrolling the information has been provide in a nice steady stream.

This was a quick and straight forward process and the support has been fantastic.

Thank you everyone.

headline: Accountant Level 2&3 combined course
reviewBody: I enquired about taking the Level 2&3 combined accountant course and was sent a prompt text to let me know someone would be in touh shortly. I then spoke to Nicola who was really lovely, very helpful and gave me all the information I requested and more.  Shewas very concise but very thorough with giving me course details and payment plan options. She enrolled me over the phone and explained what would happen next.  I immediately received my log in details, and was very warmly greeted by Joanne my tutor for the duration of this course.  They are both very friendly, very support and I am really enjoying studying with ICS.  I love the online classes the study material is nice and clear and everyone is really supportive and helpful.

headline: CIPD Level 3 in HR Practice
reviewBody:
I have received an excellent level of service from Paul Martin from start to finish. Paul made sure he gave me the adequate information throughout the process of signing up. He talked through the whole process as I was a bit weary due to cost and he offered the best discount compared to other companies I looked at.

I’ve completed my first unit of the course in just under 3 weeks and thoroughly enjoying it. The site navigation is perfect with so many links to study guides & references etc. Thanks again for all of the genuine effort put in would highly recommend ICS Learn!!

headline: Review
reviewBody: I have been pleased with the service I have received. I had a positive enrolment experience. Nicola Dexter helped me with all the questions during the registration. She is extremely knowledgeable and gave me all the information I needed.

headline: Straightforward and supported learning.

Very simple and clear communication. Was able to answer all of my long list of questions and concerns and set my mind at ease.

Currently enrolled on my accountancy course and enjoying it.

headline: Thank you Anne Marie
reviewBody: Couldn’t ask for cheerier or more efficient service. We live in uncertain times but Anne Marie’s positive attitude made me feel at ease. I couldn’t have asked for a more helpful and informative contact.

headline: So far so good
reviewBody: So far so good. Early on in the course but so far the welcome I’ve had has been brilliant. My course advisor has been fab and I really feel she understood my needs and helped get me on the right track for getting the qualifications I’m looking for. I’ve had one lesson on Bookkeeping Transactions which I found very helpful and easy to follow. So far, excellent organisation!

headline: Unhelpful
reviewBody: I previously rated their service a 5 star... this was when I enrolled. It’s been a month now and I wasn’t getting along well with the platform so I decided to seek advice... I contact student service and they advised to contact my tutor, so I did. She was really rude and unhelpful. So I decided to cancel my course... I was charged 10% of the fee plus £50. Ridiculous... I didn’t even Make use of anything as the platform confusing and I didn’t get the support I was told I would get. I wouldn’t recommend their services at all.

It's only early days, but the experience I have had so far has been well above and beyond what I had expected.....I'm very happy!

headline: I have done an online study course…
reviewBody: I have done an online study course before and I was sceptical about doing another as my first experience was not good and I ended not finishing it as I felt I had no support. However I can not say the same about this course as it has made me feel supported from the beginning. Anne Marie was great with helping me choose the right course and also not pressuring me to join just generally giving me information and help. The course its self is brilliant as it gives you a day to review how everything works and where all of your resources are. My tutor is lovely and also very helpful on hand to answer any of my questions I cant fault this course and I will be back for more.

headline: I've found the support and advice from…
reviewBody:
I've found the support and advice from my CIPD adviser, Paul Martin to be fantastic.  From my initial enquiry at the CIPD conference in November 2019 through to my decision to enrol with ICS learn, Paul has been very supportive in advising on options relating to my career progression taking into close account, my current level of experience as well.  The best thing I've found with my experience of advice from Paul, has been the genuine and objective advice given, rather than just a pure sales pitch.  This was the ultimate deciding factor for my decision to enrol with ICS learn, as well as the previous positive reviews online about studying with ICS learn.

I would thoroughly recommend choosing the ICS learn for anyone's CPD!

headline: Highly Recommended!
reviewBody:
I was thinking about doing CIPD qualification for a while but moving to working from home and staying at home helped me with making moves. 
One of my ex-colleagues recommended me ICS Learn as she has completed her CIPD Level 5 with them and was very happy with the service and studies. Also, they qualifications are cheaper that some other organisations’. 
I sent an enquires through the ICS Learn Website on the weekend and they got back to me the next working day. I spoke to one of the Advisers - Ciaran - and he was very nice and helpful! It took me no time to enrol and start my qualification! I am very pleased with the services and my experience with ICS Learn! If you are looking for a company to do any qualifications, I would highly recommend you this company!

Once I was ready to sign up to the course it was so quick & simple with Paul once again being so helpful and flexible with calling at times to suit me - working around a busy home lifestyle! There is so much support available and the website is really useful for any additional information. I can't wait to get fully into studying and would highly recommend the whole experience!

headline: Why I chose ICS LEARN
reviewBody:
I was looking to study CIP Diploma level 5, Paul Martin was great help when signing me up he gave me all the information that I needed and very quick to respond to all my emails, a true asset to ICS LEARN. 

I was stuck between AVADO and ICS Learn, when I spoke to AVADO they seemed so pushy and tried to keep getting me to sign up without making sure i had all my questions answered. The service Paul gave me and how he explained everything (not to forget the price was also great) sold it to me to choose ICS Learn. 

I did my research I looked at how many reviews ICS had compared to others and not only is their rating good they have thousands more than other providers.

Everything is straight forward and simple to follow. only been a few days but everything seems so easy and tutor has already been in touch over the weekend I was expecting it to take longer but such quick service!

I would highly recommend.

headline: I have learned excellent things related…
reviewBody: I have learned excellent things related to HR context. This course is helping me a lot.

headline: Excellent Service
reviewBody: Particular praise for Ciaran McEachen, the ICS adviser who set me up for my course. He answered all my questions clearly and precisely, and made the set up process very easy indeed. Thank you!

headline: Great Way to Start
reviewBody: At the beginning, I was very hesitant on whether to sign-up for the CIPD certification or not and what level is most suitable to my past experience and future needs. However, Ciaran made me take the decision very easily by answering all my questions/concerns in a timely and professional manner and explained the full process that made me at ease to start the learning journey which I already did. I'm very thankful to his support and to ICS Learn for such a good platform.

headline: Great help and fast response!
reviewBody: Had abit of trouble with my exam forms not getting back in time. Sandra Cassidy reminded me of the deadline and when realising my forms hadn't arrived, Sandra helped me with getting my information and forms back on time to enter the May exams. Lots of help!!

headline: Quick and easy to get a response once I…
reviewBody: Quick and easy to get a response once I made an enquiry.

headline: ICS are great providing  a variety of…
reviewBody: ICS are great providing  a variety of courses for all to study in your own time and always happy to assist with any questions you may have, especially Sandra from the exams office.

headline: Fantastic service
reviewBody: Fantastic service. Made it easy to enrol and have the relevant information needed for the course.

headline: Do not recommend to anyone
reviewBody: Fast responses from tutors on questions and feedback for assignments. However, each module so far has been very inconsistent. Some of the information is very outdated, and while I appreciate that it cannot be continuously updated, providing information that is 7 years out of date for an exam module could lead to people failing their exam. I cannot trust any of the content ICS provide, so I feel like I am paying a lot of money for very little. The webinars you must attend vary from helpful to useless. As I progress through the course I find this is throughout the modules and I am overall very disappointed considering the cost of the course I am studying.

headline: Helpful, quick and efficient.
reviewBody: I didn't need any advice as I knew which course I wanted to enrol on but they were very helpful and the whole process was very quick and efficient.

headline: Fantastic service
reviewBody:
Never had any major issues with ICS learn and have always received great customer service - Sandra the exams officer in particular has been amazing and extremely flexible in helping out with enrolment!

The only reason for giving 4 stars is for one issue with a tutor involving late marking of assignments and rude responses, however as soon as I raised this it was sorted immediately so cannot fault the service at all - I would absolutely choose ICS learn again should I ever wish to study again in future.

headline: The Exams Officer
reviewBody:
The Exams Officer, Sandra, was very helpful. She was flexible and professional. 

Separately- I had called in to student support  a month ago to find out the location of exam centres. The answer at the time was unhelpful. They said they couldn’t tell me . I needed to make travel and accommodation arrangements and book holiday. More information would have been useful. I wish I’d contacted Exams directly as I think I might have been able to get the information I needed.

headline: At first I thought ICS Learn was great
reviewBody:
At first I thought ICS Learn was great. Prompt responses and information. 
I was a bit late starting my level 3 Diploma course for HR. When I submitted my first formative assessment, it was not graded. I'm still waiting a week later. Nobody has gotten back to me. How can I move forward to complete other assignments for grading if I cannot get the initial one marked? This is holding me back from making progress. 

Also when I emailed my tutor, there was no response. I've taken to email student services and course advisors in a bid to get a response. I feel like I'm working blindly and no clue if I'm going in the right direction. So right now I'm not at all happy and getting frustrated that I cannot proceed to unit 2 because I can't get feedback regarding unit 1!!! Pass or fail so I can resubmit if necessary!

headline: ICS Learn
reviewBody: The people at ICS Learn have been very helpful and very kind, and I look forward to studying with them.

headline: Early days review
reviewBody:
I've been asked to give a review but there isn't much to review as I haven't started or completed the course yet. 

I registered online, the website was clear and I had several emails that same day with information. I had an email from my tutor who seems friendly and helpful. Looked at the learning resources which look thorough and easy to navigate. 

That's all I can say so far, will review again once I have completed the course!

headline: Fraser Cameron did a brilliant job with…
reviewBody: Fraser Cameron did a brilliant job with my account. He answered any questions I had with speed and detail. I feel confident to start my studies knowing that Fraser Cameron will be there to help with any admin-related questions I may have.

headline: 5 Star Training Provider!
reviewBody: Support right up to the deadline and great portal with helpful guidance. Jessica Simpson was very helpful in helping me achieve my pass grade. I will definitely be returning for my Level 6 CIM Marketing course. Thank you to everyone who supported me. 5 star service and experience, I now feel more confident in my role as a Marketing Manager.

headline: Ciaran.M was amazing!

I had spoke to him a few months ago when I first shown interest and got back in contact with him last month when I was ready to join. He was quick at responding, answered all my questions in detail, and even price matched too. He was an absolute dream and made my start to the ICS Learn world very positive. Thanks again Ciaran

headline: CIPD
reviewBody: The sign up process was really easy and the website is really easy to use. However I’m not happy that I’m paying £6600 towards a CIPD to then find extra charges such as £74 each to do 2 exams! As well as this I then have to travel to a different city to do the exams one on the Tuesday and one on the Thursday which doesn’t make sense and extra costs of travel. Don’t really understand what £6600 is paying for so far!

headline: I’ve recently joined my CIPD course in…
reviewBody: I’ve recently joined my CIPD course in ICS Learn Center. The online course is really convenient to study. Hope to get more about HRM best practice through this course and advance in my career!

headline: Live and Learn with the help of ICS
reviewBody:
This course was expertly managed by the staff at ICS Learn who managed to arrange an exam for me in the wilds of the Isle of Man. I got a decent pass with merit and this sets me on my way to a career in Marketing. 
The staff as ICS Learn are always helpful in the extreme and I would recommend their services for other courses.
Colin Watson

headline: My tutors have all been really…
reviewBody: My tutors have all been really responsive and helpful.

headline: Ive been doing my Level 7 CIPD with ICS…
reviewBody:
Ive been doing my Level 7 CIPD with ICS and have been disappointed by the lack of interactivity in terms of the learning process.  The content is 98% learning from reading the screen and additional online research; there is a student forum that you can participate in but nothing compares to live interaction and debate.  The length of the course and the content in this style has made it feel like a real slog.  Tutors have been quick to get back to me on queries which is good. 

Note.  I was not allowed a study break while on maternity leave, which was very disappointing.  Everyone will have their own opinion on this but I couldnt understand why they couldnt suspend my access for 6 months for example

headline: Overall experience has been positive
reviewBody:
Overall experience has been positive, however distance learning does require a lot of self-motivation and determination to progress throughout the modules. Very few modules present opportunity for blended learning. Most tutors have been approachable and helpful.

One piece of advice, is that when you're preparing how much time to allocate for each module, bear in mind that you need to still have an active membership for 2/3 months after your final assessment in order to receive your certificate.

headline: Distance learning that lacks interactivity
reviewBody:
I have found ICS to be less interactive than I first thought. The number of online recorded lessons is 1 revision lesson per module. Sometimes these last as little as 30 minutes. For several months worth of content that was really not enough. It often felt like I was studying alone and teaching myself. There could be a lot more interactivity ie there are barely any you tube videos,  there could be more pictures and should be more recorded lessons. For example, there should be 1 online lesson for each of the 7 parts within a module at least. 

I have also found the business investigation module really poor. Contradictory advice has been given. The module content did not provide much information and it has taken about 7 months to get approval for a project idea. 

I unfortunately would not recommend this means of learning because of the above points.

headline: Anna Marie was amazing
reviewBody: Anna Marie was amazing, she helped me with all questions I had about the course and was very warm and friendly throughout our whole conversation.

headline: I am currently studying with ICS Learn…
reviewBody:
I am currently studying with ICS Learn and I needed an internship letter from them to present it to the company. They replied after one day with letter confirming I'm a student and that they can't recommend me for a job ! I explained again and sent an example of the letter expected by the company and how this is important to me but they just copy/paste the initial negative answer.  So because of an employee who doesn't seem in the mood to type some words I get to lose the internship opportunity.
This is not what I was expecting from ICS .

headline: After 4+ years of studying with ICS…
reviewBody:
After 4+ years of studying with ICS learn, I can only feel disappointed. They registered me under the wrong qualification with CIPD and this issue still hasn’t been resolved.
Nobody seems to care and I haven’t received my diploma. 4 years of hard work to pass my exams and assignments and now nobody is looking at my results and issuing my certificate because of their mistake.
Shocking customer service.

headline: Easy to navigate and helpful
reviewBody:
I am new in ICS Learn, but I'm really pleased with my course adviser's (thanks Maggie!) attention to my progress.  I find the structure of the course and resources easy to access and use.
Chloe

headline: Excellent customer service
reviewBody: GCSE Maths advisor responded promptly to my email enquiry and arranged a telephone call at a date and time suitable for me which went ahead as planned. As a returning customer - even though over 8yrs, my details were still on file and I was offered a discount. Everything went smoothly and within a very short time I had access to everything and a welcome email from my tutor. Thank you.

headline: Thank you Maggie
reviewBody: Thank you Maggie, you have been very helpful

headline: It was really easy and simple to study…
reviewBody:
It was really easy and simple to study with ICS Learn. The online learning platform was straightforward to use and was available at any time day or night so I could fit studying in around 2 young children. 

 It was also great having a blog forum where you could interact with other students and view posts and common queries.

Sometimes I found the online textbooks difficult to find/read on the screen but this was also personal preference. 

The finishing process once I completed the course was not quite clear. Although student services were extremely helpful, it may be useful just to have a section on what happens once you have completed the course.

headline: Colin was very helpful in answering my…
reviewBody: Colin was very helpful in answering my questions and the whole enrolment process was very simple. Thanks so much!

headline: Rubbish experience, find another provider if you can!!
reviewBody: Unfortunately, not a good review in the slightest. Started off really excited to begin my course with ics learn. First few months was ok then it began to go downhill. Overall I had 4 tutors, was left weeks without knowing anything as to why my tutors was not answering emails to then receive an email from someone completely new saying they are my tutor and wanted to start fresh, starting fresh 4 times is quite tedious. I think 2 of my tutors was made redundant but no explanation. After complaining waiting a few more weeks I then found out it changed to Babington. They wanted me to re-enrol which was fine, done the 45 minute phone call, filled out all forms and my line manager done there bit. Few weeks into it received an email saying lets get you enrolled and fill out the forms and get you booked in for 45 min phone call.....erm what. At this point I then complained and have taken myself off the course despite being half way through to find a more efficient provider. Stephen L was the tutor to mark my work, unsure why as it took him 7 weeks to mark 2 parts of my unit. No help what so ever and never got back to my emails asking for help with simple questions. What a massive waste of time this has been for me. Really disappointing and disheartening.

headline: Katy Mathers was just fantastic
reviewBody:
Katy Mathers was just fantastic. Nothing was too much trouble for her and she guided me through all of my options. Really has the students at heart. 

Great online portal and study planner. Books came really quickly and all in good order. Follow up email to see how things are going and introduction from tutor was a great touch. Really feel looked after and feel I made the right decision chosing this company.

Highly recommend

headline: Unhelpful !!

I went on the online chat to try and get some answers to my queries about starting an a level course with ICS. A lady by the name of Margaret D was really unhelpful, kept saying ‘cannot help you with that’ and ‘only you know the answer to that’. I was just trying to establish if many people took an a level in later life and whether it could be of use. 
I thought her customer service was awful and she immediately made me think ‘certainly not going to bother’ ..

He was able to advise what course was best for me based on my experience and aspirations and didn’t just recommend the most expensive one, and actually helped me save money. He then helped me set up an affordable payment plan and took the time to follow up and check in throughout the process. I am embarking on the course now and could not be more satisfied with the experience up until now. Thank you again to everyone involved.

headline: Very disappointed !
reviewBody:
Be aware before you sign up, if you can't complete the course within the timescale provided you will lose access to all your course materials , and you will have to pay extra to access it back. I didn't know this before I sign up for the course .

I've studied with other organisations before, i've never come accros such T&C's . The reason i signed up was because of the flexibility to work at your own pace. I was told I would still be able to complete my course once the support timescale will expire but now I'm being told that what they call "Support" is inclusive of the course materials and there are extra fees to gain access again. I understood support means - Tutors assistant not the actual course. 
So basiscally i'm paying big fees for something that i don't have access. 

Your sales team are very misleading! And now when i called for assistance, i'm being told to read the contract! i'm very disapointed .

headline: Supportive, Helpful and Efficient!
reviewBody: I have just commenced my course with ICS Learn and so far the experience has been very positive - and extremely easy! Michelle, my course adviser, has always responded to my emails quickly and answered any questions I have had. She has provided me with plenty of information, and has been friendly and helpful. So far I feel welcomed, supported, and ready to learn with ICS!

headline: Enrolment was great
reviewBody: Enrolment was great, answered all my questions, shared lots of relevant information and was friendly.

headline: My registration
reviewBody: The registration for ICS Learn was clear and straightforward with not too much hassle in setting up the account and Password. When that was finished I was presented with a tour of the site that was very helpful in understanding the ins and outs of the site, and getting me prepared for my studying period. All in all I would say that ICS learn is clean and focussed site which is exactly what needs when studying online. I would recommend it to anyone wanting to study on their own time.

headline: CIPD Level 3 in HR Practice
reviewBody: I studied Level 3 CIPD through ICS Learn and would say that the student experience was satisfactory at most. The online portal could be a lot more user friendly.Tutors don't always respond to messages and/or mark assignments within the agreed framework and student services ability to help is limited. All of this adds frustration to an already stressful learning situation. That said, some of the tutors were fabulous, marking assignments and responding to messages very quickly, which was a godsend. I would struggle to recommend ICS Learn and wouldn't use them again.

headline: Very helpful lessons suitable for just…
reviewBody: Very helpful lessons suitable for just about anyone with or without previous knowledge in mathematics. Melissa Lieberman, Aida and Kirsten explain the concepts thoroughly making mathematics seem simple and a pleasure to learn.

headline: Anne Marie was very helpful and…
reviewBody: Anne Marie was very helpful and answered all my queries promptly. Email communication very quick to reply.

headline: Very professional experience
reviewBody:
Ciaran was very helpful and informative and pointed me in the right direction for my next step in my career.

I would highly recommend.

headline: Professional and easy enrollment.
reviewBody:
Ciaran has been brilliant though out the enrollment process. He is very patient, informative and very helpful. He was always happy to answer my queries providing very clear and precise information. I never felt under any pressure enroll, but did feel very supported from enquiry to enrollment regardless of how long I needed to take to consider the information.

Thank you for all you help and advice, it's much appreciated 

Laura Morgan

headline: Ciaran has been very professional and a…
reviewBody:
Ciaran has been very professional and a good brand ambassador for ICS as well as the CIPD. Thank you for your quick responses and clear and concise information. Much appreciated!
