headline: CIPD enrolment
reviewBody: I have found the service to be excellent. My first point of contact was Ciaran McEachen who I have found to be really helpful in finding the right course for me. The communication and information has been brilliant with an easy enrolment process. I very much look forward to studying towards my CIPD Intermediate Diploma in HR Management.

headline: Great personal service
reviewBody:
Paul Martin was my allocated advisor and if it wasn't for him I probably wouldn't be enrolled on my level 7 CIPD yet, it's something I've been mulling over for ages but didn't quite have the confidence to take the leap , he would send me gentle follow up emails to check I understood everything okay and to see if there was anything else I would need. Always forthcoming with an abundance of information that he thought I might find useful.
As a whole I've decided on ICS Learn to study with due to the format and platforms which they offer , from e books to recorded lectures. The payment plans also allowed me to not break my bank account each month. 
I've gone from being nervous about whether this was the right thing for me to do , to now excited and enrolled !

headline: Amazing service
reviewBody: The customer service was great all my questions were answered in full and everything was clear.

headline: Excellent Customer Service
reviewBody: One of the best course advisor i have come across!! Answered all my questions, if it wasn't for Anne Marie i wouldn't have applied for the course . Thanks for your help!

headline: Intro Webinar
reviewBody: Very informative, got all answers questioned.

headline: Philip was very helpful with enrolling!
reviewBody: Thanks for your help with enrolling!

headline: Maths is great- English is harder
reviewBody: Melissa Lieberman is a great maths Tutor, she explains things clearly and easy to remember, ICS learn is ok, if you are quite confident with technology and have a basic understanding of how schools teach now, I find the English very hard to understand as the terminology is much harder than when I was at school, I would recommend the maths GCSE to anyone and with Melissa's online videos/tutorials it's great and you feel more knowledgeable very quickly.

headline: Physics

headline: Fantastic service

headline: Beware & do your research
reviewBody:
The company appears - from the reviews - to be good at dealing with initial queries, & signing up candidates for courses (& taking payment) Howver, when I researched more deeply (& emailed ICS directly), I discovered that the great majority of reviews are based on this initial contact, and more worryingly, the company offers only 320 'guided learning hours', when other similar online 'colleges' offer over double that.

Also, please note: ICS makes no mention on their website of hidden fees such as the £60 they apparently charge PER EXAM  - on top of the (considerable) fees charged by the exam centres. Also, they seem reluctant to let you know exactly how much the exam centre fees are - some are quite pricey, so again check in advance of signing up to ensure you can afford it. 

When I asked for any statistics or information about past student/school track records, they dodged the questions and when I asked again, they stopped replying all together. They also wouldn't be drawn on when they take A-level students in for 2019 for some reason, perhaps as they want to recruit still for 2018, and if you don't finish in time, charge you for extending to 2019.

I also notice that they don't appear to deal properly with serious student complaints - make sure you check out the low star ratings for any college including this one, the reasons for it, and the response from the college.

In summary, & according to my research, other colleges offer much more, including (at Oxford Open Learning Trust), double the number of guided learning hours, a person dedicated to helping you find an exam centre near you, money back guarantees if you don't pass your exams, teachers who are guaranteed to be properly qualified etc etc. Not impressed. Beware & do your research.

headline: great support

lovely help and customer service and great support from Fraser.

headline: Maths teacher
reviewBody: I am a mature student and was very apprehensive about online distant learning. Now 4 months later I can't think of a better way to learn . Melissa Lieberman remains professional yet supportive, encouraging, positive and makes learning maths fun. Melissa makes maths understandable. Even if you give an incorrect answer she will always explain where you may have gone wrong and go back over the question so that you understand where you went wrong. She always has time for any questions during the lessons. On the VERY odd occasion when she may have made a mistake it's refreshing for the rest of us mere humans to see that even the best can get mixed up when working with numbers ! Melissa makes me feel capable and gives me the confidence to really move forward with understanding maths. GREAT teacher.

reviewBody:

Good job!! Your CS department is wonderful. 
You can pay the fees in full or enrol with a minimum deposit followed by a maximum of 22 monthly payments (interest-free), you can decide when you want to start... I hope all keeps going ok during the course!!

headline: Great service
reviewBody: The service has been great and really quick! The information provided has been easy to understand, and Andy the adviser has been on top of things from the start -  it all seems very straight forward now I can't wait to get on with my studies!

reviewBody:

I'm in the early stages of following the coursework, but again, so far it is comprehensive and clearly communicated. I'm looking forward to progressing through the course.

headline: AAT Accounting course enrolement
reviewBody: The adviser I spoke to was very knowledgeable in this subject and provided excellent advise as well as being polite and very helpful. She took the time to explain everything that the course covered in addition to the costs involved with the course and exam fees. Thank you so much for such an efficient service.

headline: Generally good experience
reviewBody:
The enrollment process was easy. I would say their website portal could use some user-experience enhancements as it was not easy to navigate at first however once you learned your way around everything was there and available. 

I personally got a lot out of going to the workshops as I found distance learning hard to engage with among work and everyday life. A location in the Southwest would be useful as options were limited to Birmingham, London or Glasgow which made attendance expensive. 

The tutors were helpful and responsive as were the ICS staff when required.  The course content was current and relevant. 

It is worth nothing that there is a substantial amount of time from finishing the course through to receiving certification due to various levels of external verification which could be improved upon.

headline: Enrollment process
reviewBody: Note that this is only a review of the enrollment process. Anne Marie made it a very easy, smooth service and was very polite. So far very impressed, I intend to update the review in the future.

headline: Mixed Feelings.
reviewBody:
To start with I was told the wrong price for the course I wanted to do, it turned out to be £500 more expensive than I was quoted, which was not a great start, but as they have interest free payment plans I signed up anyway.
The person I spoke to in the beginning was very friendly and helpful, and apologetic for quoting the wrong price, so I have no complaints about the customer service.

So onto doing my actual course, I was advised to introduce myself to my tutor, so I did and I also asked for his advice, it has been almost 4 days since that message and I haven't had a response, so that's really not helpful. That is a particularly bad thing as great tutor support was one of the things that convinced me to sign up.

The website itself to do the course on is very confusing to start with, but once you get used to it, it becomes very simple, and the content itself has so far been very good.

headline: Anne Marie McGarry
reviewBody: Anne Marie gave helpful and enthusiastic advice several times without being pushy, allowing me the time and space to investigate all my options before making a decision.  If only all customer service experiences were as pleasant and efficient as dealing with Anne Marie.

Again, thank you for everything and looking forward to be part of new coerces 


Regards
Ahmad

headline: Ecxellent Service, easy & quick- Worth trying !
reviewBody: ICS Learn Black Friday's offer for Level 5 CIPD in L&D was recommended to me by a friend and it was so interesting that I didn't have to think twice to go for it.  As soon as I get in touch with CIPD Advisor (Ms Michelle Kerr), I felt like I was already inside. Spite of the deadline and the few problems we had encountered while proceeding with the payment by credit card, she remained professional and was "all ears" for me. The registration process is easy and quick and she made even it easier to me and did her best to ensure everything was going all right until I received the final "Congrats" notification from her confirming my official enrollment in this course. ICS Learn online support is up to date and hi-tech and worth its reputation. Excellent service with a proven customer-caring culture!

headline: Thorough, Professional & Friendly Guidance

headline: Excellent First Impressions

I was able to recognise which course was right for me and ended up changing my mind as a result of this, as originally I was going to undertake a different course subject. headline: Highly recommend!

headline: Excellent teaching and support

She explained everything really clearly and the webinars were really helpful, giving opportunity to interact with Melissa and other students doing the same work.  I really struggled with Maths at school and the support I received from Melissa gave me lots of confidence and I am really pleased to report that I passed!!

headline: Brilliant Induction
reviewBody: Thank you Melissa Lieberman for a very informative and beneficial induction. Looking forward to studying with ICS.

headline: Nice and clear

headline: Motivating

headline: Helpful, informative and personable call centre staff made things easy.

I presented a number of issues that could have tripped up the advisor, but she made an effort to present best options available and has kept me well informed on what would happen once enrolled. headline: Outstanding.
reviewBody:
Melissa Lieberman is a highly commendable Maths Tutor. She is rather interactive on her online lessons with students and engages the learner in a rather friendly way and encourages them to reach their full potential. Her clarity and kindness all tops it off. It's vital that we show appreciate to such tutors, who are the epitome to the success of so many individuals in their desired and excellent careers, without such tutors, we as students would not be anyone to be honest.

She is the best asset you have!

headline: Always really helpful!
reviewBody: Anne Marie has always been very helpful and efficient with any of my enquiries. She is always very cheerful!

headline: Truly helpful and courteous
reviewBody:
I de-registered my 15 year old daughter from school in favour of home education but was unsure about signing her up for online learning, feeling that I may have no input into her GCSE courses. After speaking with Maggie, I am confident that my daughter and I will be fully supported through the whole experience. I have been given the same access to tutors as my daughter and can continue to be involved in her education.
In addition, my daughter will not have to experience the undue pressure to do GCSE's that are not relevant to her and can concentrate on achieving excellent grades with ICS Learning.

headline: ICS Learning Course
reviewBody: Fraser was a great help to me, who offered continued support over the past couple of days. And he's extensive knowledge in all aspects of your training course settled my worries.

headline: Melissa Lieberman
reviewBody:
Every long journey begins with a dream  ( or a first step ...)
A spirit with courage to make it all real    (  at least theoretically possible )

headline: Very efficient, friendly and knowledgeable.

headline: Very helpful

headline: Registration
reviewBody:

Thank you so far.

headline: Great customer service
reviewBody:
I am so happy I chose to study with ICS Learn, the staff are so helpful. I receive quick responses from my tutor or if I contact student support.

Contacting is so easy as you can call, email or chat online.  The support is there.  It can be daunting choosing to learn online but ICS Learn are so friendly and helpful.

headline: New Member
reviewBody: The Course Advisor I spoke with was extremely helpful and helped me choose the most suitable payment method to begin my course.  She was friendly and thorough and I would recommend to anyone thinking of starting AAT to contact ICS Learn.  Thank you!

headline: Enrolment with Margaret Duffy
reviewBody: Margaret's expert advise and guidance made the selection of my course and enrolment a pleasant effortless experience. I had nothing to do, Margaret did all the hard work. Within a couple of hours I was able to access my course materials and make a start on my studies. I cannot recommend ICS highly enough, as a past student I know I will receive the best tuition and support I could hope for.

headline: Excited to start my new course!
reviewBody: I started off just enquiring about CIPS course which I am now enrolled in. Anne-Marie explained everything so clearly, was really helpful and friendly. Thanks to Anne-Marie I am now on my way to obtaining a professional qualification I have always wanted. Thankyou so much - a pleasure to deal with.

headline: Cipd level 3
reviewBody: Paul was exactly the person i needed to find the best cipd course for me. He was helpf, efficient and friendly and i wouldnt hesitate to contact him again to go onto my intermediate course of study.

headline: Maths GCSE
reviewBody:
I haven't studied for over 25yrs and its taken me years to find the courage to commit myself to starting again.
Melissa Liberman being the tutor I watch, makes this experience pleasurable, stimulating with an exceptional grasp on how to work with a huge student community of various ages and educational backgrounds.
I have just started this course having only completed 5 sessions. Finding the workload overwhelming - Melissa has been able so far to abide my fears, she is able to make a student comfortable within their learning ability managing to enthuse and encourage whilst teaching. Please continue what your doing Melissa. Great job. I would also like to say that I find the virtual lesson extremely helpful, good job ICS Learn.
Kind regards
Jen Boxall

reviewBody: I am with the start up of the expereince and am sure it will be an added value to my journey to have Level 7 certificate

Like i said - Its fantastic booking a course that i have always wanted to study but even better when you know there are people at ICS Learn that will answer, listen and help you along the way.

Thanks Philip and Thank you ICS Learn

headline: Huge amount of confidence building
reviewBody:
My tutor Melissa Lieberman has made the video lessons as use friendly as possible. Though I have been able to get by without any maths qualifications in the 17 years since I left school, I have found a new love for maths. I'm not just saying that for the review, I genuinely mean it. I don't fret when I get to an unfamiliar subject, I don't panic because I know that Melissa will explain everything in such a way that the information won't go over my head. 

I have had lovely interactions with every single person I have spoken to since signing up with ICS. I would wholeheartedly recommend them.

Unlike other online providers, I felt ICS to be the best informed with regards to course content, structure and this instilled confidence in me to choose them as my provider. They were also very clear about the difference between the Diploma and the Certificate.

All the emails I have received have been full of information about how to begin in terms of induction webcasts, photo ID and logging on.

reviewBody: The process was very smooth and the adviser was very responsive and knowledgeable. headline: Great service

I received a follow up email promptly and the sign up process was very straightforward.
I've been putting off getting my GCSE Maths qualification for years and Colin helped make this decision a very easy one.
Thank you!

headline: Prompt prefessional service
reviewBody:
After filling in the information request forms late one evening on the web I received a call first thing the next morning from Samantha which I missed.
Sam then sent me an email to check if I was still interested and saying ,if I was, to email her with a suitable time and day and she would call me back.
Once I contacted her she explained all the different ways I could go about achieving my desired end result.Once I had decided what it was I wanted she explained the different ways I could pay and without pressuring a sale she sent me all the information again by email and left me to decide what I wanted to do.
After several days I emailed what course I would like to do and how I would like to pay. Within the hour Sam was on the phone and I was enrolled.
No room for improvement as far as I can see.

headline: Terrible.
reviewBody: I wanted to study my A-Levels and was given a thorough explanation of how the platform works, when the exams are and how much study time is needed. I then purchased the courses and received great customer service but then a few months down the line I was told about the exam cost which I was not told before I purchased the courses! This will set me back over £600 and I will to purchase another course to even get into a credible university. I then explained my frustrations to ICS Learn it's self and she said she would do something to help me but Nothing! No response whatsoever. I feel like I've been scammed completely. The tutor is absolutely useless, the platform is unorganized, the material differentiates from the A-Level booklets it's self. I just feel like I've wasted my time and money and they don't care. Absolutely terrible service which they didn't even bother to redeem. All about the money to them.

headline: very good customer service
reviewBody: Fraser was very helpful and explained everything I asked with promptness and professionalism I was impressed.

headline: Great Service & Features
reviewBody:
I have registered in CIPD Diploma and would recommend ICS learn for anyone and from my experience with them i can say that they :

-reply very fast to any inquiry
-Continually follow up with students   
-Have easy and clear registration process
-Have affordable installment options
-Have User friendly learning platform 

Finally i would like to thank  Michell for her continues support and follow up during my registration process.

headline: Amazing Service - Would definitely recommend!!
reviewBody: I really struggled finding a course provider for the course I wanted to enrol onto. I found ICS by chance and within minutes, maybe even seconds of me signing up to something, I had a really lovely phone call from Nicola Dexter. I'd just spoken to someone from another company and they were really rude so I was feeling a bit low, but having spoken to Nicola I then felt much better. She was there every step of the way, always answering my questions and has been so kind, helpful and understanding. I'm so appreciative of her kindness! I've enrolled onto my course today and I'm very much looking forward to starting when my books arrive. I would definitely recommend choosing to study with ICS, purely for the customer service factor!

headline: Excellent service
reviewBody: I made a contact through the website and all my questions were answered the same day, with fully detailed explanation and support. I am confident that the help of Ciaran McEachen, CIPD Advisor, who dealt with my emails, was a big factor that helped me decide to enroll for the studies. I received a very personal attention and a great deal of help with all my queries as well as the enrollment process. Excellent service, I wish all the course providers could attend to their customers with the same professionalism.

headline: Lesson from Melissa Lieberman
reviewBody: An excellent lesson which was given by very engaging teacher (Melissa Lieberman).

headline: satisfied customer!
reviewBody: Good, straightforward online course with helpful tutoring and easy to organize course studying. Enjoyed the course I did last year and currently starting 2 other courses.

headline: ICS adult learner
reviewBody:
I started with 4 stars but that was taking into account personal hurdles and bumps in the road - Looking solely at live lessons, material and support, ICS is quite excellent. The in-house maths teachers is incredibly accessible and covers everything. Liberman's enthusiasm is certainly a highlight. As well as answering all questions. basic or otherwise, in a non-judgemental way, not wanting anyone to get left behind. The organisation and availability of resources, links, books, websites, contacts is very impressive and only moderately overwhelming.
Interactions with student services and the help desk have been small, but useful and speedy. As the course is starting to get harder, I'll now start using the forums and 'Ask a maths teacher' box. I trust that anything I have difficulty with will be helped. 
Two live sessions a week is great and recordings are released soon after. Very different atmospheres of learning but watching both allows for everything to be covered and understood a lot better.
For adult learners, it's got you covered. Having motivation and routine is becoming essential and these are good things to have either way. O, but it's hard. That will get easier... 
It's good for me. Hope it is for others too.

headline: Great online courses.
reviewBody: It was very straightforward to apply for IGCSE Human Biology, the staff at ICS Learn are very helpful and answered all my questions even making contact at a time when I was ready to begin my course.

headline: ICS Learn

reviewBody:

Audrey Lambert.

headline: I am very satisfied

headline: Excellent service

headline: Very friendly service and complete information about enrollment
reviewBody: Ciaran answered all of my questions by phone, chat and by email. I compared a lot of online programs  so I had a lot of different kinds of questions and Ciaran took the time to answer them all. He always responded very quickly so I am very happy with the service I have received from first point of contact up and through to enrollment. I am looking forward to start with the courses now.

headline: Excellent
reviewBody: Michelle was so helpful and provided a wealth of information and advice throughout the process. The whole experience to choose a course and become a student was easy!

headline: Back To School !
reviewBody: I spoke with Colin Urquhart, a course adviser who answered my questions clearly and without  hesitation. He gave me the confidence to enrol and begin my new education adventure !

headline: Excellent customer care from Ciaran
reviewBody: Ciaran was helpful and at at hand anytime I needed any information. He is very knowledgeable about CIPD courses and how they are ran. He made everything very simple from start to finish. Highly recommend!

headline: Informative, helpful and friendly advisor.
reviewBody:
Since making contact with ICS learn, I have found the advisor really helpful, friendly and really informative when contacting them.

I have signed up today with confidence in the ICS team and believe that the course I am going to study will help me and my career in Reward.

The information provided gives me an understanding of what the course will cover and that it is CIPD recognised so I will show that I am continuing professional development.

I also found the interest free payments a bonus as it gives me an opportunity to pay monthly for the next 9 months to save paying out a large amount of money in one time.

headline: Helpful
reviewBody: Very helpful, concise and knowledgeable.

headline: Perfect session
reviewBody:
This session answers all my questions.
Thank you

headline: Fantastic Customer Service!
reviewBody: From my initial enquiry to being registered on a course with you I received fantastic service from your course advisor Michelle. She was prompt to reply to all my queries, provided me with detailed information and guided me to the right course. Above and beyond my expectations so far. I can't wait to get started with my new learning journey!

headline: Registration
reviewBody: Samantha Boyle was a very helpful individual and it was an absolute please sure having her take my call.

headline: It was quick and simple to enrol.
reviewBody: Looking for online courses was a bit of a blur and then when I found the ICS it was quick and simple. The help I received was clear and precise and enrolment was smooth.

headline: Information Support
reviewBody: Excellent Information support service. Easy and very quick.

headline: Brilliant service
reviewBody: I spoke to Fraser and he was lovely, very clear, friendly and polite. He helped me with everything I needed was a pleasure to speak to.

headline: membership renewal
reviewBody:
I spoke with Andy Armstrong who was very helpful informative and friendly. He advised and encouraged me that I would be able to accomplish this new course that I have enrolled in. 
He dealt with every thing in one phone call including sorting out payments etc. I was happy to learn that I was allowed 10% discount and a further £50 for introducing my daughter  to ICS learn enrolling on a book keeping course. 
I actually spoke with Andy last year at my initial enrolment and he was just as pleasant and informative. I am looking forward to my next study challenge.

headline: So easy!
reviewBody: Very easy to get started, friendly staff and payment plan that suited my needs. Can't wait to get started!

headline: Great service.
reviewBody: Great service,all questions were answered and made me more comfortable about doing the course.

headline: wonderful experience
reviewBody: Enrolling my daughter with ICS was a very easy process and made very lovely by Margaret. feeling quiet positive about my daughter's future now. many thanks

headline: Route to success
reviewBody: Helpful team member set me up for my GCSE.  Enthusiastic about product and motivational.  Easy process for enrolment.  Thank you.

headline: Fraser
reviewBody:
Fraser was really helpful and informative and managed to pick out my question amongst my blabbering! 
He answered my questions with any explantaions that were needed and clarified any confusions that I had. 
He offered advice regarding the payment plan and gave me some extra options.
Thank you to Fraser for his help.

headline: Booking in GCSE courses with Maggie
reviewBody: Maggie has been really helpful today and I have high expectations of ICS Learn as a result of this.

headline: Great communication
reviewBody: From the minute I filled in an enquiry form, I have received fantastic communication from Anne Marie at ICS. My initial phone chat was really friendly and positive.

headline: Extremely helpful.
reviewBody: Cairan has been excellent, providing me clear and concise information, and answering all my questions immediately.  I can't thank him enough for the quality service he has provided.

headline: Fantastic!
reviewBody: I was surprised at how quick and easy it was to sign up to my course. I had excellent communication with Maggie. Such a friendly, welcoming attitude that I have no doubt will continue throughout the course.

headline: Investing in myself for a brighter future
reviewBody: I've been a buyer for 9 years, but never got any formal qualifications. In honesty I never thought I would because I never would have the time to go to college during the day and nights seemed daunting. With ICS I can drop on and do as much or as little studying as I like, and with the dark nights coming up I should have more time to devote to the course. The staff at ICS were very polite and helpful.

headline: Frazer's service
reviewBody: I sopke to frazer initially and was impressed with his customer service approach.  He clearly knew what he was about and gave me exactly the information I required.  I was more than happy to sign up then and there and feel this will be a great learning experience for me.  Top marks.

headline: My initial experience with ICS and Fraser Cameron
reviewBody:
Having used the web page to do my initial research I found it to be both user friendly and extremely informative. 
 
I then called ICS today to enrol on two of the GCSE courses Maths & Science. The advisor I spoke too was Fraser and from start to finish the service he gave was great. He was polite very clear and again informative he gave me the opportunity to ask any questions and covered points he thought may be useful. Explain all payment options available to me and put into place my chosen option efficiently.  A true credit to the company. 

Many thanks 
Rebecca

headline: ICS LEARN ENROLMENT
reviewBody: Found ICS very helpful, answered all questions I had relating to the courses. Friendly, efficient and very quickly guided me through the enrolment process. Would recommend this company.

headline: Good Service
reviewBody:
The Advisor was patient and very informative about the course. He took time to explain in detail and advice which level would best suit me. I received confirmation email within minutes.

Very pleased

headline: Seamless Service
reviewBody:
From your informative website to Sammy my customer service representive, the process was very informative and easy to understand. 

Excellent service let's hope I get on as well with the course.

headline: Induction Process with Melissa Lieberman
reviewBody:
I was glad i joined ICSLearn for my IGCSE Science and  was glad I was part of the webinar induction on the 7th of september 2016.

During this induction section, I was able to interact directly with Melissa and other students about some specific queries I had about my course and how to proceed.

All my questions as at now were answered and look forward working on this course with my personal tutor.

Edward

headline: Very simple!
reviewBody: It was very easy to get advice on the courses I was interested in and choose the right one for me. All my e-mails were answered really quickly and were very useful and informative.

headline: Friendly and professional.
reviewBody: When I was confused about what I needed to do, I got the help and advice I needed straight away.

headline: Great service, quick and easy set up
reviewBody: Spoke to Philip on the phone, very easy to talk to and friendly. Helped with all questions I asked, explained about the course and very easy enrolment. Thanks again.

headline: Highly recommended
reviewBody: A quick enrolment process. First time learning with ICS, so far so good.

headline: Efficient, professional, friendly service
reviewBody:
From the moment I first spoke to Ciaran McEachen to make my initial enquiry, I was made to feel like a valued customer.
He was patient, informative, extremely helpful and not pushy at all.
There was no hard sell, just reassurance, fantastic material and an abundance of support offered.
Once signed up, everything was seamless and timely.
I cannot recommend this service enough!

headline: Ics enrollement
reviewBody: Pleasant, informative and friendly service.

headline: Easygoing and straightforward
reviewBody: Signing up for my course was super quick and easy, Fraser answered all of my questions and enrolled me with no fuss! The website has a great set up and is really easy to manouvre your way around. I can not wait to embark on my distance learning adventure.

headline: Brilliant
reviewBody: I spoke with an advisor called Fraser and he was very helpful! He was happy to help me when it was best for me, he was very friendly and made everything so easy and simple to sign up.

headline: Webinar
reviewBody: I attended a webinar session on Wednesday 7th sept. And it was really helpful. It was ran by Mellisa Lieberman and she was very good at explaining things in detail and answering any questions :)

headline: What a fantastic first impression...
reviewBody:
They say that first impressions leave a lasting impression, well, what a fantastic first impression.  I have not even started my course yet but the way in which my enquiry into a GCSE Science course was handled was quite simply exemplary!

Any concerns I had were answered and I was made to feel that my best interests were the most important factor in proceeding with the course.

As I said, I have not even started yet but would highly recommend to friends, family and anyone who wants to learn something new or improve upon existing results such as myself - even if it is 15 years after I took the original exams.

Thank you so much Margaret for your supportive and reassuring customer service - there are many call centres and customer contact points that could learn a lifetime of skills and manners when dealing with consumers.

This review is solely based upon the first rate experience I had with Margaret Duffy in just a 12 minute telephone conversation.

Kindest regards

Adam Jessup-Smithers

headline: Informative and useful
reviewBody: Initial contact useful and follow up helpful. Advisor knowledgable and enabled me to make informed decisions regarding pathway.

headline: Everyone's so friendly!
reviewBody: I have heard some bad reviews through external student forums so I called ICS direct to clarify the rumours vs the facts. I spoke to Fraser Cameron and he cleared up any concerns I had and enrolled me instantly! I then watched a webinar with Melissa Lieberman who was so friendly and never left anybody ignored in the live chat and even went over time to make sure all questions were answered. Very impressed :D

headline: Great stuff!
reviewBody: Melissa Lieberman gave a very comprehensive and pleasant induction. Very valuable =)

headline: Gcse course purchase
reviewBody: Maggie made the process of buying, navigating and accessing the learning resources a pleasure.  I would recommend this site to anyone considering home education as an option for their child.

headline: dedicated
reviewBody:
I called a different day and was told the person I needed to speak to was not available but that she would call me back, I waited then decided some clerical error must have occurred so I called back

upon finding out my name the advisor I spoke to  (Margaret Duffy) instantly recalled me and explained that she had tried to call me the day prior early, my phone would have been off as I was working nights, we laughed at how odd the coincidence was and I finally enrolled in my course 

Her manner was very breezy and put me at ease despite my anxiety about enrolling, and the process was very quick and simple

headline: Great organisation
reviewBody: I have just enrolled with ICS and I am looking forward to starting my chosen course. I really like the fact I can study around full time work and not have to be sat in a classroom on my day off. Maggie my course advisor was amazing she talked me through what I would need to get started and how to spread the cost to make it manageable.  Later that evening she called me at a time that suited me and I was all set to go with my course.

headline: Ciaran McEachen
reviewBody: I initially spoke with Ciaran on the online chat available and he was very knowledgable and supportive as I didn't really know my options.  He kept in touch via email and answered further questions and called me as agreed to help me to sign up!

headline: Excellent service, very knowledgable
reviewBody: Had looked at many company's with which to take my GCSE with but liked the look of ICS Learn.  Read through their webpage but still had questions I needed answering so opted to speak to one of their online members of staff who was very helpful and took me through the process from start to finish.  Would recommend ICS Learn to anyone.

headline: Very Helpful
reviewBody: Samantha was very helpful and professional. I felt I got all the relevant information I needed to make the decision to sign up to ICS. I would highly recommend Samantha and ICS.

headline: Enrollement
reviewBody: I spoke Maggie at ICS today for enrollement on 2 GCSE courses she was lovely friendly and helpful...she gave me a loyalty discount too! It was pleasure dealing with Maggie today.

headline: Excellent helpful service
reviewBody: I spoke to Maggie today who was so friendly, helpful and informative, really great, five star customer service! Thank you

headline: Impressed
reviewBody: Very happy with the service I have received...prompt and informative answers via email. Made it so much easier for me to decide to start studying. Thank you very much

headline: Easy website, speedy assistance offer from Course Advisor
reviewBody:
I've only just signed up for a maths a-level, but regarding browsing the website and signing up:
Course clearly described on the website and the Course Advisor Fraser was quick to get in touch with me to offer help and information.

headline: Amazing customer service
reviewBody:
I sent a few emails to set my mind on what I wanted to do and make sure it was suitable for me and I spoke to an amazing customer service advisor named Margaret and we'll what can I say I'm not a student all because of her she helped me multiple times and on multiple occasions I don't think I've ever used a chat service and be put through to the same person who helped me originally and not only that she set up my account and then emailed me the next day to ask how I got on and make sure I had no problems she gave me a very personal and professional service and I couldn't be happier. Glad to be a student again and will definitely be choosing ICS learn again 
Thank you Margaret and ICS! From Ryan

reviewBody: Michelle Kerr (Course Advisor) was extremely helpful in my course selection from start to finish, listening to what I required and got to know me so was able to direct me in the right direction, Michelle was always prompt and professional in replying to my emails, so thank you Michelle.  I have just sat through an Induction Webinar with the CIPD lecturer Carol Margerrison of which I found extremely beneficial and just knowing that you have their full support throughout the course is great and reassuring  to know, now looking forward to getting started.

Thank you so much x

headline: GCSE maths
reviewBody: So far so good

headline: Great Service
reviewBody: I could not thank Paul enough for his patience over the past year with me. He was always kind and understanding. He was extremely informative, which made me feel comfortable with my learning provider choice. I am excited to finally start my journey with ICS.

headline: Fantastic support
reviewBody:
I had a great time with ICS, my tutor( Anna) and the other staff were very helpful. Also, the payment was very good. Thank you for helping me and I am so happy that I passed my English exam.
5 stars for the tutor
5 stars for the service

headline: Amazing!
reviewBody: Fraser was very helpful through the whole process. It so nice to be called at a time that is convenient and the text asking when was a good time was a great touch! Can't wait to start! Thank you.

headline: Amazing way to learn my GCSE maths
reviewBody:
I paid monthly for a year but had 18months to take the exam which was great as some months I couldn't get my head into study and other months I was really pumped to learn and found it easier :)
The folders they provide have a folder for every subject (algebra,geometry,numbers,statistics etc) so you can pick a Subject to learn :)
My teacher who was only on the other end of an email (and replied in less than half an hour and notified myself when on holiday) was
Melissa Lieberman and always had time to either discuss over the phone or via email anything I am struggling with :))
I enjoyed the webinars and found the old test papers extremely useful way of finding out where your weaknesses lie,then you know where to research more -today I achieved my desired result and got the C I needed to attend university :)

headline: Just Great
reviewBody:
I was looking for certified CIPD provider in KSA, long story short I resolved to take the online rout, ICS Learn was one option and I'm glad I chose it. 
I've been assigned to Ms. Michelle Kerr "Course Advisor", she helped in registration process and provided me with all information to get started and put me in the right track. today I started my CIPD Level 3 HR Diploma...

headline: Excellent teaching!
reviewBody: I'm very happy today after getting a B grade in gcse maths. Enrolled with ICS learn and got an excellent teacher MELISSA LIBERMAN. I couldn't manage to keep up with the online lessons but went through all the lectures thoroughly only a month before the exam. Her lectures are very clear and understandable for students of all capabilities. The way she delivers embeds the whole material in the mind very nicely which is unforgettable. This was the only source I used for my preparation and came out in flying colours by the grace of God. Thankyou MELISSA! Would definitely recommend you for gcse maths learning!!!!

headline: Great, informative service
reviewBody: My course advisor Nicola Dexter for the combined AAT course supplied me with all the information i required in detail.  We communicated through email and phone to which was always arranged around times to suit me.  Quick and easy enrolment.  Looking forward to getting started

Faye

Thank you and happy learning!

headline: Very helpful and informative
reviewBody: Would highly recommend this service to anyone. The people i spoke to were very informative and made me feel confident that i was making an informed and correct decision. No pressure was involved and they were extremely helpful both over the phone and email. Thank you

headline: Great service

headline: Great customer service
reviewBody:
Andrew Armstrong from ICS Learn was my point of contact through my enquiries and eventual booking of the course.

He provided a quick, first class service and always gave helpful advice as well as required details.

Very impressed.

headline: Quick easy and fuss free
reviewBody: I called and spoke with Ciaran. I had already applied to a college to study a CIPD but due to a change in working hours I was worrying I would have struggled to make classes on time. Having shopped around online, ICS offered the best foundation diploma in terms of affordability, payment options and study support. Ciaran was very friendly and helpful simply explaining what ICS offered without being pushy as other companies had (which put me off a bit). I was sent all relevant information to read through before I called back to sign up. The course can be done as and when suits you, which for anyone working full time is far more convenient.

headline: Excellent enrollment communication
reviewBody: No issues with understanding the course content or availability and costs. Good communications - called back when promised. Thank you Cieran

headline: Very well executed.
reviewBody: Melissa was very interactive with us and she gave in great detail what to expect and how to survive in the online community. I feel more confident in moving on in the next phase of learning.

headline: Very professional
reviewBody: A very professional and friendly experience

headline: Learn new skills
reviewBody:
I am a mature student and considering a change in career.  

I requested information about GCSE Mathematics.  I paid a small deposit, then paid the remaining fees monthly with a ICS flexible and interest-free payment plan.  The structure of the course has been redesigned and gave me complete control over the pace and progression of learning.  ICS staff are friendly and provide top class support.  

Highly recommend ICS to all my friends. I have completed GCSE Business Studies, English Literature, and A Level Sociology with ICS. I gained high marks in GCSE and A Level final exams as an external candidate in Bath, England.

headline: Impressive Response
reviewBody: Michelle was very professional, polite and helpful.  She was very prompt in responding to query. A great way to start!

reviewBody: I've recently signed up to complete an igcse, the registration was quick and easy and the advisor was very helpful. Looking forward to getting started!

headline: Early days
reviewBody:
UPDATE- I would still recommend this company. They were brilliant to deal with and very helpful. Great for working mum's with little time.


I have just enrolled, so it's early days for me to comment too much. However, what I can tell you is that, Paul, enrolled me and he was just lovely. He was very informative and didn't pressure me in the slightest. They do everything to suit you, from start dates to payment dates. I am so looking forward to starting. I will update this after a few months- once I have a bit more experience with ICS.

headline: Excellent service

headline: CIM Course
reviewBody: Fantastic staff to deal with (Anne-Marie), provided perfect level of support but never overbearing - even though the process took months.

headline: Simple and easy and great help!
reviewBody:
A big thank you to Michelle Kerr!

Dealing with her from the start was awesome.  She answered all my questions and always got back to me as quick as she could.

I love how simple and easy things have been set up to make the online study journey enjoyable, yet flexible for full time workers.

I am looking forward to completing my Diploma with you guys!  I have had such a good experience so far, and I hope that it continues and gets even better!

Regards,
Jessica

headline: Felt very much at ease and confident in the course and company!
reviewBody:
Paul Martin was incredibly helpful, avoided using jargon and "script like" phrases, he let me explain what I was wanting to do and how I would use a CIPD qualification to secure a career, Paul recommended a suitable course based on my experience, the CIPD Level 5. 

Paul was very understanding, provided excellent customer service and made me feel like a person (even joined in with my excitement) rather than a step closer to a bonus scheme or just another set of £ signs. Thank you so much.

headline: Great customer service
reviewBody: Great customer service from friendly people. My advisor was very clear about costs and course content, which is exactly what I was looking for.

headline: Getting Started
reviewBody:
For some time now I've been wanting to do something different with my life, having looked at the path I wanted to take I know that I needed to obtain a qualification. 

ICS were very helpful all the way through the sign up process, took the time and patience to answer all my questions and guide me to the the right course.

Thanks to both Ciaran and Paul for helping me make what I believe was the right choice. 

Gary.

headline: Highly recommend.
reviewBody: After thinking long and hard about changing my career and enrolling on a course, I contacted ICS Learn. Nicola dealt with me personally and she was very efficient with my enquiries. Nicola explained the course thoroughly and was in contact with me during and after the process of signing up. I have confidence in ICS Learn and would recommend to people in the future.

headline: Wonderful!
reviewBody: Enrolling has never been so easy! I am thrilled with how easy the whole process has been and Margaret was an absolute pleasure to speak to regarding my questions and queries.I did not feel pressured or rushed and i am looking forward to re sitting my GCSES. Margaret is very much a credit to your team :-)

headline: Excellent Customer Service
reviewBody:
Very friendly service, would definitely recommend to others.
Feel very relaxed about starting my course now.

headline: Nicolas was very helpful
reviewBody: Nicolas was very helpful with her explanation of the course I intend to complete.

headline: Couldn't be more helpful
reviewBody: Used the online chat service and called up to book and the advisor Nicola, was fantastic. Answered all my questions and made the process quick and easy.

headline: Friendly service
reviewBody: Extremely informative and friendly service by Michelle Kerr who took the time to answer all my questions in great detail.

headline: Good sevice
reviewBody: Good service over the telephone and emails and plenty of information

headline: friendly and informative
reviewBody: Easy to talk to and well informed briefing. Explained the various benefits of ICS Learning

headline: Good customer service represents a great company
reviewBody: Cherrfull and fantastic patientce given. Also quick and to the point with no time wasting.

headline: It was a wonderful experience
reviewBody:
Paul Martin responded quickly to all queries with precision and he provided me with practical solutions.
Furthermore, every steps are clearly detailed by mails and I feel very excited to start discovering the modules.

headline: Very happy
reviewBody: I wasn't sure what course would be most appropriate and when to sign up for it.  My advisor, Paul, was very helpful with information and also, extremely helpful with the financial side of things, making sure my payments were set up to what I can afford.  The emails came through straight away giving me a chance to look at all the course details.

headline: Extremely efficient set up.
reviewBody:
I have enrolled onto two A levels courses. I found the whole enrolment process very informative, efficient, great value and all achieved in quick time. 

Thank you. 
Gavin Fox

headline: Fantastic Service
reviewBody: The lady Margaret Duffy who helped me take on this course was fantastic. She helped me through the process and explained everything to me in great detail. So glad I got to deal with a lovely person. Thank yo.

headline: Fantastic service!
reviewBody: Fraser was absolutely fantastic! He explained everything in detail and was very polite and understanding at all times. He worked around my busy schedule in order to get in touch and explain everything. It makes a world of difference to speak to a person like that instead of hearing continuous sales talk. He took time to actually listen and understand what our needs were. A huge thank you and keep up the good work!!!

headline: Brilliant service!
reviewBody: My experience with ics has been great from me registering my initial interest to me booking the AAT course. Nicola my advisor was very helpful and answered any questions I had brilliantly! I would definitely recommend the service to anyone else looking to make a career change!

headline: Great, easy service
reviewBody: ICS were extremely informative regarding my chosen course and the fees / payment options. My Advisor was very helpful and kept on regular contact whilst I was making the final decision without being pushy. Really great and flexible service. I would highly recommend!

headline: Brilliant
reviewBody:
Fraser,
 Who i have been speaking too dealing with my maths has been brilliant. Very helpful and efficient!

Thankyou! For making this a stress easy task for me!

headline: excellent service
reviewBody: I recently signed up to start my course. Nicola was extremely helpful, and I cant wait to get started.

headline: Brilliant service
reviewBody: I recently joined with the company and couldn't be more happy with the way they handled my question Margaret was just calm and had answers that I needed thank you

headline: Responsive service
reviewBody: I have been in the midst of the CIPD qualification with ICS learn for about 8 months now and have found that their service is very responsive. There is a responsibility on the learner to ensure that they work through things themselves, but any queries are usually quickly and efficiently sorted out.

headline: very helpful.
reviewBody: felt convinced the course was as it was described. I look forward to doing the units with confidence.

headline: my new start to education
reviewBody: I was very unsure about applying for this course but Fraser was very friendly and helpful and at no time did I feel like he was trying to pressure me into it. He went over everything and regularly told me I could contact him by mobile, phone or e-mail if I had any further questions.

headline: Quick and correct service
reviewBody:
I decided to gain IGCSE English to support my future plans. Mr Cameron
as a personal advisor sent me all relevant information regarding the course and payment options. He was helpful and responsive all way long.   I consulted with my pillow and next day he enrolled me to the course. All this needed a 10 minutes phone call to start.

headline: Great advice from a friendly advisor
reviewBody:
After weighing up courses offered by both the AAT and ICB, my course Advisor, Sammy Boyle, provided me with some great information and advice regarding both the AAT Level 2 Bookkeeping and AAT Level 2 Accounting courses, helping me choose the correct course for my needs.

Sammy was really friendly, answered a ton of my questions and took care of setting up my account and getting me on my way to study accounting!

headline: Professional, articulate and polite.
reviewBody:
Fraser's 'phone call to me this morning was well conducted. He could tell from my voice that I had just woken up and apologised (even though it was 12 noon) and offered to ring back another time. 

He explained how the course is delivered and what to expect. His accent was Scottish but easily understood and he was pleasant to talk to. 

If only all call centre phone calls were this clear and easily understood - he should be teaching others how to do it :-)

headline: very pleased with booking my course
reviewBody: very polite and helpful on the phone, answered all the questions I had, made it very easy, and felt welcomed to ICS learn.

headline: Extremely helpful and informative
reviewBody:
After searching through lots of different courses online to try and ensure I picked the right one I'm so glad I made contact with Philip.
From the start he was informative and responsive but not pushy at all which sometimes makes all the difference as it is important to feel comfortable with a final decision.
The information he gave in response to my questions were very useful and reassuring at the same time. He understood that I couldn't jump into this without spending time working out finances and talking it over with my family to make sure this is something I could do and would result in the qualifications I wanted.
Nothing was too much trouble and he fitted in around my work schedule which at times was very hectic.
The course I am extremely excited about but I'm pleased that I had Philip talking me through as sometimes when you buy into a person who is reassuring and genuine it helps confirm your own ambitions and decisions.
Excited to start and pleased about my initial experience and decision making process! Thank you so much!

headline: CIPD Intermediate Diploma in HRM
reviewBody: Ciaran was very knowledgable and helpful when I was making my decision as to what provider to go with.

headline: Excellent workshops
reviewBody: Just attended my second ICS Learn workshop, and I must congratulate them on the standard of their tutors.  On both occasions they have not only been extremely knowledgeable, but have made the workshops fun as well as informative.  Thanks!

headline: ICS 3DEL Workshop with Dr Stephen Littler
reviewBody: ICS Learn has fantastic tutors who deliver great learning , I have now completed three separate workshops in London , with three different tutors and anyone thinking of studying with ICS will not be disappointed with materials , support and the overall learning experience.

headline: Brilliant!
reviewBody: Great workshop and tutor. Stephen made the learning fun and covered all question and queries regarding our studies.  Thoroughly enjoyed the training.

headline: New student
reviewBody: I was very impressed and felt at ease when speaking with Maggie. I can't wait to get stuck in to the course and broaden my knowledge on the subject

headline: Excellent support from the first minute of commencing the course
reviewBody:
I've just started my second course with the ICS. Used an online chat option to enquire about the course. It took about 10minutes to register and get the ball rolling! Michelle was super efficient and helpful.
I've received my enrolment confirmation less than 24 hours after my first contact and I'm all ready to start my studies.
Fantastic customer service, thank you!

headline: Very helpful.
reviewBody: So far it has been very straightforward which is wonderful for me. The tutors are very involved, and are quick with contacting you and helping you to understand what you are doing and the course you're on, and how everything works. I'd recommend ICS to many people, especially those not comfortable going to college or university.

headline: Excellent efficient service was really simple to get started .
reviewBody:
I was very impressed with the service I received From ICS. I went onto the website and was connected straight away to an adviser. Phillip then answere all my questions and followed up with an e mail. The enrolment process was simple and straightforward and I am looking forward to getting started on my course.  
I live abroad so it was an ideal solution for me to be able to do this course online.

headline: Great introduction
reviewBody: I've just enrolled onto an ICS Course to do a diploma in HR. Ive had lots of questions and have been unsure which course to do but Paul had been superb. Not pushy at all. He was very patient and helpful and has me excited to start the course! Thanks Paul

headline: Very friendly
reviewBody: Friendly quick and easy process!

headline: Excellent
reviewBody: I felt reassured that I had chosen the right course and establishment for me to do the course in. I was overall satisfied with the call and Fraser helped clear any doubts I had and made sure that the enrollment process was smooth and stress free which I greatly appreaciated. Thanks

headline: 3DLA Workshop
reviewBody: By far the best Tutor, it was the workshop were I felt more engaged and I wasn't very interested in the subject, but his performance make the diference.

headline: Ciaran support

Very friendly, professional and helpful.

reviewBody: My favourite distant learning organisation and so priced. Professional and deliver what they promise. My fourth course with ICS.

headline: Excellent
reviewBody: So far I the team at ICS have been fantastic and enrolling for the course has been simple, I am only at the early stages and currently have not started my course but if it is anything like the service I am sure it will be a smooth and happy process.

headline: Great service
reviewBody: Everything was straight forward and easy to understand / follow. I had a few delays my end which they were very patient with, it also helped having the same contact through the sign up process that I could direct any queries to. Overall it was a great service which I would recommend to others.

headline: Excellent service
reviewBody: Finding out about the course was painless, concise and efficient.  All of my questions were clearly and quickly responded to; which provides me with great comfort that I will receive a consistently high quality of service to assist me with my studies.

headline: ICS Experience
reviewBody:
I researched a number of online learning providers for the AAT Accountancy courses and found ICS Learn to be the most user friendly. I really liked the slick, professional web design. 

I received an excellent, warm and friendly service from Sammy Boyle who discussed my chose course with me. I was given all the information I needed and didn't feel under any pressure to commit until I had made up my mind. 

Very happy with the service.

headline: Strategic
reviewBody:
Great workshop, very useful and applicable to many aspect of our roles. Great teaching and involvement by Stephen.

5 stars missed just for the aircon!

headline: Excellent enrolment service
reviewBody: Excellent service from first point of contact up and through to enrolment received by Ciaran. All my questions were clarified in a very polite and professional manner. Thank you!

headline: Extremely satisfied
reviewBody: My main contact was Paul and since the time I expressed my interest to take the CIPD level 7 HRD, he displayed a high level of professionalism and customer service. During the process, I felt that he did not want me to make a decision without knowing what I needed to know. He was patient, knowledgeable, reassuring and replied fast and very clearly to all my questions (and I had so many) .  The enrollment process was over the phone and shortly after, I received the confirmation email and access information to the learning platform. I would definitely recommend to friends.  The service was fantastic, I am really pleased.  Madou

headline: Great treatment
reviewBody: I am very happy with Michelle, how she has been helpful, flexible and patience to answer all my questions,

headline: excellent
reviewBody: nice communications all clear information about my course, Very motivated! thanks for the nice job.

headline: An excellent introduction to the course
reviewBody: Paul provided a professional and friendly introduction to the course and gave me a great snapshot overview of what the course offers and what I can expect moving forward.  As a first point of contact, Paul gave me absolute confidence in using ICS as my educational provider and the support structure that will be provided.

headline: Quick and Friendly Enrolment
reviewBody:
When I submitted my interest Paul at ICS contacted me via email and sent over some useful information and he arranged a convenient time to call me, which fitted in with my busy days at work. During the call he went through the format and style of the ICS CIPD and clearly explained the details without trying to sell the course through pushy tactics. 

Paul was efficient, professional and friendly and gave perfect customer service. I am now enrolled on my course with access to the resources within a few hours of the call.

headline: Initial Contact
reviewBody: Great interaction with the course advisor, answered all my questions in a non pushy way. Gave me time to consider options without hassling me.

headline: Excellent Service
reviewBody: I was unsure which course was the right option for. The advisor I dealt with was fantastic. As I currently work shifts our main correspondence was through email. Any question I had was answered really quickly and also really detailed. From start to finish the whole process was extremely smooth.

headline: Margaret - IGCSE Science
reviewBody: Very clear and to the point, made me feel comfortable and I look forward to start the course!

headline: Excellent
reviewBody:
Great communication, replied to aal emails, always happy to help, was able to answer all my questions and support me to enroll on my chosen course.
Amazing Service, pleasure to talk to.

Many Thanks
Jen

headline: Poor communication, absolutely ridiculous
reviewBody:
I started A-level English language with this company and immediately asked to change tutors as my first one was quite rude, my second tutor however was lovely and made a lot of effort although feedback was incredibly poor and not informative at all.
I was given the incorrect dates for my coursework deadline repeatedly and never received a response as to why this happened.
Finally, and the reason I have written this review, is 4 days before my final exam, I was told that my tutor was on holiday, I never received notice about this and as a result have no idea about my predicted grade. Finally upon calling them I was told my tutor was on holiday, but this was all too late, as they had prematurely cut me off from all my resources, online access and tutor the day before my exam. I have also not received a response as to why this happened, or attempt to fix this from the company, nor an apology.
As a result I am terrified about my A-levels and my chances of getting into my choice of uni are slim. 
I strongly advise against using this company if you want a calm learning environment and a stress free exam period.

headline: Great service!
reviewBody: Fraser has been very kind, helpful and professional. He gave me all the information I needed and I am happy to collaborate with you after this conversation. Thank you

headline: Very good
reviewBody: Very helpful and motivational thank you!

headline: Mathmatics GCSE
reviewBody: i have just finished the last exam for mathmatics B.. i used a combination of materials, starting with mellisa's webinars and then using the follow up material she suggested... as a 41 year old that is new to studying, i found the webinars extremely helpful!!!! she explained each subject well and then i was able to continue that with books as i then had an understanding of each subject.. i think i did pretty well on the exams, ill be expecting a B or possibly an A... there is no way i could have got this far without the webinars..... i also did a business studies GCSE with ics, and i found this so much different, as i didnt have the techniques explained as can be done in the webinar, i found i didnt really know how to get started, and although i could read and understand it, i didnt really know what to expect in the exams or how to structure my answers... i think considering these webinars for other subjects would be great for students loke myself... the 4 stars are for the maths, the one missing is for the business studies!!!

headline: Very friendly polite and knowledgeable
reviewBody: Fast response time, fastest I've experienced! Very pleased with the service I have recieved today, thank you Fraser

headline: Review of registration process
reviewBody: The whole registration process has been wet straight forward and has made it stress free. Samantha Boyle was great at explaining everything and was very friendly and helpful.

headline: Review Of ICS - 5 stars
reviewBody: Paul was extremely helpful and explained everything I needed to know clearly. He is friendly and accommodating. I would definitely recommend to a friend

headline: Efficient and friendly advice/service
reviewBody: Spoke to the advisor who methodically answered my queries. Resulted in myself and friend enrolling. Would recommend.

headline: Better than I expected
reviewBody:
The webinar helped to explain areas that I thought I would have to discover for myself such as how to access the journals, the suggestion that I used my phone camera to capture the screen shots was brilliant ( why I did not think of this myself , I do not know!!). This enabled me to listen more to the content instead of making notes.
The friendly approach of the speaker came across as authentic and interested in the individual students , this is reassuring because it makes the likelihood of me approaching the tutors for assistance with confidence.
I feel enthusiastic about the course more so than when I agreed to undertake it, the hour flew by with no boring bits , no unnecessary repetition . It was informative and reassuring that ICS will deliver support as required, Thank you

headline: Outstanding service!
reviewBody:
Excellent customers service and I found Anne Marie very knowledgeable and supportive and reassuring in answering all my questions in a limited period of time and I appreciate this!
I would recommend ICS to others and hope that they also get the same experience that I have received and I hope that the rest of the course equals to the service that I have already received.

Many thanks Anne Marie,
Regards

headline: Outstanding!
reviewBody: I went on the ICS website and was helped by Anne Marie with some questions about the course via the live chat. After clearing up a few questions she then called me and managed to have me signed up in no time. The service was fantastic, quick and extremely helpful!

headline: Excellent service - nothing too much trouble
reviewBody: I was signed up for ICS by Anne Marie, who was prompt to reply to my initial query, very helpful, and got everything set up for me to start studying in no time at all.  Couldn't be happier with the service I received!

headline: Excellent Learning Advisor
reviewBody:
Have to congratulate ICS Learn on the service Paul provided. Really helpful and informative with no pressure at all. 

Very supportive and very easy to deal with, thankyou.

headline: Excellent service
reviewBody: Thank you Margaret for all your help, and being super patient! Cant wait to start my courses..

headline: Stephen Littler
reviewBody: Stephen ran a fantastic induction class, extremely informative -he had to deal with a whole host of IT issues but dealt with them professionally, wasnt fazed at all and did a great job! Thankyou Stephen!

reviewBody: proffesional, freiendy approach, clear advice

headline: Ciaran McEachen is a credit to your company
reviewBody: Ciaran McEachen has answered all of my questions and reassured all of my concerns. Outstanding communication skills and very helpful throughout

headline: Gret introduction to my course

reviewBody: I was assisted by Fraser who readily answered my questions regarding enrolment, taking the exams and payment. He was very patient and took time to explain the enrollment procedure and what to expect once I'd enrolled into my selected course.
