reviewBody: Melissa is the best maths teacher ever!  don't know what I'd have done without her webinars. Thank you, Melissa:) Hope to see you at A level too:)

headline: No Reservations
reviewBody:
After researching many different courses and looking at a vast array of websites, I found ICS Learn to be the easiest to read and understand. Everything was very straight forward, the price competitive and the enrolment a breeze.
It's only day 1 but from all the material I have received already , I am confident that I will be supported throughout my time studying.

headline: REALLY HELPFUL AND KIND
reviewBody:
I have just signed up with ICS for the AAT Bookkeeping course.  

During the initial set up, the Course Advisor, Anne Marie has been lovely and very helpful with nothing too much trouble for her.  

I look forward to hearing from my tutor.

headline: Excellent start to the course.
reviewBody: Anne-Marie was very informative and friendly. I felt very comfortable with my decision to book my course with ICS as the initial process was so smooth and all my questions were answered assuredly. I'm confident the rest of my experience will continue to this high level of service and support.

headline: Very helpful :)
reviewBody:
Anne Marie my course advisor was very helpful when myself and my colleague called regarding the AAT course. She gave us all of the information we asked for and more! 

Thank you :)

headline: Feed back
reviewBody:
Michelle was very helpful and I didn't feel any pressure to enrol in this course like another company I made contact with.
All of my questions were answered very quickly and was made to feel at ease.

headline: Intelligent , knowledgable  and confident Advisor
reviewBody: Excellent person centred approach , very knowledgeable unlike previous providers who lose their nerve when I interrupt their scripted information reel....  Very detailed knowledge about the new GCSE examination system and I was given some excellent advice regarding my study plan.

headline: HR Management
reviewBody:
Gained realistic advice via the phone and followed up with email details.
Thank you for supporting my decision to enrol for the CIPD.

headline: Online classrooms and resources
reviewBody:
An increase in the number of online classrooms that are repeated and made available to learners at a later date is helping to build familiarity with the course and the requirements of the study. 

A range of tutors and frequent contact brings a feeling of support and knowledge that there are people to help you at any stage of the process.

A broad range of resources are referenced and recommended meaning there's something for everyone.

headline: Online Classrooms with Live Discussions
reviewBody: It was really useful to be able to complement the online learning with a live online class where we could ask questions and receive guidance about potential sources of information, assessment requirements, etc. The tutor was really friendly and explained everything clearly.

headline: The moodle layout is hard to follow
reviewBody:
The latest web interface we use is not very user-friendly:
- a lot of scrolling is required to get to the page you need, even with the menu on the left-hand side,
- forums need more social interactions (upvoting,  liking, editing, etc.)
- messaging is not intuitive at all, instead it's a forum function
- the structure of the resources is not clear and organised, and the tiles of some pages can be very confusing
- Online classroom should be brought outside the actual module and kept separately.

Also, I would appreciate if feedback on the activities can be done faster. Those keep me in check and waiting for over 2 months I don't really know in which direction to go with my next activities.

Thank you.

headline: Enrolling with ICS Learn
reviewBody: I viewed the ICS Learn website and was pleased that everything was laid out in an easy to follow set up.  I made my initially enquiry and was contacted by email within minutes by Paul Martin detailing further information about the course I initially enquired about.  I went back with some questions and again received a rapid response providing guidance on a course perhaps more suited (Diploma not certificate).  Following clearance from my company to go ahead, I called and spoke to Paul's colleague Michelle (surname unknown) who was equally helpful and was able to get me enrolled, along with providing further details about the next steps.  I can't wait to get started and find it really refreshing to have received such good service.  Well done,

headline: Good Service
reviewBody: My contact Michelle was able to provide answers to all of my questions and additional supporting information in a timely manner.  She understood it is a large investment and allowed me time to consider the best options and helped me get set up with the payment plan.

headline: Really enjoyed induction webinar tonight, very informative and positive
reviewBody: Had a great induction webinar, helped me focus to get started with this course

headline: Excellent service
reviewBody: Once I'd made my first enquiry, I heard back almost immediately. The advisor who contacted me was very helpful and gave me all of the information I needed to know. She was very quick to respond and helped me to make a quick decision. More than happy with the experience!

headline: Anne Marie - great experience
reviewBody: I have recently booked myself on to a CIM level 4 course in digital marketing. Anne Marie was the lady who picked up my enquiry and was friendly and helpful from start to finish. Not to mention she was patient and never pushy when waiting for me to book myself on to the course (it took me a month or so to get my deposit in place).  I got all the information I needed promptly both at enquiry and sign up stage. Absolutely fab experience - I would highly recommend you deal with Anne if you are trying to decide on a course with ICS.

headline: Straightforward
reviewBody: Enrolling with ICS learn took less than half an hour out of my day, but was by no means rushed. I'm very happy with the informtation Maggie gave me and the way she explained how things are going to pan out. I can hardly wait to start studying and improve my skills through a range of diverse topics and texts. Here's to the future!

headline: UNDERSTANDABLE AND QUICK
reviewBody: Good, professional approach, easy to get enrolled, you get full answers to all your questions.

headline: ICS Learn CIPD induction webinar
reviewBody:
Truly enjoyed the induction webinar with Stephen Littler.  Very useful and informative. Highly recommended.

Thank you, Stephen!

Regards,
Sona

headline: Honest, Professional and extremely Helpful.
reviewBody: I have been spending the last couple of weeks mulling over different providers for AAT Courses online. I have found the experience daunting and unfortunately very confusing... this was until contacting ICS Learn. I have been dealing with Samantha Boyle she has been extremely helpful, patient and professional whilst assisting me with making my decision. Other providers I have contacted have been more interested in telling me why I shouldn't join other colleges rather than helping me decide what path to take by providing me with information on the support etc that they provide. Samantha was different, she didn't once try to put me off of other colleges, she didn't even mention them, she was more interested in helping me as a person to decide on the best pathway to take. She has been extremely thorough, helpful and understanding. The college have also provided me with a payment option to make my studies the main priority rather than the cost. Only other thing to say is thank you as a whole however more importantly thank you to Samantha, for being so helpful and resilient to my numerous questions and phone calls.

headline: Excellent
reviewBody:
Great communication and very clear explanation of what's involved in my chosen course and the costs I can expect to pay.
Will definately use ICS for the next course.

headline: Excellent support team.
reviewBody: I spoke with Maggie who dealt efficiently with my enquiry.  Very friendly  and supportive.  Many Thanks for your help, most appreciated.

headline: Excellent
reviewBody: Perfect in everywhere

headline: So far so good!
reviewBody: Very useful and informative induction webinar with Stephen Littler this evening.... ready to get started!  Thank you.

headline: Enrolment experience
reviewBody:
My whole experience of enrolling on the CIPD foundation Diploma has been positive and easy.
Great information sent out by Ciaran and after enrollment, all information was sent out very quickly.
I am looking forward to getting started.

headline: ICS Learn offers a professional service conjoined with value for money!
reviewBody: Great value for money. A professional service with a friendly informative individual at the other end of the phone.  Fraser put my mind at ease and answered all the questions I threw at him. Course content is substantial but easy to follow and actually enjoyable! Will definitely enrol with ICS Learn without hesitation in the near future, and have already recommended ICS Learn to my daughter!

headline: Really Great
reviewBody: I was looking to do my CIPD course and emailed the information line.  I got a response from Ciaran who was really friendly, helpful and professional.  I was nervous about doing the course but was instantly put at ease. I would highly recommend this provider.

headline: Very helpful!
reviewBody: The webinars were definitely helpful for someone like me who hasn't been doing 'school maths' for more than 20 years! Sometimes I had to get extra help for certain subjects because my brain wouldn't get too flexible but overall it was an excellent experience.

headline: new beginner
reviewBody: so far ive been impressed with the service, im just waiting for the link to start the service and studying with ics.

headline: ICS Learn workshop in London with Stephen
reviewBody:
Thank you Stephen for making the workshop interesting and informative.  There was a good mix of discussion, activities and listening to other presentations. It was also fun and enjoyable.

I enjoyed the tips and preparations for the assignment that follows.

Thanks for a good weekend learning.

Michael

headline: New student enquiry
reviewBody:
I rang to obtain further information on a couple of courses that my newly home educated daughter was interested in. It was an absolute pleasure to speak with Maggie. She was extremely helpful, giving very detailed information about the courses and the exam process. Her approach made me feel we were making the right decision to book the courses in the knowledge that support will be available at all times. Maggie is a credit to your company and I was delighted to speak with her.
 Lindsay Muir

headline: Registering FOR ATT course
reviewBody: Very simple procedure and the advisor had all the information at her finger tips.

headline: Couldn't fault the service!
reviewBody: Ciaran McEachen was brilliant; from offering me advice on which level course to choose, right up to my enrolment. I would thoroughly recommend ICS Learn.

headline: Fantastic
reviewBody: Fantastic! Realy enjoyed speaking with Fraser today. Really pleased with ICS.

headline: Welcome Webinar
reviewBody: Completed this with Dr Stephen Littler and found this really beneficial, covering all the questions I had and great to speak with fellow students sharing the same concerns. An absolute must watch to set you up well for studying.

headline: webinar - stephen littler
reviewBody: Great Webinar.  Having never done one before was very nervous about what it was about.  Stephen great sense of humour and made an hour pass very quickly with lots of reassuring information

headline: Welcome Webinar
reviewBody: Stephen made the webinar very welcoming and interesting. The information was extremely useful. Will be watching more of the webinars and online classes available.

headline: Very helpful
reviewBody: Nicola was helpful and knowledgeable. She answered all my questions and was always available to help.

headline: Quick and easy
reviewBody: Got all the information I needed within a day, Nicola was really helpful and friendly and it was so easy to get in touch when needed and to make all the necessary arrangements to start my course. It's great that ICS also offer monthly payments to make things affordable.

headline: Fantastic
reviewBody:
I have had nothing but helpful and friendly advice from the advisers. They  have been very patient with me through my decision process. I have never felt pressured to apply to learn with them.
The sign up process was very quick, easy and simple and Maggie was a very big help!
Emailing to and from was very quick and easy and I never had to wait long for a reply to any of my questions!
Very happy with the service I have received from ICS Learn!

headline: Great to deal with
reviewBody: From initial enquiry through enrolment to induction ICS Learn have been great to deal with.  Ciaran was efficient, helpful and realistic.  There was no pushy sales or trying to persuade me into doing something that didn't suit just plain, honest advice.  Ciaran listened to what I was interested in and provided a solution.  Made the whole process as stress free as possible.  Upon enrolment everything was set up really quickly with easy instructions on how to use the training materials, next steps etc.  Would definitely recommend.

headline: Quick, thorough and easy service
reviewBody: The information provided was clear, and Anne Marie was very helpful. The outline I was sent of the course was very detailed, so I didn't have many questions as they were already answered.

headline: Very great and pleasent
reviewBody: Nice. The transaction went very fast and swift.

headline: Just what the Doctor ordered :P
reviewBody:
Just took part in a CIPD Welcome Webinar and so far I'm really happy with my choice to study through ICS. 

Dr Littler was welcoming, engaging and informative. I really liked the structure of the broadcast, which answered a lot of my initial questions and cleared up some of the confusion I had. The content was delivered at a good pace, and with a sense of humour that made it really easy to stay focused and interested. 

The system being used for the webinars is great too! It feels less like distance learning and more like being in a room with other students. The ability to interact with everyone removes any feeling of isolation, and it's reassuring when you see other people have the same questions you do!

Really looking forward to getting stuck in and making the most of this course.

headline: Margaret is so courteous and helpful
reviewBody: Just booked an A Level Mathematics course with Margaret. She is so helpful; very open and encouraging as I begin to embark on my course. Do not hesitate to ask her any questions! Thanks, Abigail

headline: Melissa is the best maths teacher i've ever had!
reviewBody:
Melissa is a guru! Very clear teaching, always engaging, doesn't rush difficult topics, has always been willing to answer my calls when I've got a query or quick to respond to my email questions. Her answers to my emails are always very thorough, usually with several links to additional videos etc.
However much she gets paid, she deserves a pay rise!

headline: CIPD On-Boarding Welcome Webinar
reviewBody: Excellent webinar, stephen was very informative. I now know what I need to do and how I need to do it, as I was quite confused just looking at the web pages. Stephen made everything much easier to understand for the course. Thank You!.

headline: Maths GCSE with Melissa Lieberman
reviewBody: I would just like to say a big THANK YOU to Melissa for the maths webinar sessions. I know I would've found the lessons more difficult without them. The lessons were informative, structured and constructive. The sessions have made re-learning Maths a joy. I only wish ICS Learn had more subjects with webinar lessons as I am looking to take 2 subjects at A level next year.

headline: Very helpful!
reviewBody:
I enrolled on my A Level course today. The chap who enrolled me (Fraser) was very helpful and knowledgeable. He answered all my questions and sent me a list of the examination centres closest to me so I could decide for myself which one will be best for me when the time comes!

I haven't started my course yet so I can't review how good the materials are but the advisors are very helpful and encouraging. There are no sales talks and no pressure tactics. So far, very impressed.

headline: Brilliant Service!
reviewBody: Brilliant service from Nicola,  every question was answered and helped me make a discussion with the course I wanted to do. Can't wait to start!

headline: Fast, Easy and Polite
reviewBody: Can't fault them. Anne - Marie called me and guided me through the registration process. They were never pushy with sales, just advising me throughout. Very polite and cheery, made me feel comfortable with the choices I made.

headline: Excellent support for your studies
reviewBody: it is difficult to study alone at home but ICS Learn provide great online classes and webinars which help you to feel supported and part of a community. The tutors and mentor are always so helpful and give excellent constructive feedback.

headline: Incredible
reviewBody: Incredibly quick and excellent customer service!

headline: Enrollment
reviewBody: John Orr has been fantastic and patient with me following my initial inquiry some months ago. He has kept me in the loop of offers, via email without bombarding me. When I did make the decision to enrol, he was nothing but helpful. I am hoping my learning experience with ICS is the same as the service I have received from John.

headline: Really helpful, great service!
reviewBody: I had enquired about a course with a different provider but had no luck getting exactly what I was looking for. After enquiring with ICS Learn, I immediately had all the information I wanted sent to me and any questions I had were answered quickly. I would fully recommend them to anyone wanting to do one of their courses. Also, unlike other providers, the course is all online so I didn't have to worry about it not working on Mac OSX. As long as you have a web browser, it works!

headline: Efficient Registration
reviewBody:
Paul Martin - CIPD Advisor was very helpful!  I was given all the necessary course information to enable me to make a prompt decision to enrol on the level 5 course.

Very efficient - thank you.

Raj

headline: Bad course content = debt collectors?!
reviewBody:
I wanted to reake my GCSEs in Maths and Biology so did quite a bit of research into how to go about this. I stumbled on ICS online, read the trust pilot reviews and decided to go with them. The man on the phone reassured me I would have CONSTANT contact with tutors, the website would be easy to use and the content very broad. Within a month I reaised this was not the case. The biology content was literally less than half a ring binder full of badly written basic info that I could have googled in an instant. The BBC BITESIZE content was better than what I was paying hundreds of pounds for. I raised my concerns with ICS and they fobbed my off saying the tutors were there to help and if I wished to cancel I would have to pay £100 cancellation fees?! I instantly cancelled my direct debits. How is this company in ANY WAY here to help academics further their learning. THEN came the debt collector letters. Again I write to ICS and they tell me its a standard letter for people who have fallen behind with their payments and again give me no further help but say someone has been trying to call me (no one had tried to call me!?)
Now I am being hounded by a debt collection agency called THE ZINC GROUP who have added fees on and are sending me threatening letters about recovery. This was all because I tried to better myself and my studies. 
I have NEVER once signed any agreement with ICS learn and demand a FULL REFUND of any monies paid to them by myself. Absolute fraudsters who take advantage of young, willing people and are not a company who should be handling any kind of academic material.

headline: Excellent
reviewBody: Helpful, accredited and professional

headline: Decent in the beginning then major issues
reviewBody:
Started an A level course and it was great at the beginning. Tried to leave after a few months due to a family death as well as other issues going on in the family and I wasn't able to. Contacted student support via phone and email and got no help or support. 

Rang up a week ago to try again even though I had one more payment left and the payment to leave was more expensive. They also told they had no evidence of me ringing 6 times and still haven't replied to me about me contacting them via email. 

Extremely upset with the service. Lost a lot of money due to this.

Planning to do another a level and I'll be doing it elsewhere because I cannot deal with that again.

headline: Excellent
reviewBody: The GCSE Mathematics course taught by Melissa Lieberman is absolutely fantastic and such a great way for potential older learners to pick up where they left off after leaving school if they did not get the grades they wanted. Would recommend this to anyone old and young though as she is talented at teaching all age groups as I experienced within the webinars. Thank you Melissa :)

headline: Brilliant Service
reviewBody: You won't be disappointed. You'll get all the support you need. The course advisor for the GCSE maths was brilliant.

headline: Fantastic in every way!
reviewBody: The man I spoke to on the phone was both extremely helpful and understanding of my needs with ICS learn. He guided me on making the right choices in the 4 GCSE and 2 A levels I have chosen for my following career choice. I felt no judgement whatsoever and am genuinely happy with both the courses I am doing and the company in which I will be doing them with.

headline: Superb service
reviewBody: Paul has been fantastic to deal with. He has spent lots of time answering my questions and has really helped me with my decision making process. Nothing has been to much trouble and I have been really impressed. Thank you

best wish

I would recommend ICS to anyone interested in bettering their education and have already recommended this organization to many others.

reviewBody: The guy I spoke to, Fraser, was very informative and supportive. He answered all of my queries and was easy to chat to about the course. I'm looking forward to starting the iGCSE.

Really enjoyed this work-shop, Stephen was a great tutor with lots of knowledge and made the weekend a fun learning experience. 
Great videos shared throughout the weekend as well. 
:)

headline: Very  Good

headline: ICS are a fantastic provider!
reviewBody: Never had any issues with ICS, from the start they have been wonderful. They offer flexible payment terms, which were clearly laid out to me in the beginning. Their website is easy to use and the tutors are on hand if you need them. If you are more of an independent learner, they do not pester you in any way unless you want them to. Only thing that should probably be made clear in the beginning is you should book workshops WAY in advance and plan your studies around it as they fill up! Stephen is one of the greatest tutors, he preps before workshops which is awesome and has always given great constructive feedback on workshops and assignments.

headline: Introduction
reviewBody: Maggie was very helpful in taking through the initial process.

headline: Great Start
reviewBody: I have recently enrolled on a course with ICS and found this process to be quick and simple. Anne-Marie was of great assistance in getting this set-up and I very much look forward to getting started with the course.

headline: Workshops are beneficial for getting the 'bigger picture' in the HR business
reviewBody: Knowledgeable, engaging and fun tutors help to make an enjoyable workshop experience - but the opportunity to network and pick-up different ideas and perspectives from other attendees is invaluable too, especially in helping to see the bigger picture of how HR really works in business, and what improvements could be made!

headline: great experience
reviewBody: Kept in close contact with Ciaran one of the advisors. Never felt too under pressure to sign up!

headline: Where to start!
reviewBody:
Having just been made redundant from a 22 year career I wanted to boost my CV by studying CIPD. I had no clue which level to start and how I went about getting the advice. ICS Learn helped me with this, there was no pushing selling tactics and the advisor I spoke with was very knowledgeable and helpful making my decisions much easier.

I would use ICS again and recommend them to anyone else.

headline: Surprising
reviewBody: I have just enrolled. I found my advisor persistent and very helpful. The course price is a lot of money and must be entered into with all the information and confidence. My advisor gave me time and contacted me at times most convenient to my schedule and well here we are enrolled and eager to start and hoping the tutor and ICS support are as good as my advisor was.

reviewBody: I have only just registered on the AAT course but ICS have been excellent in setting things up for me, they have been very professional to deal with, gave me all the info I needed without having to be asked and did everything I asked as and when requested. I've only just started out but so far, very impressed with ICS. V

headline: Friendly, helpful

This has put my mind at ease and I now feel  I can approach  him with anything I don't understand throughout the course.
Very helpful introduction.

I found my experience with ICS to be concise, personable and thorough. Thanks again Ciaran.

headline: Great advice and very helpful

reviewBody: Just started my course with ICS learn and have found their communications to be excellent. I particularly appreciate the times that they do their live webinars as you can easily fit them in around your working life, for example we just had one on at 7.30pm on Good Friday!! headline: Welcome Webinar
reviewBody: Stephen Littler gave up his Good Friday evening to carry out a welcome webinar.  Very helpful person and look forward to learning with him and ICS.

headline: great start
reviewBody: Really looking forward to starting my accountancy course.. Interest free payment plan.. Great help and support

reviewBody: From initial query, an easy to navigate website, initial contact with my advisor (Nicola) was quick and easy and made the whole signing up process stress-free and positive.

headline: Fantastic
reviewBody: An extremely efficient friendly advisor. Would definitely recommend.

headline: The Service was brilliant
reviewBody:
I spoke to Samantha initially as I was considering signing up to study AAT Accounting. And thanks to the excellent service I received from her I am now fully enrolled on this course. 

She made the process very easy for me, and her customer service was faultless. I hope this girl gets the recognition she deserves.

headline: Motivational & very helpful induction webinar with Stephen
reviewBody:
Just had a superb induction webinar with Dr Stephen Littler, who gave up his Good Friday evening to inspire about 7 of us embarking on the next stages in our CIPD qualification journey.  Personally, I'm about to do Level 7 Adv. Dip in HRM, having recently achieved the Level 5 and I wish I'd had this webinar at the start of my previous course.  
You really get the feeling with Stephen that he loves his job, he's there for each and every student and he wants you to achieve and be successful.
Thank you, Stephen and a very Happy Easter to you!

headline: Good service
reviewBody: Colin was very polite and the service seemed very straightforward.

headline: Helpful and Professional
reviewBody: Nicola made the whole process of choosing the right course and enrolment very easy. Friendly and informative customer care throughout. Prompt response to all queries with knowledgable advice.

headline: Helpful advisor
reviewBody: Michelle (course advisor) has been very helpful with gettong me set up on my course, i cannot wait to get it started :)

headline: Very friendly and knowledgeable staff is a perfect combination
reviewBody:
I wanted to look into what the AAT Level 3 modules involved, its costs, how to pay for the exam centres, and generally how the distance online courses works. 
I spoke to a person called Nicola who was able to break down the costs of the complete module and explain what I needed at home and where the exam centres were located near my workplace and home. This gave me the options to weight up the pros & cons, and I did not feel like I was pressured into saying yes. 
I then asked if I could have a weekend to think about my decision, and gave her a time and date to call me back. I was actually surprised the same member of staff called back promptly (as I was expecting a different member of staff) and I went ahead with my course package.

headline: very helpful and informative
reviewBody: John Orr was extremely helpful and delivered every he said he would, he was never pushy and let me make my own mind up unlike another big company which I wont name. very happy to have joined and feel confident the service will continue.

headline: Great Service
reviewBody:
I dithered about for weeks deciding which course was best for me and with which provider...
I decided on ICS as Michelle Kerr was fantastic. Very knowledgeable she provided with me lots of information and answered my endless questions promptly. 
Enrollment took minutes and I had immediate access to my online learning resources. 
The same evening I attended a welcome webinar delivered by Stephen Little. The welcome was friendly, informative and professionally done. 
Can't wait to get started but first impressions of ICS Learn is brilliant...

headline: Just so helpful!!
reviewBody: I enquired about a CIPD course through ICSLearn as I could not find the course I wanted to study being conducted at any college or further education establishment. I spoke with Paul Martin. Paul was wonderful. He really put my mind at ease, he clearly explained the process and he also answered my tough line of questioning in full. He explained ICSLearn, their ethos and their payment options brilliantly......after all this I decided that this was the correct way to go for me. And with such favourable payment options, at 0% interest, I just had to move forward and enrol.

headline: Very good experience!

reviewBody: I had two very helpful on-line chats with Paul Martin from ICS.  He was able to answer all of my queries and I was very happy with the service provided.

headline: 5* Experience
reviewBody: I call AAT for some information about joining and they transferred me to Sammy from ICS Learn. She was so helpful and explained everything in detail so I hd nothing to worry about, after having all the information I told Sammy I would need a few days to think about it. Sammy called me back after a few days to see how I was getting on and how I was feeling about joining, by then I had made my decision and signed up, Sammy went through everything again and advised if I ever have any doubt or need any help I can call and speak to her anytime.

headline: Really Helpful
reviewBody: I phoned up and came through to Sammy, she was really helpful and outlined everything clearly and specifically. She came across very confident and had the right answers to all my questions whilst coming across as friendly and not arrogant (like other advisors from other companies I had spoken too). I would also like to say that Sammy wasn't 'pushy' at all and left me in control of my decision, she was readily available as well when I came back to her with a decision, I sent an email asking for the next steps and she came back to me within 5 mins and then phoned and it was all sorted. I would highly recommend ICS learn to friends and colleagues who are looking to study an online course.

headline: Extremely helpful, easy enrolment
reviewBody: ICS Learn gave me all the information I needed to make an informed decision about the right CIPD course for me. The lady I spoke to was friendly, always replied very quickly and answered my questions with my best interest in mind. When I enrolled this only took 5-10 minutes on the phone, and I quickly had an email with my login details. I would thoroughly recommend ICS Learn as my experience so far has been that this company delivers great service and I am now looking forward to beginning my course.

headline: Excellent Company

The Advisor first contacted me via email and text to see what my preferred option of contact was.  During communications with him, he was never pushy or made me feel that a decision had to be made straightaway.  I would definitely use this company again and would highly recommend.

headline: Quick, easy and pain free
reviewBody: I have enquired about this course before with other companies and been given lectures on what the course is about and constant phone calls pestering. This was a breath of fresh air!! Nicola emailed me the course info and said should would call later. When I emailed to say I wanted to get started as soon as possible I received almost instant replys to all my emails- no waffling about ins and outs I already knew and no pestering phone calls. When I did speak to Nicola on the phone it couldn't have been easier or clearer. I'm enrolled and ready to go within a matter of a couple of hours- if that!! Best service I've received in a while. Thanks!!!

headline: Great service
reviewBody: My course advisor Anne Marie was an absolute star, so easy to deal, easy to talk to and full of information. An absolute credit to ICS learn.

headline: CIPD Level 5, My first online Course!
reviewBody:
Having made the decision to finally take up the CIPD Level 5 HR Qualification I was contacted by Michelle Kerr who I found really helpful and prompt with replies....a great start!
I received all my course materials within the timescales advised and although initially a lot to take in, I managed to find my way around the site.
The welcome web meeting by Dr Stephen Littler was informative and a good start to the process, although for a first timer to online learning I do have some apprehension about my first assignment, I am sure that once I know I'm on the right track I will be fine....fingers crossed! .

headline: New student
reviewBody: I have not yet started my course but had a very positive experience enrolling onto the course through rep Paul Martin. Hopefully the prompt, professional and polite approach will continue.

headline: Excellent Customer Service from the start!
reviewBody: The ICS advisor was professional, pleasant, and provided me with all the information I needed, in order to choose the best option for me. Nothing was a problem, Paul called me back whenever I needed, as I had many questions, before I decided to enrol. Paul was my first point of contact, and I didn't have to deal with anyone else, to enrol on a course. I have been thinking of studying towards this qualification for a while, but couldn't find a course provider that would suit my needs. ICS course delivery is ticking all the boxes, and if my experience so far is something to go by, I certainly look forward to studying with ICS. Thank you Paul!

headline: Very clear advice given
reviewBody:
I spoke with an advisor called Ciaran and he was very knowledgeable and patient. CIPD can be quite confusing I think, but Ciaran explained it very well, much better than other providers that I had spoken with.

The ICS Learn programme itself sounds well organised and supported, and I'm looking forward to starting my studies.

headline: Amazing
