headline: Excellent service
reviewBody: Colin has been amazing! Answered all my questions and gave great advice. Excellent customer service, very friendly and just a great help with everything from starting up my course and the questions I had. Highly recommend this company for studies as their service has always been great. Thank you!

headline: Choosing the course
reviewBody:
I was in touch with ICS Learn (Michelle Kerr) several times within last 2 weeks, choosing the course for my son and for myself. Michelle was extremely helpful both over the phone on via email and helped us to choose the right option. We now both enrolled for CIPD courses and looking forward to our studies. It was a very positive experience.

Thanks,
Anna

headline: Brilliant
reviewBody: Very pleasant and helpful. Brilliant service.

headline: Great service
reviewBody: I had already enrolled on an A Level course with ICS Learn last year and found the service excellent, so I had no reservations when I wanted to  enroll for my second A Level. The staff are great, they answered all my questions and put me at ease with my choices. The website is easy to use. I got my coursework with 24hrs of enrollment. I would recommend ICS Learn to anyone.

headline: Excellent, friendly and helpful!
reviewBody: Anne Marie who I initially spoke to was really helpful and very friendly, she answered all my questions and provided me with all the information I needed about the course, fees etc, without any pressure at all and left me feeling confident that I was making the right decision. After sleeping on it I decided that I wanted to enrol. I rang and spoke to Sammie, who again, was lovely to deal with, she enrolled me onto the course and now I can't wait to get started, especially if the customer service is anything to go by! Thank you!

headline: Excellent service
reviewBody: Nicola has been very helpful and thorough, she talked me through the course details and has answered every question. I signed up the same day for the course and I am very excited to get started!

headline: Stephen - Great Teacher
reviewBody: Found workshop very useful. Stephen delivered the workshop very well with clear, easy to follow and structured steps in order for all of us to be able to tackle the assignments.

headline: Very helpful and insightful.
reviewBody:
Michelle from ICS was extremely helpful and insightful regarding all my queries and information on the course. 

Minimal fuss and now hopefully maximum results!

headline: Fantastic Communication
reviewBody:
From start to finish my advisor has been proactive in supplying me information on which course level is best for me, how to study and how to book on the course. 

Really great service, always prompt with replies to queries and very welcoming

headline: Brilliant service!
reviewBody: Very helpful and clear information provided. Would definitely recommend to friends and family. Very excited to start my course :)

headline: They will rip you off if you change your mind
reviewBody: i have signed for an AAT back in winter and after months and months of paying monthly installments I had to give up this course. I have let them know and they asked me for a £100 cancellation fee. I told them I will try to pay on my sallary day and meanwhile had to go under an IVA beacuse my financial situation changed. Instead I got a reply that I have to contact Zinc Group a collector agency.?????? Can you rip off more your clients ??? I should ask for a refund for paying months and months but instead I tried to come to an agreement but no success. Dear students, stay far away from ICS Learn !!!!!

headline: Very good service
reviewBody: I would recommend this company to anyone who wants to do there GCSEs or retake them. Online team are nice and explain everything in detail

headline: Professional
reviewBody: I was assisted by Paul who was very professional, friendly and knowledgeable. He answered all my questions and I immediately felt that ICS learn was the right place for me to study. Thanks and keep the good work! Marianne

headline: First class, a pleasure to deal with
reviewBody: I dealt with Ciaran at ICS and he is fantastic!!! Great service and no hard sell to enrol, everything was tailored to suit my needs as a busy working Mum! So please with the service and I will be recommending to all my friends :-))

headline: Accountancy Levels 2 course application
reviewBody: Although this applies only to the course application process itself, from the initial contact through to getting the application process underway, the help provided by the assistant was top rate leaving me with a highly positive impression of the company.

headline: Friendly, informative and would highly recommend
reviewBody:
I can't wait to start learning my AAT course 2 and 3.  Anne Marie was very friendly, easy to talk to and I was fully informed of the course details and what was going to happen next.
I would highly recommend signing up with ICS Learn.  I am confident I can complete the courses and was given reassurance that if I ever needed help and advice, someone would be there to take my call or answer my questions.

headline: Exceptional service
reviewBody: Had a really professional well informed advisor that spoke me threw all my options. We was able to select the best option to suit my needs,both with time commitment and finance. I enrolled onto the course pretty much straight away.

headline: Great Service
reviewBody: Very happy with my choice to learn with ICS, polite and helpful communication

headline: Excellent! Nice, professional and open assistance.
reviewBody:
I enquired about my ICS course a few months before signing up. I was remembered and the person could not have been more helpful. I did not have many questions, but I did not feel in any way reserved about asking any. 

Information was shared clearly with sincere, polite conversation involved making me feel valued.

headline: enrolment call
reviewBody: polite professional and precise

headline: Highly recommend.
reviewBody: Ciaran was my ICS advisor and has been very helpful and understanding throughout the process. I felt I was dealt with professionally. Ciaran answered all and any questions I had. Very pleased with the service received!

headline: Excellent
reviewBody: Just very efficient, pro-active and easy to work with.

headline: Brilliant Service
reviewBody:
Ciaran was always on hand to answer any questions I had when researching my options for study.

Do to financial constraints, we arranged to reconvene our conversation to another time - there was no hounding or pressure from him for me to commit to the course there and then. This played a big part in me choosing to learn through ICS as I have found other learning providers very pushy.

Ciaran was very knowledgeable regarding the course I was interested in and was able to offer me sound advice when needed.

Very professional, helpful and friendly. Thanks very much :)

headline: very informative through the enquiries I made with Paul
reviewBody: I was unsure as to which route to take.  Ive been in retail HR for 3 years with retail senior management for 6 yrs before that. I wanted to do my cipd to better myself and improve my knowkedge.  Having not completed study beyond a-levels, other than OU i assumed i had to start st level 3.  On talking to Paul i realised level 5 diploma would suit me simply down to my experience and development needs.  Now really excited to crack on with my learning.

headline: CIPD enrollment
reviewBody: So far so good, a hassle free service in signing up to the course with great communication from the company. Looking forward to getting started and I'll update the review when the course kicks off.

headline: Excellent
reviewBody: Was quick and simple and they worked quick to arrange a affordable monthly plan for me

headline: Excellent Services
reviewBody:
Samantha Boyle is a brilliant course advisor .With full knowledge of the courses. Thank you very much for your helps and advices . I really appreciated it a lot.
Warm Regards,
khin

headline: Great service!!
reviewBody: Great service and friendly staff. Thank you very much!!

headline: Very pleasent.
reviewBody: Very nice customer service making me feel at ease and understand exactly what was happening and required

headline: Professional and competent!
reviewBody:
Ciaran (ICS ADVISOR) was really patient with me and helpful in the enrollment process. And I received login details and password in less than 12 hours. 
I hope it would be a great studying adventure!!!

headline: Great!!
reviewBody: They will call you at your convenience, and have answered all questions that I had and were generally really helpful!!

headline: Samantha boyle
reviewBody: Excellent and professional service from Samantha. Very polite. Brilliant Thankyou very much.

headline: fantastic service level form the outset!
reviewBody: I was nervous about enrolling and selecting the right course level.  The online skills test was fantastic for providing assessment.  The process of registering was simple and slick.  So far, so very good! Cant wait to embark on formally up skilling my qualifications.

headline: Level 3 AAT
reviewBody: Having studied AAT Level 2 with ICS Learn, I have had no reason not to continue to study with them for Level 3. Enrolling over the phone was quick and easy and they keep you with the same Course Adviser which is great. My adviser is Andrew and his service has been great throughout. Other colleagues I have talked to in Student Services are also very helpful and try to sort out any issue you have quickly.

headline: Signing up and On-boarding session
reviewBody:
The signing up process was very simple, the call back I got from a member of staff was very informative and answered all my questions. No hassle at all to sign up.

The on-boarding process was also very helpful and informative with everything clearly explained and helped give me some direction on how to start a internet based course.

headline: Enrolment
reviewBody: Very good customer service and polite staff. Enrolment very straight forward.

headline: Fantastic Service
reviewBody:
My advisor was Ciaran, I had shown an interest in the CIPD course and used the online chat service, Ciaran was friendly, polite and interested in my needs from the qualification. With a few easy and efficient questions Ciaran advised me on which course would be better suited to my role and offered me an abundance of support and advice necessary to me. Once we had the course selected Ciaran sent over all the details I would need to get set up and in no time I was enrolled and starting my new future.
What a wonderful advisor, and how welcoming I felt. A true asset to your company.
Thank you once again.

headline: Very good
reviewBody: This is my first experience of distance learning. I can honestly say that it has been a positive experience throughout. The weekend workshops (which I was dreading) were great and it really suited me to be left to work in my own way and in my own time. ICS provided lots of online support in the way of webinars and recordings that helped me initially to find out what way of studying suited me best and the tutors were in the main very helpful in their feedback.

headline: i applied to do Bsc nursing top up course
reviewBody: I applied for Bsc Top Up course in Nursing after my diploma, it was supposed to be flexible course but now they have discontinued the whole course

headline: Great start
reviewBody: Had a fantastic start with ICS. I requested info and within one day i had been contacted and had all the information and confidence i need to proceed and begin my studies. Looking forward to some results :)

headline: Michelle Kerr was great :)
reviewBody: Michelle was really helpful from start to finish :)

headline: level 5 intermediate HR Course
reviewBody: I would just like to say from the initial call to ICS it has been a great service all the reservations I had were dispelled by Ciaran and he answered all my queries, I would definitely reccomend this to anyone who is looking to do home learning.

headline: Very Pleased
reviewBody: Very happy with the service. Anne Marie was both very helpful and friendly.

headline: Very quick and always ready to help
reviewBody: Incredibly helpful when I first got in contact regarding the course. Providing all the information I needed to make the decision which was best for me. I didn't feel pressured into taking this course over others. I felt that the they genuinely wanted to help me get on to the course which would be best for me. When finally signing up to the course they were helpful and fast. Overall a brilliant experience and I would recommend them to anyone.

headline: Great communication, very helpful
reviewBody: Received fast, helpful communication with regards to me starting / inquiring about a course.  Was impressed with the efficiency of the Advisor (Anne Marie). Am excited to start learning...

headline: Great
reviewBody: I spoke to Sammy on the phone and she was very helpful, she talked me through everything I was unsure about.

headline: Excellent service and advice
reviewBody:
From my 1st email enquiry through lots of questions to me signing up a few days later Paul Martin was an excellent advisor and very efficient. 
I am very excited to be starting my course.

headline: Good service.
reviewBody: All questions answered and easy to enrol

headline: Enrolling
reviewBody: I found my experience of enrolling was quick and easy.  The ICS representative was very pleasant and informative, just cannot wait to start.

headline: provided factual and relevant information
reviewBody: all questions answered and was helped in choosing the correct course

headline: Enrolling
reviewBody: I’ve decided to start a new career as I feel that I need to open up my horizons.  ICS Learn were one of the first sites that came up.  Nicola kept in touch with me for when I was ready to start the course.  They are very good, as they don’t hound you to sign up, they find out when you’re ready, and you go from there.

headline: CIPD Diploma in L&D
reviewBody:
I wanted to sign up for the CIPD Level 3 Diploma in L&D, and ICS Learn (particularly Michelle Kerr) have been incredibly helpful. They are responsive, helpful and provide complete information - I was able to sign up and get started within a matter of days.

I have been studying the course for a month now, and found the interface a bit overwhelming to start with but it becomes much easier to navigate given a little time.

headline: Friendly and helpful
reviewBody: When signing up to my chosen course I found the website information robe very useful, and when talking to an adviser on the phone I found him to be friendly and very helpful.

headline: introduction and set up with ICS
reviewBody:
Received a communication from Reid recruitment agency, Michelle extremely helpful on the telephone, explained what I needed to know and sent emails to clarify further.
No hard sell - I felt in control - the 30% discount along with the payment plan made it very easy.
Enrolment took minutes - looking forward to getting started

Attended my first ever webinar which was a welcome to ICS and was a little apprehensive as technology not my strong point. Stephen Littler was great - patient and quick to respond to interactive questions and giving pointers to ensure all students benefited from the session.
Never thought I'd share a classroom with someone from Singapore - the power of the internet and ICS learn working together. 
Now looking forward to future Webinars and know they will definitely help my CIPD learning journey

headline: Good helpful advice when needed
reviewBody: Stephen Little at ICS CIPD - thank you so much for your help with my CIPD assignment. You gave me great advice when I needed it the most. Keep up the good work:)

headline: Helpful
reviewBody: Sammy and Anne Marie were both very helpful, full of information, and lovely. I'm looking forward to starting my course.

headline: The company is a joke
reviewBody:
Please do not go with this company, I signed up to three courses, paid an initial £150 
I never accessed any of the courses or logged into any of the information, 26days after initial registration an unforeseen family issue arised that meant I would no longer be able to continue with the courses.
I contacted them straight away, not only did they want me to pay another £150 for a service I never had, but we're also incredibly rude, I violated no terms of agreement nor had I accessed any of the material or recieved anything from them. 
A terrible company do not go with this company

headline: Great Experience!!!!
reviewBody: Happy with the results so far, great support and quick responses. Tutors are amazing!!!!!

headline: Great help!
reviewBody: Anne Marie was very prompt in answering my emails and very helpful with getting me enrolled. She is very pleasant to talk to and I am sure I will have all her support to obtain my diploma.

headline: Excellent Tutor
reviewBody:
The experience I have encountered with my ICS course so far has been excellent.  
Stephen Littler, the tutor at the recent 5HRM1 Workshop in London, was fantastic.  He engaged the class and made the workshop fun.  I went away feeling confident that I could happily complete the first two assignments. I have also recently taken part in one of Stephen’s Webinars which again was well structured, informative and fun.  He conveyed the information to the group clearly and effectively.  I hope he is the Tutor for more of the assignments on this course.

headline: Amazing Customer Service
reviewBody:
I initially went with ICS as the price was competitive. Blown away by the quick response. I received a friendly and thorough walk through the options available and enrolment process. 
Highly recommenced these guys!

headline: Opinion
reviewBody: So far I am finding the course straightforward to navigate.  The only problem is I find the website difficult to navigate; the information is all over the place which means I have missed information.

headline: Great experience
reviewBody:
the process was fast. I did like it as it was not complicated. The advisor was very informative and answered all my questions. I had overall a good experience.

It should be good though if the full price was indicated course+workshops+membership to help all of those that are not very familiar with  CIPD.

headline: CIPD Level 5 Diploma
reviewBody:
My experience with ICS has been nothing short of amazing. I've been pondering as to whether or not I should enrol onto the CIPD Level 5 Diploma for sometime now. Even though it will help with career development, because i'm self funding - there was the financial implications to think about carefully. 

Michelle Kerr; one of the course advisors, provided me with a wealth of information over the last few months. She has also gone out of her way to keep in contact with me as i've been trying to make my decision (even at times when i've not responded to her e-mails). Overall she was very friendly and i'm glad that I have now enrolled onto the course.

headline: Excellent service
reviewBody: The staff at ICS Learn and in particular Sammy was very helpful and accommodating.  Thank you for all the advice given.

headline: Review - Michelle Kerr, Course Advisor
reviewBody: I have requested information regards CIPD courses from Michelle and she has provided me promptly and professionally with everything I wanted to know regards the courses and the fees both in emails and on the phone. When I decided to postpone the enrollment she wasn't trying to convince me (which I really appreciated). However she did inform me later of a further discount and I eventually enrolled to my chosen course. Thank you, Michelle!

headline: Very helpful.
reviewBody: An excellent service from Anne Marie. Explained everthing I needed to know, very reassuring about the course contents and how it's delivered. Brilliant communication via email and phone calls - very fast responses. Keep up the good work!

headline: CIPD Advanced Diploma
reviewBody:
I hadn't heard of ICS Learn before contemplating taking this qualification.Their details soon became apparent after doing a few searches.I had an initial online discussion with Ciaran which was really useful,and this was then followed up with a number of e mail enquiries.

At all times Ciaran was very helpful and offered me the payment plan to take my course which is incredibly useful.All in all, an honest,no fuss experience,and I'm glad now that I have taken the plunge!

headline: swift customer service
reviewBody:
I haven't started the course yet but have been dealing with Michelle Kerr- Course advisor and have had really swift and flawless communications. I had lots of questions because of my company paying for the course but also had some requirements for start dates to be changed and a few other anomalies, but Michelle made the whole process really easy and responded with great efficiency.
Thanks for a great start to my course :)

headline: Fantastic
reviewBody:
Great service from Samantha. 
Keep us the good work

headline: proffesional in everyway
reviewBody: I have been thinking of doing this course for over a year. With the help assistance and perseverance of Michelle, i have now become a student

headline: IGCSE's
reviewBody: Effective, efficient, financially affordable service for offering GCSE's to be conducted at home, online, at a convenient timescale and proficient exercise of application.

headline: CIPD Level 7
reviewBody:
So far, so good.
Sammy was very knowledgeable and made it very easy to make the decision to join ICS.  
Thanks

headline: Excellent and informative
reviewBody: Signing up to complete a CIPD leve 5 diploma was easy and hassle free.  Now to see if the course is as good 😀

headline: Samantha Boyle - Review
reviewBody:
Hi,

I just wanted to personally thank Samantha Boyle for all of her help over the last few months in getting me enrolled. I lost my job around the time I was going to enrol a few months back and have been in between jobs since then which meant I couldn't afford to enrol until last week. Samantha was really understanding and ensured that the arrangement for payment that we had agreed was kept in place until it was suitable for me to pay. Brilliant customer service which has been massively appreciated and ultimately contributed to me deciding to enrol with ICS!

Aaron Dixon

headline: Helpful
reviewBody: very helpful and made me confident i was booking the right course

headline: Thanks Nicola
reviewBody:
I phoned ICS fairly dubiously, the cost of the course I wanted was way too cheap compared with anyone else, the quality of he course still remains to be seen, I'm hoping it's ok!!
Nicola from ics has been fab, although I feel a little bombarded by texts and emails, she has been very helpful and kind on the phone and I look forward to completing my course

headline: Very supportive and professional!
reviewBody: This is my first attempt at distant learning and at first I was very hesitant on going through with it. After talking to one of the GCSE course advisors at ICS my mind was put at ease. I received professional guidance on selecting the right course for me and had the whole process of enrolment, distant learning through too the test day explained to me. I am very excited now on carrying out this learning package ICS has offered too me and to allow me to right the wrongs of the past and brighten my future career prospects by retaking my GCSE's in such a supportive community.

headline: Excellent, helpful and professional
reviewBody:
Professional on the phone and give lots of advice. Info on the web is good but speaking with an advisor is much better and there is a sense that it is not just a commercial organisation and there is integrity.
Advisor Colin was very helpful, sent further information before I paid the £ and try to his word, emailed and called back within 10 mins.
Have yet to test the service in full and use it, but so far, good start.

headline: Level 3 CIPD Certification
reviewBody:
ICS Learn was the best platform for pursuing my Certification.
They provide an excellent service and the information is always clear.

headline: Very efficient service
reviewBody: The enquiry, follow-up, and registration process was handled flawlessly by Anne Marie. I look forward to starting my course.

headline: Motivational
reviewBody:
After contacting several different companies that offer distance learning, I thought perhaps this wasn't the right way to go about furthering my education as it seemed painstakingly difficult to get direct answers and find a suitable course; ICS Learn has, by far, been the most helpful and completely changed my opinion. I would like to thank Gurdeep Mehmi for taking the time to talk to me, his understanding and encouraging words - without whom I'm unsure as to whether or not I'd have signed up to become a student at this time. 
I was given a number to text for a callback when I was ready to discuss course details/sign up further (callback was pretty much instant) and at no point did I feel pressured it anyway. I'm very much looking forward to working with this company. Thanks again Gurdeep!

headline: AAT Accounts Level 2
reviewBody:
I haven't started the course yet, but I just had to rate how amazing Nicola at ICS has been. I have wanted to do this course for a while, but wasn't to sure when/if I would be in a suitable position to do it - Nicola has kept in contact with me, kept me informed - without being pushy and annoying (which can happen when signing up to certain things). She has been amazing, informative and an absolute pleasure to deal with. 

Thank you Nicola! You are an asset to your team.

headline: Fantastic Service
reviewBody: I had been in communication with Anne Marie McGarry over a period of weeks in relation to purchasing a level 3 and 4 course. At no point was she pushy or calling me on a daily basis to try and get me to sign up (something that cant be said of other providers). When I did bother her and he colleagues couldn't have been more helpful. I sincerely look forward to training with these guys and cant thank them enough for everything they've done for me in the mean time.

headline: Extremely Helpful!
reviewBody: So far am very happy with ICS. Anne Marie was extremely helpful with my initial enquiry and subsequent enrolment a few months later. Everything was explained clearly and my questions responded to quickly. I particularly  appreciated not being pushed to make a decision. Anne Marie accepted on my initial enquiry that I was not ready to make a decision. A competitor hounded me constantly by phone and email despite me explaining my situation. As such they did not get my business and ICS did!

headline: Webinar with Stephen Littler
reviewBody: I really enjoyed the Webinar. It was interactive and very useful. Thank you.

headline: Studying With ICS
reviewBody: I attended the webinar, I found it very helpful when making my decision for my AAT. I found ICS vey friendly, and professional. I looked into BPP and Kaplan at the end ICS was the one for me.

headline: Fantastic start
reviewBody: After deliberating on whether to sign with ICS or not, Anne Marie was a great help in confirming everything I had researched about the course and ICS. I now feel confident in not only the quality of the course but also the support I will receive during my studies.

headline: Webnair L&D Professionsl practices
reviewBody: I am really glad I had the opportunity to join - it was really helpful and made things much clearer - good to have additional reading material - I just wish more were scheduled at night as I work 8-5pm Mon-Fri :(

headline: They seem to just want your money
reviewBody:
They do not give you much for what you for. On the phone it was implied that more would be done- a link to book exams etc was mentioned for example. In reality they did not inform me that I was already two months behind the course, that the link to book exams was a guide to trying to find somewhere yourself and a minimum of on-line tutoring ( and mostly links then to other people's maths websites!). 
Will be asking for refund please.

headline: Brilliant service
reviewBody: Ann-Marie was very helpful and friendly. She had knowledge of the course I wanted and answered all my questions. No pressure and bugging you to buy, she let me decide in my own time. I would definitely recommend ICS and Ann-Marie to friends.

headline: Enrolling on to CIPD level 3
reviewBody: Paul was very open and honest about the course details and talked me through my options and was very helpful in explaining everything to me. Can't wait to get started

headline: Excellent and informative throughout the whole process. Would highly recommend.
reviewBody: Throughout the call, Colin was well informed and answered all my questions with confidence. Any doubts of commencing a new course disappeared as the conversation flowed between us.

headline: A* company
reviewBody: Helpful and friendly

headline: Fantastic experience so far!
reviewBody: Over the past month or so I have been in contact with Ciaran at ICS learn via email and telephone with regard to my CIPD qualification. I have found Ciaran to be helpful and knowledgeable, friendly and professional and he always responds to my communications promptly. Superb service.

headline: Brilliant Service
reviewBody:
I dealt with Andrew Armstrong, who was very helpful, he dealt with any queries I had and called me back when requested. He thoroughly explained all aspects of the course and payments available. 
I received all documents through quickly.

headline: Very good initial support!!!
reviewBody:
I am always cautious when it comes to online learning. All concerns and questions were answered immediately and Michelle went that extra mile to help me out until I convince my employer to cover the cost.
Many thanks Michelle!!!!

headline: Enrollment
reviewBody: anne-Marie has been fantastic all tge way through. Very helpful, lovely person, i cant thank her enough.

headline: Brilliant service- would recommend
reviewBody: I enrolled on CIPD Level 7 with Michelle Kerr, she was very helpful as I was unsure what level to start at and how the payments worked. She helped me with every query and helped me enrol on the course. She always contacted me first to see when was best to call as I work long hours. A brilliant service all round, and a very friendly and helpful manner. I look forward to starting my studies with ICS.

headline: Very helpful
reviewBody: Very helpful, dealt with all my queries and explained everything in detail and helped me to make better choice highly recommend.

headline: Friendly and honest service
reviewBody: From initial contact, Nicola have been understanding and explained everything in very clear terms. she arranged specific times to contact me and keep to these. I thank her for her time and patience in getting me ready for my course.

headline: Excellent service
reviewBody:
I recently decided to enrol on an AAT course, and out of all the course providers I spoke with Andrew from ICS was by far the most helpful.

He provided me with good advise about the qualification, promptly followed up my enquiry with course details and sample course content, and made my decision very easy to make. Top service

headline: Easy and efficient
reviewBody:
Using the online form, I requested information regarding the AAT Level 2 Accountancy qualification and Anne Marie McGarry was my course advisor.  She was polite and friendly and very easy to contact and deal with.  I am looking forward to starting my course.

A Cato

headline: Easy & Informative
reviewBody:
It was very simple to get started on the CIPD Level 5 Diploma. Michelle offered me all the advice I needed and thoroughly answered all of my questions/concerns. Swift response too! I'm now looking forward to getting started on the course.

Webinars:
I have to admit that I was a little apprehensive to do another home study course after a less than perfect experience the first time round (with another provider, not ICS), but I have to say that Stephen and the webinars are fantastic! They really make you feel connected, as though you are not alone. Stephen makes you feel comfortable to contact him for any advice/ tips and the webinars are so informative. I really look forward to them and it's great to take part with others as you are reminded that you are part of a wider community. Cannot rate Stephen highly enough.

headline: excellent service
reviewBody: anne marie was professional and displayed real enthusiasm for the studies i am to embark on. great job.

headline: Great support. Fab workshop. So much help.
reviewBody:
Without Steve stepping in when he did, I would have most likely given up on this course. 

His help in understanding and the guidance given in regards to the completion of Assignments 1 & 2 has been second to none. 

The best experience with a Tutor I have had with ICS.

headline: Customer Experience
reviewBody: The whole CIPD mentor team have always been very helpful and conscientious with regards to any queries for my studies, particularly Rose, Craig and James (unsure of surnames), and Stephen Littler.  The team would always answer questions on the live chat or over the phone with friendliness and pass me to someone else if they didn't know themselves.  They also extended my deadline when my Nanna died as my studies were put on hold for a month. At the very end of my course i had a slight altercation with one of the tutors marking my final assignment as he claimed he had not received it. Stephen Littler stepped in and ensured that i would not be penalised for the delay and really helped me to achieve my final pass. I have now successfully completed the course.

headline: Excellent service
reviewBody:
Thank you Anne Marie for answering all my questions. 

With great price and interest free payment plan for 20 months I was able to start the combined AAT Level 2 Certificate & Level 3 Diploma in Accounting the same day.

Good organised studying materials on website and flexibility with studying and exams thats what I needed as full time working mum.

Thank you 
Magdalena

headline: ICS Learning - CIPD Enrolment
reviewBody: I have been trying to enrol on an HR course that mirrors my experience of over 20 years. There are so many to choose from, all offering different options. Working in London is sometimes so stressful and you really do not have anytime to sit down and analyse findings. It was hopeless and I was totally confused and being harassed by many providers. A couple of days ago, whilst at home, after work, I received this simple email from Michelle Kerr informing me of three main things to do with the course I had enquirer about. A good discount, monthly payment plan approval and we can do all via email with just a five minute phone call. Too good to be true? I immediately asked for further details, which Michelle sent almost immediately. Any questions I posed to her she answered professionally and quickly. Michelle was polite and a true credit to ICS. It took two days and I was enrolled! Without much fuss or stress added. Thank you Michelle for a great service, let's hope I pass now!

headline: Excellent service. Prompt and professional.
reviewBody:
I have received excellent prompt service from Fraser, from the first request for information through to payment and registration. It was very easy and swift. 

I just need to pass the exams now!

headline: Outstanding service
reviewBody: I spoke to Fraser a number of times to arrange my enrolment, who was extremely friendly and helpful. He was happy to answer any of my questions on every occasion and went out of his way to ensure that the whole enrolment process was as simple as it could be. My experience with ICS Learn so far has been positive as a result of the excellent customer service that I've received from the beginning.

headline: Friendly, useful service
reviewBody:
Nicola was quick to help and answer questions in a way that was friendly and down to earth. She made sure I understood everything, giving me opportunity to ask questions/clarify anything I was unsure of. 
A great first experience with ICS.

headline: Brilliant service
reviewBody: I spoke to Ann Marie, who was fantastic, very friendly and made my choice extremely easy.

headline: Verry helpful
reviewBody: I find is very helpful on the phone .. and give you all the information that I need

headline: Fraser at ICS Learn
reviewBody: Fraser was great-really professional, and helpful.  He even asked if we had any further questions to ask him whilst he waited for the computer system to get itself up and started!

headline: Very friendly and profesdional
reviewBody: I was apprehensive about the course but I was assured that the tutors sound always be able to help and the course advisor was able to answer any questions I had before I made the decision to enrol.

headline: Superb helpful
reviewBody: I dont think it could have been easier to get up and running. Nicola was super helpful at every opportunity

headline: Great Customer Service - Anne Marie
reviewBody:
I just want to say a massive thank you to Anne Marie for all of her help and the ease of starting this course. 

She was very patient with me and an awful lot easier than my original enrollment with Seevic College which was just terrible.

Thank you and I would highly recommend ICS.

Here's to Studing AAT Level 2!

headline: ICS - AAT Level 2
reviewBody: One of most approachable and helpful companies I have had the pleasure of dealing with, and not all at pushy. Excellent customer service at a reasonable price, would highly recommend.

headline: ICS Learn enrollment
reviewBody: I found the advisor Sammy very friendly and helpful. The enrolment process was at my own convenience, any questions I had were answered promptly and all relevant information has been provided. Excited to start my studies so thank you ICS learn.

headline: Excellent service
reviewBody: The telephone advisor was helpful and informed. He went through everything with me and ddin't push for a sale which I really liked. I would  recommend ICS to anyone!

headline: Overall a pleasant and helpful service.
reviewBody: I was happy with the manor in which I was address and the way in which Fraser dealt with my enquiry and signed me up. I was slightly disappointed as I sign up under the impression there were more centres near me to do the exam however I was only given four (two of which were over an hours drive from me and I unfortunately don't drive). I also contacted one of the centres and they informed me they don't even do the exams at their facilities which was slightly frustrating and has meant I need to cancel with yourselves.

headline: Client service
reviewBody: Client service of the Advisor was on the highest level. Knowledgeable and helpful which resulted in a fast decision to chose ICS as my learning platform.

headline: Great service and really easy to use
reviewBody: I found the consultant to be knowledgeable helpful and quick to enrol me on the course.  It has great flexibility and suits my needs as a full time worker.  Thanks

headline: Webinar - Effective Report Writing by Stephen Littler
reviewBody: Well presented and interactive throughout. Useful information clarifying what is expected. Would recommend :)

headline: Ann Marie
reviewBody:
I was absolutely delighted to speak to Ann Marie. She was really helpful and answered all my questions and queries regarding AAT Level2 course and enrolment procedure. 
she is a professional & Kind.

headline: Colin Urquhart
reviewBody: Colin was polite, friendly, clear and consice

headline: Excellent so far
reviewBody:
Haven't started the course yet but the signing up process was excellent.  A personal email and phone call answered all my questions without any "hard sell".  Nicola was knowledgable, friendly and extremely helpful.  I feel very confident with the names of individuals who I can speak to about the different aspects of the process if I need to.
Thank you Nicola!

headline: Very Happy
reviewBody: Nicola was very professional, I have Cerebral Palsy, but she took time to listen to me, as I have a speech impediment. And she answered all me question and guided me through the enrolment process

headline: Exceptional service and support
reviewBody: I was pleased firstly that after contacting ICS over a year ago and receiving information, they retained my information on record, including the allocated CIPD advisor, Paul Martin, I had spoken to, a year later. The advisor was informative and patient as I had many questions. He further offered additional discounts offered the year before as a sign of good faith. I would recommend this educational service provider to those considering distance education.

headline: phone booking
reviewBody:
i found Paul the advisor very helpful, he answered all the questions I had and gave me time to go away and think about things. I felt at ease the whole time and pressured at any point to make a booking. he gave me advise on the way things will be done and the structure of the course.

overall I thought it was a good experience.

headline: Fantastic
reviewBody:
I just wanted to say Nicola who took my call today was fantastic and a pleasure to talk to.

When I have finished this course I will return to book another one with Nicola.

headline: AAT Registration
reviewBody:
ICS  (particularly Anne Marie) was incredibly helpful and patient with my enquiries and were an absolute pleasure to deal with.

Anne Marie helped with all my questions, emailing me information to read through and gave me time to think about my next step without any pressure.

headline: Good communication!
reviewBody: Good communication and lots of information on the website! The live chat was good to clear up a few questions I had too! Looking forward to studying with ICS.

headline: helpful stafff
reviewBody: I ALWAYS TURN TO ICS to LEARN  A COURSE..Staff are very helpful,they explain the course to uou in detail and best of all they understand that it is very difficult to manage your learning and deal with the fees,that is why they try their best to spread the cost of the course in instalments.Thankyou ics

headline: Ann Marie was extremely helpful and really nice
reviewBody: When I approached ICS about my studying they were very quick and efficient.  I had an email the next day and Ann Marie McGarry sent me a text the same day.  Having spoken with her, she answered my queries and any reservations I had and I felt happy to enroll with ICS that same day.  I'm looking forward to my studies and hopefully to take more courses through ICS.

headline: Very good, friendly service
reviewBody: It was great service and helped me decided about what course I should do.

headline: Review of ICS Learn
reviewBody:
Have been dealing with Nicola Dexter in regards to studying AAT Level 2.

Throughout the process from enquiry to signing up Nicola has provided what I believe to be excellent support and in reality has set the standard of what I hope will continue throughout my study time from other members of ICS learn. 

Looking forward and excited about being a student after many years out of this.

headline: service
reviewBody: the communication and explanation was exellent.

headline: Paul Martin was an excellent advisor! Excellent experience!
reviewBody:
I was extremely happy and felt very comfortable dealing with Paul, who was very friendly. He remained professional at all times, enthusiastic and clearly explained to me the details of the CIPD course I have been so keen to start for the past year. He really did take the time to explain everything I needed to know. I am more than confident that this will be a great journey to a priceless qualification! 

Thank you so much Paul for facilitating this big jump into a brighter future!

headline: Thieves
reviewBody: Sorry had to update as these people are just criminals hiding behind a company name. They take ur money n u have no contact with any tutor. Dont waste your money.

headline: Amazing!!!!
reviewBody:
I have liaised with AnneMarie over the past couple of weeks to get an understanding of my course which I have chosen. She has provided amounts of knowledge and put myself at ease. I have not studied in over 10 years and felt nervous but she has reassured me and I can say that I have completed my registration and now a student!!!
Absolute pleasure to speak to today (12.10.15), so very friendly!

Thank You!!!

headline: very good
reviewBody: Thanks for very nice service.

headline: Helpful, friendly and fun sign up
reviewBody:
When I called this morning I spoke to Anne Marie, she was wonderful. Her manner was friendly and helpful, she answered all my questions quickly and with knowledge. She put me at ease and made signing up a fun experience. I have spoken to John as well, and can't wait to meet my tutor as if the other two are anything to go by then they will be brilliant too. I feel at ease now I have signed up, confident that I will get the help, and tution that you are advertising, to enable me to get my qualification.
Thank You

headline: New Student
reviewBody:
Wanted to share how helpful Anne Marie McGarry - Course Advisor was answered all my questions made me feel supported and encouraged with taking on this course explained the process never minded that I rang her a number of times.

Really looking forward to starting the course.

headline: Ciaran McEachen - Excellent Advisor
reviewBody:
I cannot rate Ciaran and ICS more on their professionalism and organisation. From when I first enquired to ICS, Ciaran has not had to hard sell or push any service on to me. I have received friendly, monthly emails with offers, suggestions and a simple 'how are you' which is what has made me change from MOL to ICS, even after completing my L5 with MOL.

I cannot recommend ICS and in particular Ciaran, who I wish to recommend for an ICS star award or equivalent.

thank you for helping me shape my own future.

Kate Gathard
CIPD Associate

headline: Great Introduction into ICS
reviewBody: The main thing that put ICS above other compaines that I have contacted is the fact they do not try and push anything on you. If you say you want to think about they leave it with you and don't hassle you constantly. Plus once decided very easy to sign up and the person i spoke to was helpful and polite

headline: Informative, Clear and Reassuring Help and Support.  A quality experience.
reviewBody: Speaking to Nicola at ICS was a really positive experience.  Her welcoming manner when she took my first call, instantly put me at ease.  Her excellent knowledge of the programs offered by AAT, and her patience allowed me to gather the information and answers that I needed to a list of questions that I had about an AAT qualification (Certificate in Accountancy Practice) that I was considering studying.  I had been shopping around for training providers, but stopped as soon as I talked to Nicola.  The level of support that ICS gives to its students is perfect for my needs, and from the research I did seems to be one of the best out there for this program.  I signed up today with Nicola, a little nervous...but excited to get started and to earn my qualification.

headline: 5 months later....still no certificate!! Worrying!
reviewBody: The experience while on the course was very good. I submitted my modules, and gained feedback including marks within 2-3 days of submitting each module by the internal assessor. However I finished my BTEC in April, marks all returned and I was told I would have my certificate issued to me within 6-8weeks. It is now 5 months and still not certificate...! Numerous emails, numerous phone calls and my company are also chasing the evidence that I should of submitted to them, as promised, back in August! Feeling extremely upset and concerned now.

headline: Excellent experience learning with ICS
reviewBody:
Just wanted to write a quick review on my experience of learning through ICS. I have completed a number of Level 3 CIPD course as standalone modules, a full Level 5 and a unit of the Level 7 syllabus.

From the enrolment of each course through to ensuring certificates were issued, everyone who I had any interaction with were extremely helpful, experienced and polite. They understood the courses and were able to provide me with an excellent level of advice and guidance.

The course material is written to a high standard and is written clearly, more importantly it is written in an easy to understand way so there is very little or no room or ambiguity. If I ever needed to clarify my own understanding or needed some additional support and/ or guidance, the mentoring team were there. If they couldn’t help me then I was able to message one of my tutors who, in pretty much every occasion, answered me with a matter of hours. 

The workshops for my level 5 course were helpful and it was good to meet other learners and network. I think my only criticism would be to run a further weekend or have a day’s workshop on employment law; that said support is excellent and at the end of a phone or email.

There was no judgement no matter how stupid I thought my question was. The advice was contextualised and the modules were put into real examples which really helped my learning style. Feedback from the tutors was clear, concise and stretching; marking was quick and efficiently turnaround within 24hrs or quicker.

Having completed 5 courses with CIPD through distance learning, my knowledge and understanding has been tested and confirmed. I feel I have learnt loads over the past 18 months and would definitely recommend the ICS to anyone wanting to learn and grow as an individual. From my experience of ICS I would be more than happy to recommend the ICS as a learning partner for any organisation to.

headline: Friendly & efficient
reviewBody: No reservations, had a quick callback from initial enquiry and the advisor clearly spelled out the different payment options, processes and answered any questions I had about the course. Call back to process registration was flexible around my (rather hectic) work schedule and very punctual. Found the advisor to be friendly throughout and actually quite comical which is always a nice surprise!

headline: ICS Extraordinary Customer Service
reviewBody: I have nothing but the best of experience studying with ICS.  I completed my Certificate back in 2009 and I really enjoyed studying with ICS.  The course advisers, Mentors and Tutors are all brilliant and makes your distance learning so much easier!  Having had such an good experience with them in the past, I have had no reservations selecting ICS again at present (2015) to undertake my Higher Diploma.  Once again even at enrolment stage the customer service is second to none!! Well Done ICS, keep up your excellent work and positive contribution to students studying online distance learning courses.  I have absolutely no reservations in recommending ICS to everyone!

headline: Fantastic service
reviewBody: The process for signing up with ICS couldn't have been easier. The specialist advisor, John Orr, sent through all the relevant information straight away and followed up with an email to see if there were any questions. The actual enrolment was done at my convenience very quickly and efficiently. If the service provided by John is representative of the support provided by ICS in general then I am expecting a very positive learning experience.

headline: So far so good
reviewBody: the assistance I received was very good, finding the study material etc is very easy however the layout of the website could be more welcoming and user friendly, it's not complex as such but could do with a possible revamp and a better layout. So far I am entirely satisfied with the help I've received

headline: Great service and professional advice
reviewBody: Professional and courteous advice without any pressure. Definitely recommended.

headline: Interesting and informative
reviewBody: I found the whole workshop very informative and interesting. My main aim for this workshop was to get as much information as I can I order to enable me to do my assignments well and I felt like I achieved that. The tutor was helpful and informative and made the weekend fun and interesting.

headline: Enrollment for distance learning AAT level 2 and 3.
reviewBody:
excellent experience in enrolling for my chosen course both on live chat and by phone.  Andrew was very informative and precise in all the information he gave together with completing my application and the time scale for receiving all necessary material for my course.

I will be recommending ICS to anyone wishing to do distance learning.

Brilliant.

headline: Extremely helpful advisor
reviewBody: Very helpful and informative advisor.

headline: Very Freindly Service
reviewBody: My first contact with ICS was very efficient and pointed me to the course I am doing.  Well done

headline: Greatly Satisfied with Everything!
reviewBody: I am intending to redo some of my GCSE courses just for the purpose of improving my grades and immediately found ICS as being a great partner in this. I look forward to the courses that I'm studying because I feel there will be an immense amount of support from my tutors and other staff members.

headline: Speedy, Friendly and Helpful
reviewBody: The whole process of booking onto the course was enjoyable, I didn't feel pressured at any point and actually felt excited when I'd finalised my booking.

headline: Easy from the start
reviewBody: When I first decided to sign up for my course in accounting, the ICS website offered all the information that I could need and laid it all out in an easy to understand manner. Once I registered my interest in the course, the process to enrol was simple! I'm really excited to start my learning and my experience with the company thus far has been nothing but perfect!

headline: ICS website
reviewBody: I contacted Dr Stephen Littler as I was having trouble submitting an assignment. Even though it was 10pm at night Dr Stephen sorted this and notified me so my assignment could be submitted. He is a star😀

headline: Great support in choosing the right course
reviewBody:
The course adviser was really helpful in explaining my options when I originally enquired in June and was great when I wasn't quite ready or able to commit to the studying just yet.  
Now I am ready and raring to go and was immediately happy to study with ICS to take my career to the next step.  Thanks for your patience :-)

headline: Fraser was excellent
reviewBody: Fraser was lovely, very helpful! Great experience! I think a pay rise might be needed!

headline: Best Information
reviewBody: I have had the best information, support and contact with ICS while making my decision to do AAT. Anne Marie the course advisor has been a great help to me and the company I work for to make sure we had the most up to date information and it was the right choice for everyone. I can't wait to get started!

headline: Super
reviewBody: John was great! He provided me with all the information I needed, and responded to my emails promptly. He wasn't pushy like other advisors I had spoken to from other course providers.

headline: Great service and support
reviewBody: From the first contact I received great support aa well as the info that I looked for. I am very happy with your services and would recommend the company to any of my friends.

headline: Patient and informative
reviewBody: My course advisor was very informative and explained the course details and payment options carefully. He was very patient with some troubles I had with the payment and it was all in all excellent service.

headline: Great easy and simple enrolment
reviewBody: I was given all the information I needed prior to enrolment, all was very informative and useful and my advisor Ciaran was very helpful and happy to answer any questions I had.  The enrolment process was very easy, simple and straightforward-Looking forward to starting the course.

headline: Amazing Tutor and support from Dr Stephen Littler at ICS
reviewBody: I have just completed the first module of my foundation certificate CIPD. I have not done any academic work for almost 10 years so really struggled when it came to completing my first assignment! My tutor Stephen Littler was incredibly supportive, understanding and always made time for me and my silly questions! Without his help I would have been lost! Many thanks! Zoe

headline: Feedback about Dr. Littler
reviewBody:
I am a student for Level 3 Foundation Diploma in Learning & Development Practise. I just started studying recently, but soon noticed the active contributions by Dr. Littler. 

I just watched his latest webinar on Corporate Social Responsibility. It was insightful (as he did his PHD on the subject), but it was also balanced and very actual. He highlighted very current cases and gave enough references for further deeper studies. Considering that he did it for a small group of students, I like to congratulate him on his positive and enthusiastic delivery, and like to to encourage him to keep his sincere and intrinsic desire to help us ICS students on all levels.

Thank you, Dr. Littler !   

Thomas

headline: GCSE ENGLISH LANGUAGE
reviewBody: I contacted ICS to register for the above course, and found them to be extremely informative and helpful regarding information about the course and exams, and the process of enrollment and payments.

headline: HRM1 workshop with Stephen Litter
reviewBody: This workshop with Stephen was so valuable , the information he shared and explained was precise , accurate , knowledgeable and translated to us in a way that we couldn't fail. I am so grateful for having such a fantastic tutor it really means a lot how much passion and effort Stephen puts into his workshops and time spent with each of us . Thank you so much and I will be so eternally appreciative for your help in aiding our success !!! Thank you, Sepi Poeira

Having successfully enrolled I feel very confident in my choice of training provider.  Many thanks to Nicola for her time and support.

headline: Very patient and knowledgable
reviewBody: I had many questions about the course, future courses and qualifications. I found my adviser to be very patient, attentive and knowledgeable.

headline: Nicola Dexter
reviewBody:
I found Nicola to be very helpful, she knew all about the course I wanted to  take and was able to provide me with the correct information.  

Looking forward to starting my course with ICS learn!!

headline: Really helpful

headline: great service
reviewBody: My advisor had the technical and people skills to respond to all my queries swiftly and efficiently. Liked the out of office hours availability shown by Ciaran.

headline: Getting started
reviewBody: Michelle was vey helpful and gave me an encouraging start to my learning experience with ICSLearn

headline: helpful and friendly service
reviewBody: Andrew has been very helpful on the online chat and over the phone. Very impressed so far :-)

headline: First Class Service
reviewBody: I would highly recommend ICS for furthering your studies.  I received the materials within a week and had my login details within days.  The materials and support is as good as being in class.  They have a lot of other resources to help re-enforce your learning each step of the way, giving you the reassurance that you are on track but also support if you are struggling.  As I have experience in my field my studies will be completed in half the time!!

headline: Really informative, reassuring, helpful and friendly A*
reviewBody:
Was so easy to do and Anne Marie my course advisor was so helpful and friendly, quick to respond to any query. Would defiantly recomend. 

Great start to a new career fingers crossed !!

headline: ICS CIPD Level 5 Diploma (and Paul Martin)
reviewBody: After contacting ICS, I received a quick and efficient response full of relevant detail from Paul Martin. After providing me clear outline briefs of the two courses I was confused between, I had a phone call with Paul who helped me decide which course was for me. He clearly knew his knowledge and was able to steer me in the correct direction, of which I sincerely appreciate. When I asked for time to think, I was politely given this, compared to other companies who hounded me for an answer. I was emailed updated prices and special offers in a timely manner. Given my difficult timetable, the communication was strong and flexible as I had conversations at a time to suit me. Overall, I appreciate the help that I was given in choosing this course and the time that I was given by Paul, thank you!

headline: New Student
reviewBody: Have just signed up w/ICS for the Human Resource diploma course.  I chose them not only because of all the course offers (mentors, e-books, various support) but because Paul Martin was so very helpful after I had a horrific experience with the Home Learning College while researching which company to choose.  Paul answered every question I had (and there was a list) with real answers, not just generalities, which is very much appreciated.  Although I am only at the beginning of my coursework, I have every confidence that after careful comparison I have made the right decision.

headline: Excellent, friendly service
reviewBody: Anne Marie was extremely friendly and helpful to me right from the start. Was a pleasure to talk to and will not hesitate to contact her in the future.

headline: easy, trouble free enrolment
reviewBody: from start to finish, this has been a very easy and supportive process. andrew has respond to my requests for information promptly and accuratly. I would certainly reccomend ICS to anyone thinking of completing a course they offered

headline: Fantastic Service
reviewBody: Very quick and easy. Spot on and done within no time. Many thanks Great work

headline: Great
reviewBody: When I made my enquiry I spoke to Nicola and she was a great help. Very present and helpful.

headline: Happy days, been really helpful so far. Hopefully shall continue!
reviewBody: There's been a lot to take in with studying 4 GCSEs online, and Fraser has been really useful. Helping to explain everything to the best of his knowledge. I believe i'll be handed over to the course tutors shortly, but I know if I need any other help i'll be able to ring him.

headline: Excellent customer service
reviewBody: Lovely chap! Great service A star!!

headline: Very warm/friendly and helpful
reviewBody: It is hard choosing a provider when many companies offer similar things within their packages, as soon as I spoke to ICS it made me feel like this was the company I wanted to go with. Other companies sounded like they were reading out of a text book and withheld information about P&P ect, Anne Marie told me everything I needed to know and more, she cared and took the time to explain everything to me. Very impressed :-)

headline: Excellent service
reviewBody: Everything was thoroughly explained to me, and the course advisor I spoke to, Naela, was extremely kind and helpful, immediately putting me at ease.

headline: customer service great
reviewBody: Sammy has helped and supported  me throughout my journey to explore the best course options for me, and has been great with following up all steps along. now I am really excited to start the course and see where it takes me.

headline: Maths review so far
reviewBody:
I have been studying this course for approx 1 Month and so far so good. 
Melissa Lieberman is one of the course tutors and has put in a lot of work in to produce video lessons as well as live lessons.  
During the live lessons you are able to interact with Melissa, 
Once off line you can contact Melissa during week day office hours as well as another tutor during out of office hours.
To have such a friendly and understanding teacher has worked wonders for me already.  I must say I felt completely useless at maths before starting this course and I am now starting to have some faith in myself. 
I would like to say Thank you to Melissa for all the support you have put into place and how much nicer you have made the experience of learning.

Sue

headline: Excellent Support and answered all of my questions
reviewBody: I dealt with Anne Marie at ICS, Who has been so helpful throughout the registration process,and I have now started my journey for my ICS Training, and I couldn't be more thrilled.

headline: Very good service :)

I was nervous about the maths GCSE but was put at ease after I was told I would have a course tutour and they were there to help. I cant wait to start now :)

headline: Super Service!
reviewBody:
I have had a call this evening with course advisor Nicola who was lovely.
She talked me through the payment plan for my chosen course. Where would be best to take my chosen exam, what I should expect from ics and a timeframe for when I can start studying.
Today has been an breath of fresh air - especially compared to other training providers. It is nice that a member of staff who must speak to dozens of people a day can provide such personal service.
I feel very looked after and look forward to studying with ICS

headline: Great service

headline: great service

headline: Excellent service

headline: 3DLA workshop

I actually enjoyed this workshop and hope my next one would have the same atmosphere.

headline: RECCOMENDED

I would fully recommend ICS learn.

headline: Course

headline: Brilliant
reviewBody: Fraser was helpful in every way

headline: AAT ACCOUNTING

headline: Excellent service

I've said goodbye having a clear answer to every single one of my questions and feel confident in ICS as I embark on my studies with them. I plan to share the experience on my social networking pages as im so very pleased. Thank you very much!

headline: Enrolment onto CIPD Course

I look forward to completing my course with ICS and to the continued professional approach from them.

headline: Signing up for a GCSE

I had emailed with some queries and received a very helpful email back, answering these questions and also a follow-up text message to ensure I was happy with his help. Being satisfied, I then requested a call back from Gurdeep at ICS Learn to discuss my chosen courses - he was very courteous and easy to talk with. I am now looking forward to my time with ICS Learn, and am confident that if I need to ask Gurdeep for any advice or help in future, he will only be too willing to help.

headline: Excellent service from the course advisors
