Course provider was incredibly helpful and offered great information really quickly. Very flexible with getting in touch at a time that suited me and got me all the information I needed to help me make my decision.

I would recommend anyone who wished to follow a career in accounting, to get in touch with ICS Learn to help guide them through the process.

headline: Fast service
reviewBody: Very helpful and friendly, providing all of the information I needed 😀

headline: Absolutely fantastic service
reviewBody: I am extremely pleased with the level of service provided, I had no trouble what so ever and Andy was very helpful, I will definitely recommend ICS and will use them for higher level courses.

headline: Service obtained from consultant on the phone
reviewBody: I would recommend them to anyone. Quick and easy to deal with.

headline: Friendly and informative
reviewBody:
ICS helped me make the right decision for me, they didn't try and over sell me anything or make me sign up to something that wasn't right for me.  There prices are very competitive and they make sure you are aware of every cost event those that aren't directly from them i.e. exam fees, etc. 
I just hope their course tutors and mentors are as good as their advisers.
I would have no hesitations in recommending them to anyone.

headline: Enrolment onto AAT Bookkeeping level 2
reviewBody:
My impression of this company based on my contact with Anne Marie was second to none. This lady is perfectly suited to offering services by telephone. She covered everything with a positive, friendly nature. Very refreshing :-)

Phil Mock

headline: Excellent customer service!!!
reviewBody: Very professional and welcoming approach (great customer service skills from the first moment). Made me feel very confident!! Thank you.

headline: Professionalism
reviewBody:
I would like to thank Michelle Kerr for helping me in choosing the right CIPD degree that fits my needs. 
I have contact her for the first time at the morning. At the night, i was already enrolled in the degree we have chosen.

Thanks ICS for the great service
And Thanks Michelle for your kind help

headline: Very good service, very helpful.
reviewBody: Made everything clear, friendly, helpful. Overall very good.

headline: Good overview and fast respond
reviewBody: Thanks john for taking the time and explaining everything over and over again.

headline: Excellent Service
reviewBody: I have had a good experience speaking with one of your course advisors Colin he was extemely helpful and pleasant he got me enrolled on the maths GCSE course I couldn't recommend ICS enough their staff are lovely

headline: Brilliant service
reviewBody: Spoke to Fraser who enrolled me onto gcse maths, very helpful when I had questions, will do other courses with ICS

headline: Excellent service
reviewBody: Fraser was very helpful, he made the whole process  easy to understand and simple. Excellent service, could not have been better.

headline: Speedy, informative and professional service.
reviewBody: ICS have been nothing but highly professional and responsive to all my queries whilst deciding which qualifications to pursue. They have  made the process of enrolling extremely easy and all material I have seen to date is well laid out and informative. I did consider other companies but the excellent service I have received from ICS made them my first choice.

headline: Very helpful
reviewBody:
Of course, we are just starting out with the company, but I can surely say that my experience with Naela was very good. She has been patient with ironing out issues with our complex situation and very helpful in answering questions, Glad that my daughters are finally enrolled and looking forward to working together further towards helping them getting their A Level courses and exams completed.

Thank you very much.

Annamaria A.

headline: excellent
reviewBody: Paul was very helpful and very encouraging.  He allowed me time to ask questions if needed.  The whole enrolment process was easy.  Highly recommended!

headline: ICS Learn - Naela
reviewBody:
Naela was very helpful in guiding me through the enrolment process. No question was to difficult to answer.  I was treated with the utmost professionalism.  I am now looking forward to studying Biology GCSE.

S Hartnell

headline: Very good service
reviewBody: Very good service! Quick and easy set up for course 😃

headline: Helpful but a little rude
reviewBody: All was explained correctly about paying the course but was left not knowing how to go forward after paying my money as in starting the course. The person I spoke 2 was a little rude which I didn't appreciate.

headline: Initial experience of ICS Learn
reviewBody: I spoke with a lovely guy called Paul Martin.  Talked me through everything and explained payment plan, duration of the course, what support would be available etc. Couldn't fault him or his professionalism.

headline: Couldn't have asked for a better service!
reviewBody: From the very beginning Anne Marie was polite and helpful, had answers to all my questions, and helped me make the right choice. ICS was the only company I spoke to who didn't try to push me into making a split decision on the first phone call, Anne Marie gave me all the information I needed and gave me time to make my decision which was exactly what I needed. Thanks so much!

headline: Excellent!
reviewBody: Communication with ICS could not have been easier. responses to questions were quick and all information given was relevant and useful.

headline: Quick and easy service.
reviewBody: Called up ICS Learn and was able to enrol onto the course immediately with little hassle and no time wasted. The call up gave me precise knowledge about what I would undertake and how exactly the course worked. All my queries were answered and the therefore I decided to sign up straight away.

headline: Mind change
reviewBody:
some years ago I felt extremely disappointed with the Mentoring process ICS offered, it was to say the least dismal and unhelpful, however, prior to enrolling (2015) and since I have been enrolled and working through my course studies, the change is a welcoming feel, although there are a few things to iron out with the system, I cannot honestly find fault with the Mentoring Process. Mentors are much more responsive, assisting and patient with giving advice and assistance to any problems students may bring to them. I am working through my course with a better frame of thinking than in the past, so long may it continue, not just for me but for future students also.
well done ICS, the make-over is giving off a positive effect.

headline: Booking an AAT 2 Level Course
reviewBody: Just booked an AAT 2 course, the process was really easy and everything was explained. The operative I spoke to was warm, friendly and very knowledgeable. Looking forward to starting the course and fingers crossed I will pass.

headline: Quick, simple and great customer service
reviewBody: I had a bad time at sixth form and didn't get the grades I wanted. Collin at ics made the process as easy as possible and now I'm getting back on my feet!

headline: Brilliant service, helpful adviser, clear concise information
reviewBody: Anne marie was extremely helpful! I appreciate that she was not pushy in any way, and just gave me the information  i requested and allowed me time to get in touch and enrol. Looking forward to my new big challenge. :-)

headline: Friendly
reviewBody: My experience was very easy, friendly and helpful. Would definitely recommend to a friend

headline: Very clear and friendly service
reviewBody: Service was very clear and personable and helped to give me all the information I needed to decide on which course to enrol on.

headline: Excellent advice and very helpful, friendly staff
reviewBody: Enrolling 2 boys on GCSE and A Level courses made very easy by the helpful and friendly staff at ICS. Highly recommended!

headline: Mentor Support
reviewBody: The first few weeks were overwhelming, especially starting out by yourself! Getting in touch with my tutor initiated communication and immediately puts me at ease. My tutor helps clarify my thoughts, and helps me notice things I may have missed. It's great to have someone to keep in contact with, and to talk you through simple steps that seemed difficult to deal with alone. Thank you!

headline: Great friendly, courteous and quick help!
reviewBody: Colin is friendly, easy to speak to and a great help!

headline: Great information, great service and no pressure
reviewBody:
i would recommend ICS Learn to anyone based on my experience. From making an initial enquiry to enrolling for my course, the service was fantastic. I was worried I would be placed under pressure to sign up immediately, however I never felt under pressure to commit and that was made very clear. The information provided was comprehensive and all my questions were answered fully.

Many thanks to Paul Martin for being so helpful and professional.

headline: Course Enrolment
reviewBody: So far the service from Nicola has been fantastic. I have had all my questions answered, my expectations managed and contacted when I have asked for without being pushy! Really delighted can not wait to start

headline: Mechanical engineering course
reviewBody: Spoke to a guy called Colin, very informative and positive, told him I'm wanting to change trades or aid my current trade and he was very enthusiastic about it. Hopefully something good will come of it!

headline: Excellent customer service and advice
reviewBody: Enrolment for the A Level course in maths was a breeze. Naela, the course advisor, was very helpful, friendly, and provided lots of information and encouragement for my prospective enrolment. I look forward to receiving the material, and if I study with half the motivation and enthusiasm of your course advisor, I endeavour to achieve a top grade and then embark on the next stage of my aspirations in mathematics.

headline: ISC learn is great
reviewBody: Signed up to ICS learn very quickly and easily & Fraser who helped sign me up was very helpful and lovely!

headline: Easy to get going!
reviewBody: After other courses failing to impress, I was cautious looking into this one. Talking to one of the advisors out my mind at ease straight away, knowing that my learning was in safe hands, I didn't wait to sign up! Can't wait!

headline: Success of enrolment
reviewBody: Feel I've made a good choice choosing ics learn to help me learn and study my course. They have helped me choose the right course to suit me. Very good description given and good all round customer service.

headline: I would definitely recommend ICS
reviewBody: Ever since I ask for information this was delivered quickly and clearly. Prices are transparent and Nicola always explains conditions and terms of the course in a promptly and clear manner.

headline: Great Service
reviewBody: Ann Marie was lovely and always kept in touch with reminders as well as reassuring me to overcome any doubts I had in terms of my long term goals. I work in a bank where nothing short of Extremely Satisfied counts and that is what I am. Great service!

headline: Excellent Service!
reviewBody: I enquired about starting the CIPS Level 3 course with ICS and I am really glad I did! Anne Marie responded to my enquiry very quickly and provided all of the information I needed.  The discounted price and the interest free payment plan was a bonus and I quickly decided to go for it! Anne Marie was very friendly, immediately made me feel comfortable and answered my questions effortlessly, I would and will definitely recommend to any of my friends looking to start a CIPS course.  I can't wait to get started!

headline: Excellent company to deal with.
reviewBody: I found ICS Learn a very professional company to deal with and they were always very polite and prompt to respond with any enquiries I had.

headline: ICS Mathematics
reviewBody:
Poor support:

I have paid for my course over a week now and still not been able to log in. I was told, the details for me to log-in would be sent to me, but this did not happen.

There was and still no support from you. You have made the log-in and study material un-accessible.

headline: No communication since signing up with ICS....
reviewBody: ICS were quick to answer my queries before I had decided to sign up to the course, however I have had several queries over the course of a week since signing up with them and I have been completely ignored! I will be cancelling my course and going elsewhere.

headline: ICS Review
reviewBody:
Have recently enrolled onto the BTEC mechanical engineering course with ICS. The service has been very efficient, with no messing around like you can experience with other training companies. 

I would thoroughly recommend them to anyone seeking further education courses, at very reasonable prices.

headline: Best Tutor
reviewBody: My tutor is Stephen Littler at ICS Learn. He is an amazing and helpful person. He always helps me a lot. Thank you Stephen.

headline: Great service so far
reviewBody: I enquired late last night about course information. First thing this morning I had a phone call from Colin to talk me though the options, all enrolled and ready to learn in the space of a 10minute phone call. Excellent service so far :-)

headline: I would definitely recommend ICS Learn.
reviewBody: I have been paying for my daughter to do her CIPD through ICS Learn. My daughter says that the coursework is very comprehensive and organised. She was amazed at how quickly her essay was marked, handed it in at 8pm returned by 10am the next morning. She has found the workshops really interesting and beneficial. I have had dealings with the finance department, the staff that I have spoken to have been always very polite and helpful. I must mention Douglas I was very impressed with his customer service, which is second to none. He has kept in constant contact with me, explaining what will happen and when; Douglas is a great ambassador for the company.

headline: Good
reviewBody: The Service was very good, now I'm Just waiting for my login Details to start my A-Level Maths Course

headline: Great help and Advice :)
reviewBody: Having been out of HR for many years wanted to get back into and needed advice on courses, Michelle Kerr, a course advisor was amazing and so helpful. Answered my many questions but also what I liked is there was no pressure for me to book. Looking forward to starting the course now which I have booked today :)

headline: Excellent enrolment service.
reviewBody: The enrolment service for ICS is excellent.  The course advisor had great customer service skills and was understanding about my learning background.  I was given all the information I needed to begin the course, which was very helpful.  Enrolment was very quick also.

headline: CIPD - Great blend of "at your own pace" plus support
reviewBody: I found the ICS team to be really responsive and friendly, via the official forums, email and even facebook.  No question too silly (thankfully!) and loads of support.  The notes were comprehensive but the assignments gave enough scope for following your own interests which was nice too.  I liked that, if you wanted to just get on with your own thing, there was a lot of independence in the learning process; support was there if you needed it but never looking over your shoulder if you were quite happily doing your own thing.

headline: Business Studies - Don't look anywhere else!
reviewBody: Prompt response to original query and very professional.  Excellent customer service.  Clear and concise breakdown on course content.

headline: Course enrolment with ICS
reviewBody: Michelle has always been very patient and not at all pushy which gave me the confidence to choose ICS as my course provider.  Always available at e end of the phone and very professional and helpful - you can't ask for anything more!

headline: Really helpful
reviewBody: I enquired about ILM online and had a response the next day.  I spoke to Anne Marie who was so helpful and encouraging.  The whole process was quick and straight forward and I can't wait to get started.  One happy student!

headline: Fantastic Customer Service
reviewBody: Answered all of my questions promptly and thoroughly.  Really looking forward to starting my AAT level 2 course.  Price is very reasonable compared to other company's and the option for interest free payments has really helped me out.  Special thanks to course advisor Anne-Marie!

headline: Very Helpful
reviewBody: After deciding to do a course within HR, i looked around at many options. This one seemed the best one suited to me. Michelle was very helpful and was happy to answer ALL the questions i had. This helped me with which course was best for me. Now i cant wait to get started..

headline: CIPD Advanced Award - Reward Management
reviewBody: Stephen was very helpful when helping me with my reward assignment - good detailed discussions, recommending alternative sources to refer to with a friendly supportive approach.  I would have no hesitation in calling Stephen again, and again :-)

headline: Thank you
reviewBody: Paul was very helpful and made everything very easy. He remember our previous conversation which meant I didn't have to repeat myself, he knew the answers to all of my questions. Excellent service

headline: Complete professional service.
reviewBody:
Friendly down to earth staff member, Annemarie McGarry, who gave all the information required in a clear, concise way. 
The live chat was answered instantly and I was put through to Annemarie in less than a minute.  Annemarie quickly established what I required and how she could help me via a telephone call.
Call was made and Annemarie handled the whole thing professionally.

I am so happy with my choice of learning provider and will be recommending ICS to my family and friends.  What I thought was going to be a daunting first step has left me feeling ready and prepared to begin my journey.

headline: Workshop on Delivering L&D activities
reviewBody: Great workshop with many interesting discoveries! Stephen is a great tutor, really enjoyed the event and gained new skills and knowledge.

headline: Excellent Tutor!
reviewBody: The service and assistance that I received from Stephen Littler was excellent. I found him to be extremely helpful and very knowledgeable. I would definitely recommend ICS College to others.

headline: Easily accessible
reviewBody:
I found that the enrolment process was extremely accessible for someone with such a busy schedule; all of my queries were answered in a well structured and informative manner - with thanks to Melissa O'Brien, my course advisor. Thus, the enrolment process was fulfilled with ease. 

I would definitely recommend ICS Learn, and I look forward to my future with ICS!

headline: Great!
reviewBody: I'm happy I chose ICS.  Stephen Littler and the other tutors are helpful and informative.  I would highly recommend.

headline: Stephen Littler
reviewBody: Stephen was really responsive and made my experience completing my first assignment a pleasant one.

headline: Excellent!
reviewBody: Very fast and easy to enroll. Course adviser Anne Marie McGarry very friendly and helpful, answered any questions without hesitation. Would recommend.

headline: Dedicated CIPD support
reviewBody: Stephen Littler in particular was incredibly helpful and accommodating during the workshops and when I needed help with the assignments. He  gave thorough feedback and was always responded quickly. Very approachable and professional!

headline: Phone call to enrol on course - IAB Level 2
reviewBody: I found the service to be straight forward and was enrolled on the course within minutes

headline: How easy was that!
reviewBody:
A simple enquiry led to all the information I needed to pick the right course combination  for me; an informed decision and super easy sign up with fantastic payment options available. 

Credit to Ann Marie!, not only did she communicate with me clearly each step of the way but was on hand to get me signed up, answer my questions and put me right at ease - telling me exactly what to expect next, and of course wishing me the best of luck!

headline: Fantastic
reviewBody: Very easy to sign up to courses, I have found all staff to be very helpful and knowledgable and you feel at ease when you talk to them. Would recommend!

headline: Socrative Student - Stephen Littler Webinar 17th July 2015
reviewBody: I was invited to join a webinar byStehen with the option of downloading the Socrative student app to be used during the webinar. At first I was a bit unsure as to how this would be any fun or help at all. But after carrying it out it was great, very simple to use and interactive. It also gave students the ability to see other students thoughts and feedback on questions asked by Stephen which really built my confidence on my current knowledge and what my next step should be for the successful completion of my Level 5 CIPD Diploma in HR Management course.

headline: Brilliant
reviewBody:
I have had a really great experience so far, Michelle has been helping me along the way. I've had lots of questions and she's been really helpful and patient. 
Gave me the time I needed to make my decisions & nothing has been too much. 
Highly recommended. 
Thank you!

headline: Excellent use of webinar
reviewBody:
Great tutors and mentor and my first workshop was very enjoyable. 
Good use of the webinar too. Stephen hosted an excellent session and was also quick to address a small query I had following this.

headline: ICS LEARN | Who says distance learning can be frustrating
reviewBody:
If you’ve come this far, then no doubt considering distance learning, and trying to figure out which company to choose.  You will most probably have heard some or all of the following comments: “You will have to have lots of motivation to succeed.  There won’t be much support; you’ll be on your own with your books. Good luck trying to speak with you tutor if you need guidance or feedback.”

I signed up with ICS to study a recognised certification course fast track. Time is of the essence for me and yes I'm motivated. The company provides course books for each module that are professional both in  content and presentation.  I have attended workshops covering four modules so far; each one animated by its dedicated tutor. In addition to the professional body’s own website, which provides a wealth of information and interactive tools, ICS also runs a student website and online community. 

Tutors are available to help with any concerns a student may have and give expert guidance. As part of its course resources, ICS also runs webinars and if you are not able to attend, the audio and slides are made available on their website rapidly. This is another great way to interact with tutors and stidents alike,  I have also exchanged emails and spoken with tutors over the telephone.  

One final comment: My tutor is currently on her summer vacation. This might have posed a problem with another company, not with ICS though.  So, I would like to give a special shout out of thanks to Dr S. Littler for his valuable assistance during my tutor’s short absence.

My star rating says it all.

headline: ICS Mentors: What a Great Team!
reviewBody: Thank you to Craig Dunn and Stephen Littler for their support for me, whilst doing my ICS Level 5 Diploma on HR. Always so friendly and encouraging. It is much appreciated in helping me get through the programme.

headline: Excellent tutor support at ICS
reviewBody: I recently completed my CIPD Level 3 in HR Practice and received assistance from Stephen Littler at ICS as a support tutor. Stephen was very helpful, insightful and offered guidance during my final assignment. He also assisted me with some problems I experienced regarding my final submission and study support period. Stephen is patient, friendly, knowledgable and enthusiastic. I am very grateful for the support he provided and I only wish I had spoken to him earlier!

headline: Great learning support
reviewBody:
I started an Intermediate HR Diploma with ICS about 4 months ago, and I have found them to be very helpful and supportive organisation to study with.  

I recently attended an ICS webinar to assist with the first couple of coursework pieces.  The tutor Stephen Littler was very engaging and offered a lot of useful help and advice for my coursework.  The webinar was interactive and will definitely assist me when I come to start writing these coursework pieces.

headline: Very helpful!
reviewBody: I called/emailed ICS many times enquiring about the course, I always spoke to Ciaran, he was very helpful and gave clear, useful information about the course. I have just signed up and look forward to starting my course

headline: Tough Decision Made Easy
reviewBody: I know that accountancy is something that I want to do when I'm older but I wasn't really aware of how to get there. I had a look further into it and realised that the AAT courses were the stepping stones that I need to take. I had been in contact with a 5 or 6 companies to find out a little more about the courses and what I would have to do, where I would need to go and where it would take me in the future. Anne-Marie helped me to finalise my decision. She was very helpful and answered all of my questions  with the answers I was looking for and I didn't have to wait days or weeks for a reply like with the others (I even waited for her to come off holiday before I went ahead). I would like to thank Anne for making my decision a lot easier for me and being so helpful over the last few weeks. I can't wait to start.

headline: Good service
reviewBody: Really please with customer service.

headline: Easy enrolment
reviewBody: Easy to enrol and good communication with team

headline: A level maths
reviewBody: Excellent service

headline: Easy, clear and helpful
reviewBody: Paul was very informative and very calm and reassuring. Answered all my questions. Very good first impression.

headline: Easy, honest and comfrtable decision made with the help of a trustworthy CIPD advisor.
reviewBody: Having previously explored different course providers to study my CIPD level 7 in HRM, I've always been put off by pushy sales people who don't seem interested in helping you to enrol in the right course but just chasing the enrolment. Paul at ICS was extremely helpful and showed interest as to what my needs were, he was very informative as to ICS success with CIPD level 7 study, answered every question I had (and more) and kept in close communication with me. He offered much advice around payment queries whether being funded by a company or self-funding options, he explained in depth how the course can be adapted to suit your lifestyle/other commitments which was great, advice around exam costs, CIPD membership and how ICS would support me through all the above. Very comfortable that I have chosen the right course provider to support me. Highly advise anyone looking to further their studies within the CIPD to use ICS, the experience up to now has been a good one.

headline: Margaret Duffy Review
reviewBody:
Maggie, the advisor was very clear and helpful. I need to take the exams in January and she has assured me this is possible which is a huge relief. The advisor was polite and efficient as the payment process was quick. 

I am very please with the service provided.

headline: Quick and efficient
reviewBody:
Easy to navigate website!
Chat option is fantastic and easy to use. Polite and friendly manner fro ICS REP! Very happy with service and information.

headline: excellent webinar maths lessons
reviewBody:
Being able to have live interactive maths lessons via webinars with such an excellent and knowledgeable maths teacher (Melissa), really makes you feel apart of a real classroom.
Anything we are unsure of, and the ics teachers are very happy to help by talking us through any tricky topics, also sending over lots of usefull information and links to practice questions.
Being able to talk to the other students during lessons and on forum is also very helpful.

I would highly recommend ICS maths, and I hope that other subjects might have live webinars in the future.
As I will be doing more courses through ICS after completing this one.

thankyou..

headline: Website Issues and bad customer service. Disappointed
reviewBody: Study material was not available when I had signed up. Spoke to a member of staff in April 2015 who confirmed I can sit for the exams in June 2015 but not study material other than the course assessment guide. Tried to explain my issue to a member of staff who abruptly closed the chat twice without replying. Extremely disappointed

headline: Good service so far.
reviewBody: Only recently signed up, but so far it's been a pretty good service. I've used this company before 8 years ago, so I'm hoping they still provide a good service.

headline: A professional and honest service provider
reviewBody: When I decided to go for AAT courses I had a look at several course providers and ICS came as the one whose approach I liked best. They presented their offer to me but didn't keep bothering me every day trying to get money out of me, but always responded to my queries within a couple of hours. They gave me all the information I wanted without asking for any guarantees and also offered a range of payment options. "My" advisor, Michelle, responded to my emails quickly and her responses very always to the point. I plan to do all of my AAT with them.

headline: Excellent Service!
reviewBody:
Many thanks for an excellent and speedy service. Within 24 hours of requesting some information I had been registered for the course of my choice. 
Great communication included a generic "thank you for your request" email followed swiftly by a personal email from a course advisor who promised a phone call. Before phoning me she texted to ask when I was free and got in touch shortly afterwards.
She clarified a couple of points which I had questions about, and enabled me to pay either by installments or in total there and then. However, there was no pressure to make the decision as to whether or not to proceed at that point, it was purely that I had sufficient information for me to make the decisioon to go ahead.
Very painless registration process! 
Many thanks to Mellisa for her help.
Kind regards
Yvonne Cotterill

headline: Very efficient
reviewBody: It was very quick and easy with all the help I needed.

headline: Smooth.
reviewBody:
Great customer service and etiquette.
Thank you Michelle.

headline: Good Service!
reviewBody: Colin was quick to call me after my request and I understood and was enrolled within a few hours. Happy Bunny!

headline: brilliant,helpful friendly service
reviewBody: Anne Marie was brilliant. Arranged to have a chat about the course, and when she couldn't keep to the time due to a meeting she arranged for someone else to call me. She then followed that up, and helped in any way she could, remaining friendly and professional throughout. Would definitely recommend any to contact ICS and Anne Marie. Thank you!

headline: Quick, friendly and assured service!
reviewBody: Spoke to a very friendly man named Colin U. He responded to my emails within minutes and when asked if he could call internationally, and immediately, he did so with haste! Great first time ICS experience.

headline: Excellent
reviewBody: Very professional. I would recomend the company to anyone

headline: Friendly, helpful and quick to get underway
reviewBody: Anne was lovely to speak to. Gave me all the information I needed. She set me up with my course quick and officiantly. Great service!

headline: Beyond helpful ...
reviewBody:
Deciding on a qualification and level was proving to be a difficult choice, I called ICS and spoke to course advisor Michelle Kerr, she carefully considered all of my options before advising me on the best possible route for me. She was personable, helpful and friendly. 

Having dealt with other providers of distance qualifications, I won't hesitate to say that ICS (and Michelle) have been my far the best!

headline: Clear, thorough and supportive
reviewBody: My call from ICS was not rushed, with all details clearly covered at a perfect pace. All my questions were answered, I felt that I had no concerns at the end of the call.

headline: Excellent Service
reviewBody: I spoke to Paul Martin to initially enquire.  He gave me all the advice I needed and I subsequently enrolled.  Paul did contact me at times that were appropriate for me too.

headline: Kind Introduction & Communication
reviewBody: Applied for BTEC Level 3 Certificate in Mechanical Engineering at ICS and had prompt responses  from a course advisor (Anne Marie) for all queries. I believe the communication and support during studying will be spot on.

headline: Prompt and Efficient Service
reviewBody: I received excellent customer service from Paul Martin at ICS Glasgow, who answered my queries and enrolled me on my course before competitors had even replied to my initial enquiries.

headline: Excellent Service.
reviewBody: Spoke to Anne Marie, over live chat and telephone, very nice to speak to, pleasant and well mannered, would recommend an ICS course to anyone, very helpful.

headline: Great, friendly service

Many thanks :)

headline: Excellent service

Spoke to Melissa, course advisor. 
Very nice and polite. Website easy to use and everything is explained very well

headline: Really helpful
reviewBody: This was the most straightforward sign-up process I've ever experienced. No confusion, just straightforward instructions and really prompt and helpful communication. Well done!

headline: HRM in Context & Leading, Managing and Developing People Workshop
reviewBody:
The workshop was quite engaging with hands on exercises for the students.
Dr. Littler within the time available was able to cover a lot of grounds thereby making it easier and giving us confidence to go on.
The teacher/student relationship was quite cordial.
It was great fun learning with him.

headline: Melissa O'Brien - What a lovely girl!
reviewBody:
I sent an email of interest to ICS regarding the IGCSE Science and GCSE Maths, as I am hoping to become a Midwife but need these qualifications to do so.
Melissa O'Brien immediately emailed me, answered my questions and asked if and when it would be appropriate to call me to discuss my interest. There was no pushy sales (which really puts me off) and Melissa gave me all the answers and information I needed.
I came to the decision to go ahead with my qualifications, and I thank Melissa for that, and for helping to make the experience so easy.

headline: Brilliant !!
reviewBody: Anne Marie McGarrys advice and help was simply fantastic. She even stayed on at work longer than her working hours to help me. Can't wait to get studying !! Thankyou

headline: Very helpful
reviewBody: Very nice , couldn't of helped me more

headline: Great Service
reviewBody: Ann-Marie and Andrew have been very helpful guiding me through all the options available. The process was very quick and easy to set up with each step clearly explained along the way

headline: Very kind Course advisor
reviewBody: Maggie informed me about the course and could answer any question I had with kindness. Very satisfied so far and looking forward to receiving the course!

headline: 2 Amazing Tutors
reviewBody: I've been with ICS just over a year and I have felt their support is rather lacking, considering the amount of money I have paid for my CIPD its been quite disappointing. Yesterday I was contacted by Stephen Littler who is another one of the tutors, but I hadn't had any prior dealings with him and well he is a star, he has been so helpful and accommodating with giving me some real tips and insight into bettering my assignments. I would also like to mention John Prokopiw, he is another star! I found John so helpful and ready to help when I needed him, he has a very calm and relaxed approach to his mentoring which I found refreshing. It is because of these two tutors that I'm giving a 5 star, if it hadn't of been for these then it would have been 3.

headline: You won't get help from you course adviser once you enrol

First of all course adviser Anne Marie was very helpful, explained me everything, replied to my emails straight away but it doesn't last long. Once I enroll my course adviser has gone. I emailed her-I haven't received a response, texted her- again nothing. 
I can't say anything bad about course, because I haven't started to study yet still waiting for more info. I hope I won't disappoint with my studies either.  
Now I do understand, adviser is nice with you and helpful until your enrollment. Once they've got what they wanted they just disappear.

headline: Don't bother if you're doing A Levels!!
reviewBody:
I give this 2 stars because the people dealt with were polite... but that is about it. and that is how they lead you into thinking you will be supported throughout. I have had a terrible experience with ICS, and have not used the folders or online support at all this year as it was such a hindrance. My coursework module was incorrectly graded with a 'glitch' allowing me to use it as a template for all my work going forward, waste 4 months on it, and believe that what I would have sent off would have been an A grade. It would have actually been a fail. and seeing as I have a university place reliant on these grades I was devastated. I have since had to pay for an actual tutor  which I should have just done in the first place. the exam board websites (which you will need anyway) are so much more helpful. My first exam is today, and if I pass NONE of the credit will go to ICS. If you are considering A Levels then PLEASE look into alternatives before diving into distance learning, there are so many cheaper alternatives! I should note that I was given a £100 refund. But seeing as overall I payed between £700 and £800 (and £1000 to an exam center to sit the exams) I can't say this is a good use of anyones hard earned money.


Edit regarding the response below from ICS: I'm sorry but due to the levels of distress your company has caused me unless I will be entitled to a further refund I have no desire to contact your customer service line, but will make it very clear to others so future A Level students do not make the same mistake. My student number is 20956618 - please only contact me if it does regard a refund.

headline: Was able to answer all my questions and helped me make a positive step to my future.
reviewBody: Anne Marie was easy to talk to, friendly, polite and professional. When I made the call I didn't have a clue how to get started, but when I finished I knew exactly what I was doing and I couldn't wait!

The next day as requested she called me, SHe was friendly we had a giggle made me feel comfortable and we sorted out all the bits and all done. Fantastic service and fantastic staff. Thank you.

All my queries were answered well and I had no reservations about signing up for my a level courses. Thanks again.

headline: Maladministration - be aware of 'miss-selling'
reviewBody:
I made a formal complaint through the recommended ICS complaints service, that was on 14th April 2015 and I have yet to hear any response... it reconfirms my initial complaint that they lack in customer service skills.

I am deeply disappointed to have already spent over £3,000 on a continuous lack of support and to find out I have to pay for additional tutor support, exams as well as the abhorrent payment and study plan which when I signed up for I was told was flexible, its not - if you take a study break they continue to take payments from your account ; all of which I was not advised of prior to signing up, even though I specifically asked this very question before signing up to study with them as I knew I would need the full flexibility of paying and studying at a time that was convenient to me. Complete waste of money and a huge money making scheme, particularly when you are spending over £6,000 on a course! 

Just be aware of what you are signing up to... it may not be as flexible and supportive as you think !

*update*
Offering a refund of £130 is quite frankly unacceptable... 

If you entered into an agreement with a company and in doing so you agreed with the terms and conditions of the company contract you wouldn't expect them to with hold the fact that you need to purchase the company uniform. By entering a contract all information should be correctly displayed and given as a matter of formality, by with holding information - particularly relating to additional costs - you are committing 'maladministration'. 

ICS deliberately with held information at the time of entering into a contract and based on the complaints forums I have come across I am not the first person to highlight this.

It also seems unfortunate that as a company who provide HR courses that incidents like this occur.

headline: informative and aspiring
reviewBody: I am so glad I chose to complete studies with ICS. Tutors, mentors and workshop tutors are incredibly helpful and dedicated to providing you with the answers to all your questions.

headline: Excellent
reviewBody: Colin was lovely, he explain all the process to me, and helped with choosing the right course.

headline: excellent customer service
reviewBody:
I was nervous  at first and unsure what to expect with online learning. I was also worried about course fees and so on. 
After speaking to an excellent customer service advisor Paul martin I was reassured with all my worries and questions. The best route to take and set up on an affordable monthly payment plan. 
Paul matin answered all my questions and set me on the correct learning path for me to achieve my full potential and made me no longer feel nervous or anxious of home learning. He was able to get me enrolled fast and easy. Instantly sent me emails with my student number and confirmation of my course, fees and payment etc...
Everything else will arrive within 24 hours. I am very pleased that after years of debating taking up an online course I am finally doing it and am now kicking myself for the years wasted. I can work at my own pace. Complete the AAT Level 2 certificate and joint Level 3 Diploma in accountancy either over 30 months or much quicker, all depends on how fast I want to develop my skills and knowledge. With the help of Paul and ICS I can now say my career and future is bright. Thank you :-)

headline: My Enrollment with Michelle Kerr.
reviewBody:
After weeks of online searching and after being in contact with multiple other course providers I opted for ICS. I found the course advisor incredible, she was polite, friendly and extremely helpful. I was given very detailed information with regards to both the courses i have enrolled on, and i felt that the correspondence i received was very personal, and not just copy and paste emails i have found with other course providers. ICS was also one of the only course providers that offered interest free monthly payments, to make the courses easily affordable. (Another course provider offered payments of £300 a month, which isn't exactly an affordable plan for most people!).

All in all i am incredibly pleased with my experience, I felt that the course advisor wasn't trying to just sell me the courses to get commission (which i have experienced before with other providers), but she was trying to help me find the best course and payment plan to suit my needs and to ensure I was doing what was best for me.

Overall, I am most definitely glad I chose ICS, and I highly recommend them.

headline: Another month comes and goes another month of lies.
reviewBody:
Extremely poor company. This company have been reported to Watchdog as they can not deliver what they advertise and change the rules to suit themselves and the customers are the ones who suffer.

I have been awaiting certification since January after working extremely hard for two years.
 This company has lost direct claims status for all BTEC's,  A levels and higher nationals from awarding bodies such as Edexcel OCR, OCN and  City and Guilds due to malpractice and in appropriate marking,  so can not certify you once you are complete. 
They are extremely well practiced in telling lies and covering up should you ring their premium rate phone number to make enquiries.
Try ringing and asking to be put through to the quality department or exams department if you don't believe me. You will just be fobbed off by "student services"
I have been promised month after month that I will be receiving my qualifications and certificates and that this will be resolved shortly. Even on Trust pilot they said it will be by the end of April. Now they say end of June at the earliest. 
After speaking to the awarding body they confirmed that they will not be certifying. Even though I gained distinctions across the board.

This company are full of lies. They will promise you the world at sign up but once you complete your course, you will not be certified. A total waste of time and money are ICS. 

A fool and his money are soon parted. I guess I was a fool. Make sure you are not. This is why they are no where near the top 20 distance learning centres in the UK.

Just look at the date of their reply for proof of their lies... 24th April ..this has been changed every month by ICS when I have asked for certification. I expect them to tell more lies and change it again shortly. Don't fall for this scam. Watchdog are aware!

headline: I'm so grateful I'm now able to complete this course.

I've made Anne Marie call people in Tenerife just so I could start my course , she has helped me so much! She an absolute star! Thank you so much :)

headline: Excellent, Easy and Very Helpful!
reviewBody:

With ICS, the website is easy to use, hassle-free and they help you with your own payment plan and support you throughout your journey.

It's very easy to study and you can study in your spare time; there's no classroom pressure on you as you are in the comfort of your own home (which is what I love the most!)

I have yet to start studying, but I'm looking very forward to it!

headline: Grateful
reviewBody: The only reason I have rated 4 stars is based on the questionable 'support' I received at the very start of the module. This dramatically improved when Stephen Littler got in touch to offer help and without sounding overly dramatic - basically saved me from quitting!  I recently found out that I passed my dissertation - something which I would never have achieved if it wasn't for his support and encouragement.  Distance learning is incredibly challenging and personally I only think it can be successful if you feel you have an approachable mentor who you can go to if you're finding things tough - I was lucky enough to have this from Stephen. I am really grateful for everything he taught me and hope I can take this forward in my next assignments.

headline: Excellent Course Advisor - Exceptional Customer service experience!
reviewBody: Exceptional customer experience, brilliant at responded back; Anne Marie provided me with all the information that I requested for and answered all queries. At first I was slightly skeptical from buying the course to be honest but after pleasant telephone conversations I had with the course adviser I felt less skeptical and decided upon studying with ICS.

headline: Excellent advice and understanding
reviewBody:
I had spoken to Paul Martin from ICS and I must say he made an offer I could not refuse. He had explained in detail all the options available to me and how I could progress along those lines and at the same time keeping in mind the interests of having the opportunity to learn with expert professionals and guidance.
I must say overall I was very satisfied and pleased with the response and service I got from Paul and well done, that is my honest opinion and I hope it will continue as I go forward in learning and acquiring skills for my new career.

headline: Level 3 Learning and Development Practice
reviewBody:
So far, so good. Distance learning is completely new to me but realistically it's the only way I could have done this course. The materials are well written and easy to read. 

My tutor, Stephen Littler, has been great and the feedback he has provided me with has far exceed my expectations. I've also received written annotations on my work which makes it very easy to see where I can improve.

headline: Excellent service
reviewBody: I spoke to Paul Martin today from ICS and he was amazing. Told me all the options that I could take and told me about the price plans and how much I would have to pay on a monthly basis. I took a bit of time to think about it and because of the amazing service I phoned back to enrol. Thank you for all your help Paul

headline: Returning student
reviewBody: Always helpful. Always polite. I've studied with ICS before and will continue to.

headline: Very helpful
reviewBody: All my questions were answered and the man i spoke to, Colin Urquhart, was very helpful and polite.

headline: Registration onto ICS Child Day Care Course
reviewBody:
I have just enrolled onto the above course and would like to say that i am very happy with the service i received.

I spoke to Anne Marie, the course adviser a few times to discuss my course and options for payment and she was nothing but friendly and professional at all times.  The information i received was clear and concise.

Many thanks,
Gemma McCambridge

headline: amazing service!
reviewBody:
A little thank you too Anne Marie for her outstanding customer service with my enrollment onto my course today. She genuinely took an interest in helping and advising me. Her cheeky accent was slightly hard to understand at times but I'll let her off:)!! 
Big thank you, highly recommended.
Martin K.

headline: Stephen Littler is really supportive
reviewBody: Stephen Littler is a very good mentor, He is very supportive and helpful. If anyone is stuck like I was a call to Stephen Littler will put you back on track.

headline: AAT with ICS
reviewBody: i was provided with an excellent service from ICS, i would recommend this provider to friends and family. i would like to put in the spotlight Paul Martin the course adviser who was really helpful, provided all the correct information that i required which led me to making my decision. He had excellent customer service skills, got back to me on my available timing with quick response which was really appreciated.more People like him would gain you more customers in this business. I have had a good start to my studies with ICS i hope for it to continue this way.

headline: Highly recommend!
reviewBody: Worthwhile, helpful advice and an opportunity to ask questions. Slides are useful during the webinar and ideal that you can watch these back should you not be available to attend. Hope to see more of these for the modules!

headline: Excellent service ever!
reviewBody: Colin Urquhart was very helping, patient and efficient.

headline: Couldn't have asked for a better one!
reviewBody: I phoned up this morning to start the enrollment of my course. By 12pm, I am all signed up and have my student number. Anne Marie was a pleasure to speak to and answered all of my questions with great confidence. I am happy that she is going to be my course advisor.

headline: ICS Learn phone service
reviewBody: Straightforward service, simple, quick, told exactly what I needed to know and not kept waiting long.

headline: Lovely and Friendly
reviewBody: Everything was completed quickly with no hassle.

headline: Stephen Littler - aka The Doc
reviewBody:
I attended a workshop on the 28th February with Stephen Littler from ICS.
He is an outstanding tutor, I found him to be extremely helpful, approachable and engaging. He showed a genuine interest in my success and has been available for extra support when needed! 5 STARS!!

Hi. I bought a gcse course (Maths) and the lady that sold me the pack (Margaret Duffy) was thoroughly professional and helpful. Very happy with the customer service.

Marco Calhorda

headline: Very helpful.
reviewBody: ICS representative was very helpful.  Answered all my questions. Provided all the information.

headline: Excellent service
reviewBody: Informative, helpful, quick and easy service to both apply and enrol on a CIPD course. An excellent service so far that I would highly recommend. Looking forward to starting my course!

headline: Great helpful service and advice
reviewBody: I was unsure about which path to take, I had an idea in mind but had a few reservations. After speaking to an advisor, Colin, he reassured me of the process and what help and facilities would be available to me as well as explaining payment options. I have now signed up and look forward to starting learning.

headline: Very thorough
reviewBody: Melissa was very helpful and supportive, she answered all of my questions and provided precise answers

headline: Excellent workshop by Stephen Littler
reviewBody: I attended a workshop last weekend at BadenPowell with Stephen Littler. It was really superb! I just have to complete Assignment 2 to have my diploma and was totally dreading it and thinking I couldn't manage it but after the workshop and Stephen's help and enthusiasm I came away feeling confident I can do it and am all fired up to get writing :) a big thanks therefore to Stephen.

headline: Excellent experience so far!
reviewBody:
I contacted ICS over their live chat service to enquire about the AAT 2 & 3 Combined. I spoke with Michelle online who was extremely helpful and able to answer all of my questions. Michelle then followed up by sending me an email detailing the conversation we had, course information and various payment options.

I looked at other providers of this course but chose to complete it through ICS because Michelle has dealt with me throughout and ICS do not use pushy sales techniques (something I have experienced from other providers).

I am now looking forward to starting the course!

headline: Quick polite service
reviewBody: The advisor I spoke to was very helpful, polite and dealt with my enquiry efficiently. I then received a follow up call just confirming my enrolment onto the course and checking f I had any questions so far. Excellent customer service.

headline: Very professional service
reviewBody:
From my initial enquiry about the course I found Paul at ICS to be very helpful and informative, I had lots of questions as I have never used distance learning before and he was very patient and explained everything clearly to me. I also liked the fact that he contacted me by text to arrange a convenient time to talk, so I wasn't hounded with calls during work time.

I also felt that I got a great deal compared to other companies I had looked at for the same course.

The Student Services Team and my mentor have also been very helpful. It does take a little while to get everything set up, which I have found a little bit frustrating, but it is great to know there is always someone available for help and support if you need anything, and the service I have had from all the ICS staff so far has been excellent.

headline: Call expeience
reviewBody:
I am very pleased with the help I have received through the phone.I received all information I needed and enjoyed the conversation.

Thank you for your help

Arletta

headline: Very helpful
reviewBody: I found speaking with Stephen Little in relation to assisgnment 3SCO most helpful. Stephen was prompt when replying to messages, provided excellent advice over the telephone and even contacted me via email a few days after our telephone conversation to find out how I was getting on and offered further advice should I require it.

headline: Extremely pleased
reviewBody:
After speaking to Colin Urquhart about retaking my Maths, Science and English GCSE's i felt i had the information i needed to finally go ahead with something that i have been putting off for a long time.

Colin was very helpful in explaining the process and i have now enrolled.

Anyone who is reading this please don't delay, Find the course you need then get stuck in!

headline: Really very helpful
reviewBody: Fantastic help - all my questions were answered in detail, and I was enrolled super quick. Very happy!

headline: Tutor support is excellent!
reviewBody:
Stephen Littler was my Tutor for my first assignment of my CIPD course. I have not studied for over 5 years and was really apprehensive about my writing, referencing and even where to start! 

Stephen was so helpful. His guidance and support have helped me build confidence in what I'm learning and my ability to put this down on paper. He has provided structured and helpful feedback on my assignment which will assist me moving forwards. 

I'm in the office 8am - 6pm on weekdays, and this was the thing I was most concerned about when starting my course, but Stephen ensured he was available at times that worked for me even if just for a quick call when I had a question. 

Highly recommended :)

headline: CIPD with ICS - Fantastic people - tutors, mentors & fellow students
reviewBody:
I had initially struggled to make progress on my CIPD course with ICS. I have successfully completed distance learning courses before (with another provider) and thought I would hit the ground running but unfortunately this was not the case. I found the student forums and website unappealing and the tutors hard to reach- when I first joined I was advised that I had to go through a mentor to book a phone appointment with my tutor, which was all too complicated and off putting with my busy lifestyle! 
However after attending a fantastic residential weekend with great tutors & new friends and making contact with tutors/mentors such as Dr Stephen Littler, who are so supportive and happy to answer queries at anytime of the day, through email, phone, or even LinkedIn etc, my opinion of ICS has completely transformed. 
My review is currently 4 stars however ICS seems to be constantly reviewing and improving its processes and applications and I think that by the time I complete my course I will be willing to rate ICS as five star - watch this space!

My advice to anyone considering studying with ICS is get involved, call your tutors, get familiar with the resources and attend the residential ASAP because all of these steps will make you feel so much more comfortable with this mode of study and it will make your course material much easier to digest.

Good luck!

headline: Enrolling
reviewBody:
I have only enrolled today however i would like to say how supportive and encouraging Melissa O'Brien was. She explained everything i needed to know and welcomed me to ICS learn. i am now looking forward to starting and completing my English and Maths GCSE with ICS learn. 
Fingers crossed for me. Big thank you to Melissa O'Brien and everyone else at ICS learn.

headline: Great experience
reviewBody: Great experience from start to finish.

headline: Exellent service from ICS
reviewBody:
Just signed up to an Mechanical Engineering course with ICS. Anne Marie has been great at answering my questions and getting everything sorted. 

Hopefully the course goes as smoothly :)

headline: Enrolling in BTEC Construction
reviewBody: I wanted to enrol in the BTEC in Construction and I had brilliant assistance from the ICS team. I got in contact with AnneMarie and she helped me through the process. She was very polite and helpful and explained all the details to me!

headline: ICS AAT account course
reviewBody:
My ICS course advisor was very prompt in replying to my request for information on the above course, whilst not harassing me constantly to sign up. It is because that he gave me time to let me make my mind up whether I wanted to do the course with ICS that led me to signing up with them.

I am at the start of the course so cannot comment on the course itself as yet but so far so good, payment and enrolling very easy and the course text books arrived very quickly.

headline: Excellent!
reviewBody: Margaret made my enrolment process very quick and easy, she explained everything clearly and with the relevant  details,  from my experience up to yet I would recommend you to anyone, I hope my further dealings with are as simple as this one!

headline: Very Helpful - ICS Team
reviewBody:
Dr Stephen,

Great Team Member and really helpful.
Excellent ! Great to see loads of information..

Cheers !
Moumita

headline: Excellent.
reviewBody:
I've had a excellent experience with ICS Learn. Not only did they enroll me on the course I wanted but my advisor Nicola Dexter was really professional and customer focused. She did a great job, and just for that I would recommend ICS Learn to anybody wanting to study and learn at home.
Thanks for everything.

headline: Excellent
reviewBody: I was very pleased with the level of communication and feedback which I received on the phone. the lady was very patient and provided me with very helpful advice while being attentive to my situation.

headline: Excellent Customer Service
reviewBody:
ICS has responded positively with regards to my learning needs. The communication between colleagues were handled very well. I was transferred to the appropriate course tutor and received very clear guidance and support on my intention to study on a GCSE programme.

I would recommend ICS to students who are ready to commit themselves to learning.

Wilfred.

headline: I was excellently informed about the Teaching Course that I am going to do.
reviewBody: I have got all the details that I needed to start a Teaching Assistant Course. Anne Marie who assisted me was excellent and I have great expectations about this course.

headline: Fab service from a lovely lady
reviewBody: I signed up on Monday and was assisted by a lovely friendly lady called Anne Marie. She was very chatty and enthusiastic which made me even more keen to get started on my course. This is my 2nd course with ICS and I would definitely recommend it to anyone wanting to do a course.

headline: Great support and always at the end of a phone or a internet chat message service
reviewBody: This only works if you are self-motivated. I dont think the chat forums are a good idea though as students are clearly not bothering to read and fully research their tasks and assignments and instead get marked assignments sent to them by willing students. Why is this allowed to happen?

headline: Ann-Marie's customer service
reviewBody: She was professional, helpful, courteous, positive and caring; the customer service I experienced was excellent!

headline: Online Chats and Phone Service
reviewBody: Excellent manners, good rapport, lots of information provided, always willing to help, supportive advisers ready to hear from you,

headline: Excellent
reviewBody:
I have joined ICS last year in September and had a target to accomplish it within 6 months, and with the study plan and the support I received from ICS has been excellent throughout, and yes I achieved my qualification within the six months time frame. The tutors are just superb, they are totally supportive and very kind. Workshops I have been to, were totally value for money, the tutors have been simply amazing.

The course material is very easy to follow and if any doubts, tutors are always there to help you. 

Overall it has been an excellent experience.

headline: Very quick response
reviewBody: Dr Stephen Littler is always very helpful and has once again not failed to live up to the expectation. Not only was my query answered, but went the extra mile providing advice around future study considerations

headline: Excellent. Highly recommended
reviewBody: Don't hesitate to retake your GCSEs. I took the plunge to retake mine because I'd like to take a levels and gain qualifications

headline: Enrolment process with Maggie Duffy
reviewBody:
Maggie was very helpful right from my initial query to my  enrolment on A level Math.  I found Maggie to be courteous and personable.
Now the real work starts and hope my experience with ICS, going forward, is as good  as it has been so far.

headline: Informative and Supportive
reviewBody: I have been trying to complete my Level 3 HR Course for almost 2 years now. This is not the fault of ICS rather the crazy busy life I lead with two little girls! However, with the great support of ICS, my mentor Benjamin Inglis-Grant and the tutor Stephen Littler I am actually very close to finishing my course and moving onto the next level (fingers crossed). Without the unwavering support of these two gentlemen I would have given up ages ago. Both guys have supported me and advised me to the best of their ability and I am confident that I will complete my course. Both Stephen and Benjamin have been infinitely patient with me. I have feel wholly supported both by my mentor Benjamin and from Stephen as a tutor. Being able to communicate with a tutor onsite via email and telephone has been fantastic. Stephen has been a great help, and a fantastic soundboard. ICS is a testament to home study, it can be done (albeit slowly in my case) and it can be done well. Thank you ICS, Benjamin and Stephen.

headline: Efficient
reviewBody: I have been debating retaking my A-Levels for some time. ICS has been patient and informative throughout-at no point did I feel pressure to commit. Emails have been responded to quickly and all requests honoured. I cannot praise the customer service highly enough!

headline: Amazing personable service
reviewBody: Michelle had all the information I needed, was friendly, helpful and personable which is rare when talking to companies these days. Great service and I'm really happy with it.

headline: Unwavering Support!
reviewBody: When I started my GCSE Maths course with ICS I was apprehensive. I took my Maths GCSE 25 years ago twice and only managed a "D" both times. I must admit it took me a long time to adjust to studying again and at times felt like I was fooling myself into thinking I could do any better all these years later! Melissa, the in-house teacher phoned and we were on the phone for a long time! She was brilliant. She restored my faith in myself and gave me lots of useful tips including how to plan my study time as well as useful web addresses and study guides. Throughout the course Melissa has literally been on the other end of the phone if I needed help or advice and emailed me lots of useful information on areas I have been struggling with. I am certain I wouldn't have got this far without her support!

headline: Very friendly, easy process.
reviewBody: This took me a short amount of time, I was given all of the required information that I needed to make my choice, very friendly service provided by Maggie on chat and later over the telephone, I found this very smooth and easy to arrange. Just as last time :)

headline: nice and patient advisor
reviewBody: i first contacted ICS through livechat, and their adviser Paul helped me very patiently, answered all my questions. Paul explained the course and helped me with my payment and registration through the phone. very efficient and helpful service.

headline: Great service so far and very helpful tutors, especially Stephen Littler
reviewBody: I'm part way through the CIPD Diploma in HR Management.  So far so good with ICS. The booking process was very straightforward and the booking team are very helpful.  I've also had a decent amount of contact with tutors and everyone has been very responsive.  I wasn't sure how much support to expect with a distance learning course, and I have been pleasantly surprised.  I've had phone calls, email contact and contact on the ICS community website.  Any question I've had has been answered promptly and they are really keen to support you with academic issues as well as logistical stuff.  That's really good for me as I haven't studied for around 10 years so it's nice to know that I can reach out to a tutor and they'll be there to talk me through stuff.  I just passed my first assignment and felt very well supported in the writing/drafting process.

headline: Review for Maggie
reviewBody:
I have had a very pleasant experience with ICS so far. Maggie was very polite and efficient in dealing with my enquiries which then lead to my enrolment on 2 courses. 

Thank you,

Jennifer S

headline: CIPD advanced award in Managing employment relations.
reviewBody: I dealt with Paul Martin who was knowledgeable, patient and never pushy. I felt I could really get a sense of the course from him. Very impressed and would recommend speaking to him if you wish to consider a CIPD course.

headline: excellent service!
reviewBody:
Would like to say a big thank you to everyone i spoke to at ICS. i recieved all the help and information i needed which helped me to make my decision in choosing ICS.
i can now study from home and still have access to help from my advisor if needed.

A big thank you to Anne-marie who was pleasantly helpful.
Im really excited about the future!

headline: Enrolment process
reviewBody:
I found the process very simple and professional.

Our contact Ms.Melissa O'Brien was well informed, punctual and knowledgeable about the enrolment procedure.

We thank her for the support and guidance during the process.

Regards,
Medwin

headline: Supportive, challenging and flexible!
reviewBody:
I started the Level 7 diploma in Human Resource management recently and after two months of feeling like a rabbit in headlights, I spoke to my mentor Stephen and attended a workshop. combined, they have me the confidence and the tools to get on with the course.  Stephen's assistance has been amazing and you never feel like you're bothering.  It's a great set-up and perfect for students with all kinds of situations.  I work full-time and have a house and social life to maintain.  All you need is determination and discipline and you'll do fine.  I've joined a peer group since the workshop which is also useful to bounce ideas around with others on the same course!

Highly recommend as a further education facility. 
One warning though - the individual is responsible for their own progression so this type of learning needs to be adapted to and suitable for the learner.

headline: Review
reviewBody: When I commenced this course, I lacked confidence. Thanks to my mentor, Stephen Littler, has supported and encouraged me all the way. He regularly keeps in contact and his feedback are speedy, crucial and is a vital part of my studies. I would gladly recommend the ICS course to everyone and I am so lucky to have an approachable, understanding and committed mentor who is brilliant at what he does. Thanks.

headline: Amazing
reviewBody: I was glad i c alled ICS and got the opportunity to speak to Anne Marie. She explained everything to me and made me feel confident in what i am enrolling in to. Thanks again for the great experience

headline: Melissa Lieberman,  ICS Maths Teacher
reviewBody: I address my ICS maths teacher Melissa Lieberman as Mel as this is how comfortable I am with her. Mel is an absolute star. I think the whole concept of attempting GCSE maths when in the first instance I had no mathematical grounding has been extremely scary.  Knowing over the years how important it is to have that passable 'C' grade and not having obtained it has omitted me from choice career options. However, Mel's guidance and suggested study outlines has put me on track to positively facing this academic gap head on. It's great seeing demonstrations in the ICS student community explaining how a formula is worked out and having the ability to just  'pause' it , and play it again until it makes sense, something you can't do in a classroom environment,  yet  this helps to further aid understanding. I know Mel is just a phone call or email away and extremely responsive to every question I have asked, her support is invaluable. This image of a maths teacher via the distance learning option has put me on track to my learning.

headline: Fantastc
reviewBody: I am very impressed with the way I was spoken to and things were explained , very friendly and very helpful and can not wait to start my course

headline: My experience of ICS
reviewBody: I emailed ICS to enquire about enrolling on one of their courses. Within a couple of hours I received a follow up phone call from Ciaran. I am really impressed with the service- Ciaran was really helpful, informed me succinctly of my choices and options and followed up on our conversation with emailed information promptly. As a result of this excellent service I had no hesitation on signing up to a course. It's really heartening to receive such excellent customer service.

headline: Steven Atkins - Electronics Tutor for BTEC Level 3 - Engineering
reviewBody:
As a positive start the customer services side of ICS is brilliant I will say that. From looking at the course I wanted to do, to help with enrolment I couldn't have asked for more. 

Now to the course itself. I thoroughly enjoyed my course, this was not through help from anyone but my own. I am actually genuinely surprised I completed this course with the lack of help I had. The previous tutor 'Charles' never marked any of my work nor assist that often, sometimes it would take weeks to get a response. But still I persisted and re-searched anything I needed to know and got on with what I thought was right. My manager at work (an MEng graduate in Electronic engineering) was actually more of a mentor then anyone at ICS for at least 9 months of the course. 

And so Steven Atkins appears on the scene. He marked everything i had submitted within a week of starting. He gave me positive and negative feedback where necessary and I completed the course. Unfortunately too late to get a merit or distinction but at this stage a pass was at least not wasting my money.  

ICS seem like they have put some measures into place to avoid the issues I experienced for the majority of my course. I wouldn't study with them again, this is mostly due to the fact I can't study the next level I require. The course content and materials were spot on, it was just a shame about the tutor.

headline: Information and enrollment
reviewBody: I first started speaking to Anne Marie and she was very helpful, told me all of the information that i needed to know and guided me in the right direction to starting my new course! I am now fully enrolled and couldn't have done it without her help. Would recommend your company to anyone looking to do something similar! Very very caring and helpful. Thankyou all.

headline: So helpful and informative
reviewBody:
My enquiry into a NCFE level 3 award in supporting teaching and learning in schools, was answered to very promptly, and my course advisor Anne Marie was so informative and helpful, and made the decision to study with ICS easy!
I look forward to starting my course now and I am sure that Anne Marie will assist and help me along the way.

headline: A highly professional and friendly service
reviewBody: The course adviser (Nicola) has given excellent support and clear advice over the telephone, with a very friendly but at the same time extremely professional manner. I have felt very valued as a prospective student and have received all the information I required to know about the course. Any question I had was readily answered in a helpful way and communication has been consistent and actually enjoyable! I would highly recommend ICS to anyone wishing to get qualified without the need to go back to college. Thank you for all your support! I am thoroughly looking forward to starting the course soon!

headline: CIPD enrolment
reviewBody:
I have just started the enrolment procedure to ICS Home Learning comapny. Very pleased with the service offered to me. Was introduced to all possibilities and useful information including what I am paying for, how does whole system of  learning work etc. The process was quick and got responded to my questions within hours.
Would recommend to anyone :) Thank you Paul Martin:)

headline: a new start
reviewBody: really good and a great help

headline: CIPD Advanced diploma
reviewBody: Excellent support and very smooth enrolment process.

headline: phycology course
reviewBody:
My advisor was Melissa I explained what I wanted to do in the future and that I needed flexibility around my children and home life, as well as doing a course that was going to give me a qualification in to work and still lead me to further study as well as the practical work place side. Melissa talked me through everything and now I am a home learning student with ics and I am very pleased it was very easily set up and I can't wait to start thank you so much for all your help and support.
From Charlene Sheridan.😊

headline: Excellent
reviewBody: Anne Marie very helpful and explained everything to me in a clear and concise manner.

headline: ICS Stephen Littler
reviewBody: I have mixed emotions about ICS. When i first joined ICS last Sepetember i really felt that I was left on my own to get on with it with no help at all from any of my tutors. I would book calls to speak to my tutors and sometimes never get a call back. I actually nearly quit and was prepared to pay my employer back as i couldn't go on with it any longer. However... somehow im still doing it. I believe that since Stephen Littler has joined the organisation he has saved ICS. He really makes the effort to call and i feel that he genuinely tries to help you. And... you get the feeling that he actually cares! and wants the best for you. When i first received a call from Stephen I was taken aback as it was shocking that a tutor was calling to check up on me and make sure that I was ok and if i needed any help. No one from ICS had ever called me before. Since then hes been really helpful and actually managed to get me my first merit! :) He definitely motivated me as i was at a point of giving up. The constant engagement is great. Feeling free to just call up whenever i have any question and i know that he will be there for me to help with any queries is really good! I really liked the webinar he organised. I think this is going to be really good for ICS and the students. I just find it strange that this wasn't happening before..... as this was what my idea of distance learning was so i was suprised to find that i just get sent the text books and that i'm left on my own. For this review i would have given ICS a 1 star rating and Stephen a 5 star.. So... i have decided to go with a 3! There definitely needs to be more engagement with the tutors and students! All in all, i think that ICS are heading towards the right steps from hearing what Stephen is looking to do in the future with webinars etc.

headline: Brilliant service given by Nicola!
reviewBody: Nicola has given me brilliant service through out all my many questions & has really gone out of her way to make sure I'm 100% happy. Thank you Nicola I hope my tutor is as helpful & knowledgeable as you are!! :-))

headline: Such friendly staff!
reviewBody: I rang to enquire about enrolling on another course after successfully completing one last year.  The staff on the phone could not have been more friendly and helpful and above all seemed genuinely interested in the reasons why I am studying.
