It goes to show that speaking to someone is so much more rewarding than doing online bookings!

headline: ICS Customer Service
reviewBody:
Nicola has given great customer service over the last couple of weeks helping me to make an informed decision about the training course I chose. She helped me through the enrolment process and was able to assist very promptly to any questions I had.
Hopefully the rest of the process is the same.

headline: The Most Amazing Staff
reviewBody:
I mean this in all sincerity when I say that Anne Marie is the most helpful and kind advisor who I have had the pleasure of speaking to. I was in desperate need to help and Anne Marie was professional and understanding, she went out of her way to assist me and kept in contact so reassure me each step of the way. Because of this wonderful lady I am now able to complete my studying with ICS Learn after having a very poor experience with another company. Anne Marie opened the door for me to continue my course so that I can pursue my aspirations. I have no doubt that ICS Learn will continue to be as amazing as it seems. All of the staff are great and welcoming. I very much look forward to studying with ICS Learn, and I cannot thank you enough. Anne Marie you are a real asset to ICS Learn and you give them a brilliant image, I wish that all organisations had staff like this.
Thank you again!

Emma x

headline: Informative and easy to talk to.
reviewBody: very simple and strait forward, give me all the information I needed. Very happy, thanks for your help.

headline: Not-so-distant learning
reviewBody:
I've been studying with ICS for just over two months now. Already they have proved their worth and value, despite the 200+ miles between us. The tutors (so far: Stephen Littler, Paula Smith and Helen Bessant) take time to assess and carefully consider my assignments, giving genuinely encouraging feedback and advice on how I can improve in the future.The course materials are well-written and logical. And Ben, my student support advisor, never fails to answer the phone and help me with all of my (many and varied) questions!

UPDATE - I also attended the report-writing webinar in March. It's another excellent example of ICS going the extra mile for students.

headline: ICS Student Support
reviewBody:
Stephen Littler was recommended to me by one of our fellow students when I struggled to get proper feedback from tutors on assignments. He arranged telephone calls and talked me through step by step what I should include and what I could get rid of. Having his support has been a godsend and I'm very grateful for his support. There was no real communication other than email between students and tutors before, but now Stephen is on board it's fantastic to have someone you can just email if you have a question or rant to if your frustrated. Thanks again for all the help Stephen! 

Nicole Whittaker, CIPD Student.

headline: Excellent Service
reviewBody:
My experiences of ICS and the tutoring staff (special mention to Stephen Littler for his outstanding support and patience throughout my exam preparation) have been nothing short of stellar! 

The staff are kind, approachable and non - intrusive- everything you could ask for whilst juggling study and a career!

I look forward to my future with ICS and the excellent people involved

headline: CIPD Diploma Level 5
reviewBody:
My experience of liasing with Ciaran from initial contact to final enrolment was 100% positive. 
He was helpful, polite, patient fully conversant with course knowledge. He is truly a productive asset to ICS.
Please convey my thanks to him

headline: ICS Service Review
reviewBody:
Craig and Benjamin have been helpful and emails replied in time.
I was a bit concerned in the beginning as getting in touch with the professors/tutors seemed to go through a process that was sometimes too slow and "bureacratic" in my opinion. 

But I must say that in December I was relieved when a book was replaced promptly ....THANK YOU ICS!

However the icing on the cake is Stephen Littler.
Stephen went of his way to contact me checking if I needed help.

This was such a direct and helpful way of supporting my studies.
It did not stop there... Stephen was prompt in response, thorough in explanation using links and facts and very very patient with various queries.

Since then my queries and many others (ICS study mates) consider Stephen as the GOTO person! 

His interest and passion in our success is inspiring and motivating.
The best service so far = Stephen Littler

headline: CIPD Level 5 Diploma
reviewBody: Initially I wasn't sure about studying with the ICS. I hadn't studied for many years and the thought of self studying was daunting. However not long into my studies I was introduced to Stephen Littler, a CIPD mentor with the ICS.  I can honestly say without his support I would have struggled to motivate myself.  Stephen has been extremely helpful not just in understanding my modules, but in the way he has helped me build my confidence to achieve my goals. His enthusiasm is contagious and he is truly an ICS super star. If you're having any doubts about studying with the ICS, my advice to you would be to just do it.  The course, contents and support you'll receive is incredible, not to mention the opportunities that will come from having achieved a qualification and, the feeling of immense proudness when you pass your modules. I am so glad I choose to study this qualification and even happier that I have received such great support along the way. Thank you Stephen :)

headline: Stephen Littler
reviewBody: Stephen has been very helpful throughout my studies, My HR course has been quite challenging and without Stephens support and enthusiasm I do not think I would get through it. I am pleased to have him as my mentor, he is here for me every step of the way and I am very grateful , he is a true asset to ICS Learn.

headline: Outstanding Service
reviewBody: During my CIPD advanced diploma course I found all of the staff pleasant to deal with. More recently I have received regular support from Stephen Littler whom has recently completed a PhD and has an outstanding wealth of knowledge about him. I have been fortunate to receive telephone, email and face to face support from him where I am given step by step assistance and support, all in good consideration of my learning style. Overall I would recommend the one-to-one support as 10/10 which is available through a variety of distant learning means. A+!

headline: enrolment
reviewBody: My enrolment was completed with the help of Paul Martin he was very helpful, can't comment much more than that until I finish the course

headline: Excellent customer service
reviewBody: Very helpful and knowledgeable.

headline: Enroling for CIPD Level 7 course
reviewBody: Very happy with Paul's customer services and over exited about my new journey with ICS study course.

headline: Anne Marie was brilliant!
reviewBody: Anne Marie, was very friendly, knowledgable and supportive. Her positive attitude made me sure I was doing the right thing.

headline: Careers advisor
reviewBody: Melissa, ICS's careers advisor, was thorough in answering any questions I had, prior to enrolling into two GCSE courses, and was a delight to deal with.

headline: Great Service
reviewBody: I came across ICS doing research on a CIPD distance learning course. I made an online enquiry and very promptly I was contacted by Ciaran, who was very helpful. I have now enrolled on the course with Ciaran's help and I look forward to studying my Diploma. I hope everyone at ICS is as helpful as Ciaran.

headline: Very good service
reviewBody: T he staff at ICS are very good and understand your needs and are help in any which way possible and very good all round.

headline: Very Happy with the Service from Anne Marie!
reviewBody: Very happy with ther service I recieved from Anne Marie!! Had been looking into the Events Planning BTEC Course for a while and decided to take the plunge and sign up. Anne Marie contacted me promptly after showing my interest online and was very friendly. She explained the schedule of payments and what I should expect very clearly. Excellent customer service skills!

headline: friendly, efficient and caring attitude. reassuring me in my first step towards a new course.
reviewBody:
I first enquired about a teaching assistant course in December 2014. Where I received fast advice on what course would be best for me.
When I had made the decision I e-mailed ics and was again given the appropriate advice. Anything I asked was answered efficiently and friendly. I dealt with a lovely course advisor called Anne-Marie who reassured me with each step. She carefully explained what would happen next after I enrolled. Service was fantastic. So refreshing to hear someone who was just as excited as I was,about my new course. I would describe my experience with ICS so far as professional, affordable, friendly and efficient with enthusiasm throughout.

headline: Very helpful and quick process
reviewBody: I was able to ask questions and get a response straight away from the same advisor and the payment was very quick and easy.

headline: Excellent service
reviewBody: Fantastic course information and very well explained, friendly and approachable service.

headline: Service
reviewBody: Good and really helpful servic.

headline: enrolling for gcse
reviewBody: I called icslearn To enrol for gcse maths and English. I spoke to Melissa who clearly explained how the ice works. And sorted my enrolment. Thanks. Melissa.

headline: Excellent service, polite, helpful
reviewBody: Wasn't sure which was the best course for me, so went through the options with Anne Marie - really helpful,  polite and friendly.  Bought the course and recommended a friend already! Thank you! Thumbs up from me.

headline: Thanks for enrolling
reviewBody: Just ready to start my course and change my future!

headline: Very helpful and knowledgeable
reviewBody: Rather than completing my company based version, this option is giving me more flexibility to complete when and what i choose, offering the chance to achieve far more credits.

headline: Course Enrollment
reviewBody:
I have just enrolled on a CIPD course.  What I did notice that I was given advice and information that I asked for.  It was not a sales pitch.  

Also I had different questions at different times and Ciaran was happy to answer my numerous questions.  i felt that I was able to make an independant decision from that information.  

Also I did ring other companies and I felt confident that with the information I was given from ICS that I have made a thought out decison.

Also I feel confident in going back with other queries as this is the first distance learning course I have undertaken.

I would look to do other courses with this company.

headline: ICS Advise
reviewBody: I spoke with Anne Marie who provided brilliant service, helped me have an understanding of what I needed to go for. Im now an ICS member ☺️.

headline: Amazing
reviewBody: I spoke to Gurdeep from ICS. He has been very helpful throughout the whole process of getting me signed up with ICS. Gurdeep was very honest with me as I was being unrealistic about when I wanted to do my exams by and explained to me I would be able to do them but would have to put 24 hours of study in a week which would not happen as I work full time. I was very grateful for his advice. He also rang me when it was suitable for me and wasn't too pressuring into making me start the course straight away which was a lot more comfortable as lots of company's make you feel you have to do It at that exact moment. Thanks again for a wonderful experience with ICS

headline: Excellent, efficient service
reviewBody: Fast, well explained and informative service

headline: NO MESSING
reviewBody: I called the office was given a good price compared to everywhere else i had contacted. Was given details and got mypackage next day. Cant say fairer than that

headline: Excellent customer service from a friendly and helpful advisor.
reviewBody:
Easy and straightforward enrolment process. Excellent customer service from Gurdeep who was a friendly and helpful advisor.

Cannot comment on course content etc as yet.

headline: Great customer service
reviewBody: I would like to thank Annemarie for providing such great customer service and making me feel at ease with the process- really helpful

headline: Fantastic service from the very beginning
reviewBody: I would definitely recommend ICS. Paul from the helpline number was extremely helpful and knowledgeable. He was both friendly and professional, answering all of my queries and explaining how the distance learning course works. He arranged to call me back so I could consider all of my options and at no point did I feel pressured into signing up for the course. Now I cannot wait to receive my materials and get started, thank you.

headline: Excellent customer service from Melissa
reviewBody: I emailed ICS with several enquiries prior to booking on my A level English language course, and Melissa responded promptly and fully every time. I booked onto the course on the telephone and she was very helpful and polite. It was very easy and straightforward to book on.

headline: CIPD Level 7 Employment Law
reviewBody: I thought Paul was helpful and knowledgeable about the course and it's content.  I'm looking forward to getting started.....

headline: ok, but could have been more helpful
reviewBody: I found the time ICS took to respond to my queries fast and efficient. They responded to my queries, however they did not always give complete information. For example I was not told about p&p until afterwards. Even if I had not asked about anything specifically, could have taken the initiative to tell me any information I may need to know. Always answered my queries in a postive way.

headline: Concise info, quick and easy booking
reviewBody: I found the course to be just what I'm looking for in flexibility in both time frame and payments.  Advisor Paul made the info very concise and easy to understand.

headline: Brilliant Advice exactly what I wanted to hear
reviewBody: The CIPD advisor was really good and confident in his advice. He provided me with the best options for my learning requirements. Thank you

headline: Enrolling for Science Double award IGCSE
reviewBody:
Fantastic Service, called up ICS about applying for a science double award IGCSE and was put through to Gurdeep. Very helpful guy, explained the process over the phone and sent me a email with all the details of the course promptly and I took a week to decide whether I will enroll. He told me to text him when I'd like to talk again, once I texted him, I was called back within 10 minutes. Then I was enrolled with in another 5. 

Brilliant service, Gurdeep was great and very helpful. 

Will definitely reccomend.

headline: Very clear and straightforward
reviewBody: Advisor was very helpful in explaining the course details and all the questions that I had. Also, ICS seem to have very competitive course fees compared to others.

headline: Extremely satisfied with the service
reviewBody: I was ringing to book my ICS course and gurdeep the gentleman on the end of the phone and gurdeep gueded me through the process very easily and helpfully, at the end gurdeep asked me if I had any questions but gurdeep had let me know everything there was to know, very satisfied

headline: outstanding service
reviewBody: The help i got whist enrolling was outstanding,  very helpful and made things easy to understand

headline: Very Informative and efficient.
reviewBody: I spoke with Melissa, who was very helpful and reassuring. She called me back when it was suitable for me to talk and kept me well informed via email also.

headline: Memorable customer service and care.
reviewBody:
Andrew Armstrong was definitely patient with all the questions that I raised. His explanation was clear and he made me feel comfortable to raise further queries.

He kept his promise to call me back the next day in order to finalise the enrolment process. Although he couldn't call me at the time which had been agreed, his apology was sincere and he remained professional. What I appreciate most is the customer care displayed in his email after sorting out the enrolment process; His assurance in reminding me that I could contact him without hesitation should there be further queries means that his service can be confidently relied on.

Thank you once again Andrew.

headline: Excellent - Great professional experience
reviewBody: I shopped a round before signing up with ICS making my decision based on cost, support, access to information and help given during my initial information requests. My contact Ciaran was very helpful from first point of contact, answering all my questions and concerns. He was not pushy like some other CIPD companies. Although it's early days into my HR studying, I would certainly recommend ICS as a company to use.

headline: Aat course
reviewBody: Martin was very good sent me all the information to assist me and gave good advise

headline: fantastic experience
reviewBody:
I got in touch with is through email about wanting to start a professional career in accounting.
The response was fantastic.Paul Martin, who  was my first and only contact through the process of finding out what my expectations were to signing up for the course was brilliant.
Explained all I needed to know and answered all questions with clarity.
Paul Martin was always willing to explain anything at any given time.
Through it all, I felt comfortable and had such a good feeling.He was definitely such a delight.
In my books, ics has got what it takes to make all students feel at ease.
Thank you once again.

headline: 1st Class Service!
reviewBody:
I was enrolled by the very professional Paul Martin yesterday for my AAT course. I couldn't thank him enough for all the time and effort he gave whilst signing me up! 

Really looking forward to receiving my documents and kick starting bettering my career in Accounts. 

Thanks again.

Jemma Moss

headline: Exceptional standard of customer service
reviewBody: I spoke today to an ICS Advisor who could not have helped me to a higher standard. He was completely knowledgeable and answered all my queries. He explained everything that I should know in order to make a choice about signing up. He did not pressurise and listened to my reasoning offering helpful advice. I would advise anyone who is considering taking on a learning course to consider ICS.

headline: Enrolled on AAT course....
reviewBody: I had a phone call off Paul who answered all my questions and explained everything that I needed to know about the course and what was involved.  Very professional and friendly customer service, looking forward to get started.

headline: Superb First Impressions
reviewBody:
I received a call today from a highly professional and knowledgeable advisor by the name of Paul Martin. This was to follow up an enquiry I had made about the CIPD course. Paul invested the time in explaining the course detail at great length, was on hand to answer all of my questions and called me back after I had had the chance to make a decision. Within an hour of speaking with Paul I was at ease and enrolled on to the CIPD course. 

I am now looking forward to receiving my course material to enable me to begin my journey, so far so good and here's hoping the remainder of my journey is equally as smooth.

Thanks Paul - much appreciated

Matt Paterson - senior manager moving into HR Management

headline: professional, friendly and informative
reviewBody: All correspondence has been answered promptly and has been professional, friendly and informative and extremely helpful.  All questions answered and am now fully informed and confident in the company delivering the courses as agreed.  It has been a worrying time made easier by their professionalism and help. Courses have just been delivered and all the material and information look fantastic.

headline: Highly recommended
reviewBody: Just enrolled my daughter on an IGCSE course and the advisor I spoke to couldn't have been more helpful. Answered all my questions straight away and within a few minutes i'd already received my welcome email and daughter's student number. Really helped that the price was better than any other distance learning college too!

headline: very friendly and convenient service by a lovely lady
reviewBody: personally having gained qualifications with ics before , i knew that i would get a good service that was helpful but yet extremely informative. thankyou

headline: NEVER AGAIN- AVOIIIID
reviewBody:
student support - rubbish
tutors- rubbish- 
fees- waste of money

It's been an awful year with no support whatsoever. A complete waste of money- Hence the reason I have now decided to stop studying with ICS, even though my course is still running until March 2015. I am better off attending lectures   - at least then I can be sure that I get the necessary support from my tutor. I am so annoyed having wasted time and money on this institution-  Wish i could at least get my money back.

headline: great friendly service thought it was fab from the start
reviewBody: Was a great experience enrolling on a course really felt the support even though i havnt started my course yet , maggie was encouraging and made me feel confident about my course knowing if any problems occured she would sort them . So glad i signed up for my human biology igcse !! Feel confident knowing i have alot of support to get to my goal !!

headline: Lovely service
reviewBody: Maggie was excellent at replying to my emails. She answered my questions very quickly. Very pleased with the service I have received so far, looking forward to starting my course!

headline: Good thus far
reviewBody: So far I would recommend the service, I will let you know how the course goes

headline: Professional
reviewBody: Excellent communication, quick and easy!

headline: GREAT!
reviewBody: I sent an email for a call back and received the phone call straight away.  Great costumer service and I got all of the answers I needed and more. Nice and friendly and explained things in detail. Would recommend

headline: Poor, Poor, Poor
reviewBody:
Signed up nearly 2 months ago.  Took over a month to get the coursework as they kept sending to an incorrect address despite confirming they had the correct one.  Still continually sending documentation out incorrectly. Sent a formal complaint which is till yet to be addressed & is way over the timescales stated for response.  Keep getting assurances it has been fixed but still incorrect.  

Exceptionally poor company & would not recommend to anyone.

headline: So unhelpful
reviewBody: Registered for my course 10 days ago, course material still has not turned up. Webchatted them and the initial person who picked the query up stopped responding after saying Hi. Had to reload the Webchat and was advised that although i had registered and paid there is no order in there system to be processed for me... they are having to log a call with IT to see whats happened and try and get the order corrected. Was cut of from the chat when i wanted to ask how i will kept updated on this as they have taken my money and will have to wait almost a month for my materials.

headline: Very committed and helpful
reviewBody: Maggie was very helpful and provided me with further information I requested about the BTEC course.

headline: Easy to contact, fast response
reviewBody: Ics is a great way to learn something and the tutor help is great too! They support you all the way. The only thing that I struggled with a bit was the course content. It was laid out in a way that expected you to know the breakdown of the equations at that level when I had not done maths since school. It could be a bit more descriptive, but with the tutors help and internet I got my head around it. The tutors are amazing!!

headline: Couldn't ask for better service
reviewBody: Really recommend ICS the operator I spoke to was very helpful considerate and told me all my information very clearly and answered all my questions.

headline: Excellent ICS course
reviewBody: Really good service and really good online community center easy to use and tutor is there every time when help is needed to pass the courses

headline: Helpful, Informative, Professional, Friendly
reviewBody: Paul provided me with all the information I needed as a parent to make an informed decision for my daughter to do two GCSEs with ICS. Signed up and took advantage of the 6 months interest free payments, why not?

headline: Extremely helpful and patient.
reviewBody: I would recommend it to anyone, any questions I had were answered and any doubts were clarified.

headline: It was quick and helpful.
reviewBody: Everyone at ICSLearn that I was in contact with since the beginning was really helpful and friendly. Thank you for the given service.

headline: Excellent
reviewBody: Enrolment was quick and easy, course advisor told me everything I needed to know over the phone and the interest free payment plans sealed the deal

headline: Very helpful & straightforward
reviewBody: Was on the phone for only a few minutes and had everything explained to me in full detail, very quick, friendly and helpful service.

headline: Great customer service full of advice
reviewBody: The information I received was clear and answered all my questions. I got the best advice I needed and steered me in the right direction. Can't wait to start the course!

headline: Starting my GCSE in MATH and ENGLISH
reviewBody: So far ive just enrolled for my GCSE in Math and English. I hope to pass my exams in June 2015 for both GCSE. Looking forward to good tutors and support from ICS. Things would be more clearer if they would inform me with all the details about distance learning and how it works and etc. Called three times but its still confusing. But the website was very helpful and learned more about it.

headline: Move over Walking Dead.
reviewBody: The course was absolutely brilliant I couldn't of asked for more. The course gives you insight and opens your mind up to a different way of thinking and the Tutor was fantastic from giving you confidence to helping with suggestions

headline: Was seen to and given best advice possible .
reviewBody: Called about A Level course, was answered by a respectful and helpful staff member very happy with the service and cant wait to start the course.

headline: Very helpful and responded quickly to any questions I had.
reviewBody: I work full time (9am-6pm) so was only possible for contact via email. The response was immediate and answered any questions I had. I found this to be very helpful indeed. Having done some research online I also found this to be the most suited to me and reasonably priced course available.

headline: Informative
reviewBody: Andrew explained the course, how I will be tutored and how I could pay for the course. Answered all my questions by email really quick.

headline: Ready to learn!
reviewBody: I'm looking forward to learning new skills and knowledge in this course.

headline: Fantastic, to the point, all in one service
reviewBody:
I had obviously researched this course in terns of time, cost, delivery etc etc and then I remembered ICS who I had used years ago as a teenager.

I went to the chat facility - spoke to Colin - 10 minutes later I am enrolled.

Exactly what I wanted!

headline: my opinion for ics THAT YOU ARE PROVIDING A GOOD SERVICES TO ALL STUDENDT AS FRIENLY AND EASY TO UNDERSTANT  FOR EVERY ONE.
reviewBody:
Out Of my many friends only three are doing the course of 
acca since 2012 and all are want to join the ics  for different courses that provided  by you . I would like to tell you that my daughter is also doing the regular study for Health and Social Care Diploma intermediate level 2 from Leicester college Leicester . she has recently enrol with Leicester College . Can she do upper level  diploma along with this diploma or can she the ICT DIPLOMA . PLEASE GUIDE ME 
THANKING YOU 
YOURS
JAGTAR SINGH
31 GLEN STREET
LE46NN
LEICESTER
07865684287

headline: Perfect course and great customer service.
reviewBody: I was looking for online A Level Mathematics courses so I can advance onto a PGCE Secondary Maths and the AQA syllabus offered at ICS looked ideal in terms of what I am interested in - mechanics and modelling and the price was very reasonable too. I have used ICS before and this made my decision for me. Colin 'U' the customer service representative was very helpful with phoning me to go over any questions I had and ensuring I had total confidence in what I was purchasing. All in all, an excellent service and I cannot wait to get started on my maths. :)

headline: So quick and easy!
reviewBody:
Having had the best advise from Colin the advisor I am now happily enrolled onto A-Level Pschology and can not wait to begin studying.
Advisor let answered all my questions thoroughly and with patience.

Would definitely recommend.

headline: not impressed
reviewBody: im so disappointed in the course content i received and even more disappointed in the tutor help.  when paying for a course you expect the best.  not only were there paragraphs and words missing in the file i received when i asked the tutor for help it was lacking!wont be recommending!

headline: brilliantly clear and informative!!
reviewBody: I was introduced by a friend to look into ICS courses as she is doing a course from ICS too. Having done other distance learning courses, it knock my confidence and trust a bit as I didn't get the help I wanted  and the advice was completely different to what I really want to do, it didn't suit me or my work experince at all. Having made an online enquiry to ICS, Paul, the course adviser for ICS emailed me with full details of the course and advise that he would called to discuss my options. The next day I received  a call from Paul, he listern to me to what I want to achieve then clearly explained in details about the course to see if it's right for me. I was very impressed and was happy for the help and advice and have now sign up with ICS to do my CIPD qualifications.

headline: Every person I've spoken to has been very polite and cleared up any issues I had in that phone call. Recommend to anyone :)
reviewBody: It's one of the few places that actually care. Their customer support is amazing and any issues are cleared up within just 1 phone call. They're always polite and willing to listen. I spoke to Elizabeth Dougan and she makes ICS, to me, seem like they really care. Thanks! :)

headline: Very helpful as always
reviewBody: Just enrolled with ICS for the second time. Was helped along the way by Margaret Duffy, who couldn't have been more helpful and courteous if she'd tried. It's good to know that ICS have such approachable advisors. I'm now looking forward to getting started with the course

headline: Avoid- complete rubbish!
reviewBody:
Refused outright a request for change in course Mentor even though he had been away since the start of the course, unavailable, given contradictory information, sent the wrong information, and been generally complete rubbish.

Also contradictory/ confusing information on course structure and workshops etc.  Generally crap.

Would definitely go with a different course provider if I could get my fees back!

Avoid!!!

headline: Good start...
reviewBody: Very good start. I just sign in to start diploma in human resources. I am verry happy with all explanation from Paul. Looking forvard to receive my materials to start an education and hoping that my experience with ICS will be so positive througt the course.

headline: Absolutely amazing,pleasure to do business.No regret at all!!!
reviewBody: Very helpful tutor, study books explain really well. Pleasure to study, looking forward to continue study in future with this organisation and what is most important this organisation is approved by many courses   UK study organisations (ILM, BTEC, CIM and many more). So many choices and affordable.

headline: He who dares wins (As Del Boy Says)
reviewBody: At first I felt totally overwhelmed, but was determined to finish the course to prove to myself I could do it. A year down the line and a pass certificate proves that if I can do it ... anyone can. Luvvly Jubbly.

headline: A great way to learn knowing help is just a call away.
reviewBody: ICS is a great way to learn. If you want a complete career change but can only study at home then this is the way to do it. Friendly and caring support from everyone I had spoken to at ICS, from choosing the right course to emailing my tutor, who was brilliant by the way. Second course enrolled today and I feel excited all over again. Maggie was a great help today and helped me decide which course was the next step for me. Thankyou ICS.

headline: Very efficient and extremely friendly
reviewBody: I called up due to the website not working for payments and spoke to Margaret. Because oft previous visit to the website my details were made available and I was referred to by name straight away which I thought was a great way of dealing with people. I had already chosen a course but after advice from Margaret, I was steered in the direction of a better course for my needs. Which also saved me the time and cost of doing two separate courses. Having never done an online course before I'm a little nervous but was thoroughly reassured that I would be fully supported! Great customer service!!

headline: What a great way to start my course
reviewBody: I spoke to a lady called Margaret Duffy. We spoke online and she called me straight away telling me all the details I needed to know. She was really helpful and talked me through it making me feel very comfortable and excited to start my course

headline: Lovely lady to speak to very welcoming :-)
reviewBody: Easy to apply quick and friendly advisors and good to know they are there for you if needed.

headline: Outstanding
reviewBody:
Maggie was kind and understanding willing to help with all matters regarding the course.
As a point of contact second to none.

headline: Incredibly Helpful!
reviewBody:
After making the difficult decision to begin my CIPD studies, the staff at ICS not only helped provide me with a valued and non bias opinion as to what to level to study according to my personal experience, but also helped give me the space and time to weigh the information I received and eventually enrol, without any fuss or hassle.

I would easily recommend ICS to colleagues and friends should they need to further their studies.

headline: Hassle free enrollment!
reviewBody:
Inquired about my course online and received an email more or less straight away asking some basic questions, then received a call from Maggie who talked me through the whole process, what the course would contain and fees etc...
gave me time to consider my options and then the actual enrollment took less than 5 minutes, great stuff!

headline: good support and great materials
reviewBody: i would highly recommend studying a qualification with ICS as i have been extremely happy with the support and materials provided a special thanks to my mentor .

headline: Good So Far!
reviewBody: I have registered for the GCSE English course and its good so far.. I haven't had any problems however i feel it would be right to rate when i am halfway through the service.. Its just the initial few days for me and I am yet discovering out things with ICS. Thank you anyways! I would probably rate 5 Star after a few more months.

headline: No fuss at all, delivered study materials and provided easy access to the online community.
reviewBody: Now I just have to buckle down and study!

headline: Great, informative & friendly service
reviewBody:
I requested a chat online, was quickly replied to and received a call back.
I wanted to know if the course was right for me and what the payment options were.  The lady I spoke to was friendly and helpful and answered all my questions.  I never felt I was talking to a sales person or being pushed into making a decision.
I went off to think about the course and my options ( it's a big financial commitment) and requested a call back a few days later as I had made my mind up to enroll on the CIPD with ICS.  The lady who called back was the same lady I had spoken to previously and she remember who I was and the course I was interested in. 
She made the enrollment very easy and I felt like I had received really good customer service. :-)

headline: Great advice when you need it!
reviewBody: When i decided to enrol on a online course In A-Level maths i was a bit nervous on what would happen if i got stuck and had no one to show me what to do or how to figure something out. After learning with ICS i have found that i get all the support i need and more. Melissa my online tutor really helps me out a lot by giving me advice, more equations to do, explaining little things that you will have learned at GCSE level but may have forgot and sending me video links to give me online lessons on the area i am working. I would strongly recommend this to anybody and i am very happy with the service i have received so far.

headline: ICS are brilliant!!
reviewBody: I have just enrolled with ICS to a correspondence course in English Language A'Level.  The information was easy to find on the website and the lady, Maggie, responded immediately.  We spoke on the telephone and she was knowledgeable, cheerful and helpful.  I would definitely recommend ICS to my friends.  This is the second course I have taken with them.

headline: Highly Recommend ICS!! GO ON AND LEARN TODAY!!!
reviewBody: I have just started to study A-Level Business. And I am excited to be learning through ICS. The online student community is a great way to socialize, and send messages to other students on the online forum. I like the idea of having an online tutor, and student support. I was impressed in the amount of time they took to reply. I like the idea of being able to upload a photo and a profile about my interests. In the ways of learning, I think the context of the course units, case studies and activities are really interesting and well presented. It will be hard work to get through the course, but well worth it. ICS gets a thumbs up from me!

headline: Very polite, acommodating and patient
reviewBody:
I never had to wait too long before an advisor would pop up in the LiveChat panel.  My customer advisor- Margaret Duffy- was easy to talk to, knowledgable about my chosen professional subject I wanted to pursuit with ICS and diligent.  
Thank you for helping me make the right choice in chiselling a new career path an easier one (than I had expected) and ultimately my experience with ICS  smooth, effortless and above all trustworthy.
Thank you Margaret and ICS!

headline: Friendly, Well-rounded, Motivating
reviewBody: ICS has so far been great for my distance learning (in English Lit). I'm excited to start on the materials they gave me, which are of good quality. They even called me to make sure I got my materials and how I'm finding them, as well as assuring me the support of my tutor. I can't compare with other distance learning places because this is my first time, however I'm happy with ICS and have no complaints to date, all at a very competitive and reasonable price! Would recommend for sure!

headline: ICS, a great online training program desighned to help you with a veriety of different courses.
reviewBody:
If you desire to take an exam in a particular subject, and you wish to study at your own pace with all the necessary materiel and help you need, then you should join ICS.

ICS has a wide selection of courses online for offer at great prices and with dedicated teachers there to help you at all times.

I personally had benefited from taking english and maths GSCE courses with ICS as it allowed me to sit through the required exam rooms with confidence.

ICS offers different kinds of help throughout the course period, they allocate you to a personal teacher who checks your work occasionally and who you can also Email and ask questions about the course, you can chat to an available teacher online, take part in forum discussions and ask question about particular units in the required forum, chat with other students online about the courses in student forums and also watch helpful videos and read articles specifically designed to help you with your course throughout.

I personally thank the maths teacher, Melissa Lieberman who constantly kept updating the materiel online and went out her way to give extra help to us students preparing for our exams, her explanations were comprehensive, very simple and easy to understand, I couldn't have did it without her help.

headline: Very friendly, yet totally professional.
reviewBody: The advisor I spoke to at ICS was extremely friendly and helpful, but at the same time very professional. She explained all I needed to know, and answered in simple language the couple of questions I had. She made me feel like a person, not a number. My initial experience with ICS has been very positive. Both this advisor and another one I contacted via email were swift at getting back to me and explained everything clearly. I can't recommend them enough.

headline: Thoroughly commenable experience
reviewBody:
Hi,

My name is Faiza Jabeen and  I am a student of ICS for the year 2014-2015.

Since I have my plan to go for PGCE and then for QTS as for my career so  I had to take my GCSE maths as a compusion. I had some fears which were completely shun by my great learning experience at ICS. It really worked very well for me as I am a mum of one year old. I received every possible help from my Maths teacher named Mrs. Lieberman through two different channels of Student forum and most amazingly through Webinars.
I really enjoyed every moment of my course since it kindled a fire of  acquisition in my heart and mind. I have been taking my tests regularly and my test results have been marked with an A grade most of the time.
I am really grateful to ICS for providing me with the opportunity of review.

good luck and kind regards.


Thank you.

headline: Would recommend it to anybody
reviewBody: So easy to study and learn with ics , the maths video's are well structured to make learning easy and there explained so it's easy to understand

headline: Fantastic Company with plenty of learning opportunities
reviewBody:
Without a shadow of doubt I have no problems recommending this company ICS as one of the best in distance learning.  Their online student area is amazing and have very prompt and helpful staff.  I will use their services again and again.  The wide range of courses makes it perfect to either boost your qualifications or just retrain into a different direction.

In the event (if any) of any issue with the course or notes it was very easy to just inform them and their highly qualified course tutors were straight on the case to correct the situation.

headline: Great service, friendly advisor
reviewBody:
I was very pleased with the service delivered by ICS.
The course advisor (Maggie) was very friendly, and provided me with all the information I needed. She took the time to answer all of my questions.
She was available until pretty late which happens to be convenient as I work during the day.

headline: Very helpful and answered all my queries first time
reviewBody: I would highly recommend Ics to anyone, I was a little sceptical at first about one starting again and secondly doing it over the internet Maggie Was extremely helpful and answered all of my queries. I have been reassured that there is support all of the way through this course and also with the deposit and monthly payments so affordable it was hard to turn this down!

headline: Great For Learning!!
reviewBody: The course materials for the dog grooming and dog obedience are great and easy to navigate through. Providing with them a quality set of grooming equipment was a fantastic addition. No hesitation in recommending ICS Training to anyone!!

headline: Enjoying this course....
reviewBody: course came with some quality floristry tools, excited about sending in my assignment

headline: Not everyone's cup of tea...
reviewBody:
Inspite of what im about to write, I'd like to point out that, firstly, i passed my exams and secondly, i got a refund.
I purchased the IGCSE science course, which i later realised was just a textbook of information, something i could have bought elsewhere for a fraction of the price.
In my opinion, the course title is inaccurate, i am aware that the webpages now state that the course 'prepares you to take your IGCSE' but this in now way informs the purchaser of what else they have to do if they want to actually take and pass the exam.
The material sent was written against an out of date speculation, and it was only by cross referencing this against the new spec that i was able to see when the gaps were. I discovered this about a third of the way though my study and when i raised it with ICS was told "it shouldn't really make a difference", not the professional, reassuring answer you want to hear, especially when you've just forked out another £230 to register for the exams (and which was on top of the ICS course fees).
There were a lot of errors in this material, which makes it really difficult to learn when you dont have anyone immediately available to talk to amd check it out - i was often left wondering if it was me who had misunderstood the material of if there was, in fact, an error! This is the last thing a distance learning student needs as it makes you feel you cannot trust the material and it gives you a complex (which is no good for your confidence).
The online support was a joke! Tutor support was hit and miss, to say the least (they would take days to respond, although when they did they were helpful). It was only through my own understanding of adult learning theories that i was able to make sense of how i could tackle and get though this course in order to get my qualification. To cover the gaps, i had to pay for a private tutor and additional resources and as a result, I was the person fellow learners would go to on the community forums to answer their questions. 
I really believe i could have passed my exams without any ICS material or support and could have done it using a current spec (free to download) some topic books ( £10 or less from ebay) and a few down loaded free past exam papers. All ICS provided was a framework, and anyone with the right attuitude and motivation could do that for themselves.
The other thing was timing. The 'blurb' on the website makes you think you have 12 months from when purchase the course. Not true! You need to check when the exams are, these are external to the ICS course and so may not reflect the amount of time you have to complete the material. I had 7 months, which of course i didnt realise at the time! I also had to commit and pay £230 for the exams 4 months into the course, otherwise id have to wait another 12 months, by which time my so-called online support would have finished and i'd probably have lost all my desire to complete it! 
In total, all these additional fees tripppled the cost of my qualification!
The one thing i can credit ICS with is the fact that, due to investing so much financially, i had no choice but to knuckle down and study and tbh i went into those exams not feeling confident at all. So you could imagine my joy on discovering I'd passed!
There were so many times i wanted to give up, but i simply couldn't afford to! Once you buy, you're trapped; first the course fees, then the huge exam costs, then all the additional costs to make sure you pass! It snowballs so quickly, and if you're not in a position to be able to spend all that extra money you'll just jack it in at the first hurdle!
My advice to anyone considering the alevel / gcse courses, is do your homework first! Understand EVERYTHING that is required before you part with your money, and be prepared to work your socks off! Once you've done that, you'll probably realise that you can do everything you need to get your qualifications without having to pay a cent to ICS! Ignore this advice at your peril, but be warned, it will be the easiest £300 odd quid you've thrown away....
Ps, after my experience i was able to compile a well evidenced complaint and was awarded a full refund. 
I award 2 stars: 1 for my refund and the 2nd, because i did in fact get my qualification (with no thanks to ICS)

headline: No contact since starting!
reviewBody:
- Was promised contact by a tutor when I started, to help me look at the study plan and explain everything (still had nothing 2 months in)
- The website / study materials all have different codes: as someone that works in L&D , I ended up spending an afternoon sorting it all out so they all matched up and I knew I was comparing 'apples with apples'
- The assessment questions are poorly worded in some cases, and do not correlate to what is set out in the learning objectives (I am basing this on feedback from a tutor - which had no relevance to the question asked, so I am guessing the question is unclear)
- Feedback given by tutor reference external resources to reference out to (as examples). I'm afraid I can't afford the text book suggested. A little frustrating when you are told that the course materials you receive will be all you need
- No mechanism to provide feedback on the tutors / materials / assessments / etc. from looking around the site. The only option is to 'contact' (i.e. write an email) to an unknown tutor.

I feel I am lucky in that I do a job related to my course, but want the stamp of approval of as qualification. I am unsure if you are new to the field that the support from ICS will suffice.

headline: very bad experience, great waste of money
reviewBody:
Student Registration Number: 20951724
I started Hospitality course, paid a lot for this  and what I've got so far? On my requests to support me with some information my tutor Andrew Cook suggested to communicate to student service. From student advisor I was reffered to product team. Product team keeps silence for two weeks already. People above were right - one more idiot paid money - thank you very much, next , please.

headline: Awful, no support if you complete the course quickly - dont tell you directly what to learn, just tell you to learn everything rather than what is actually essential.
reviewBody:
I have been out of education for five years and I was told if I did some GCSEs with ICS Learning that I would have great support. At first I was quite impressed when I got through massive folders full of work and I got stuck in. I finished entering all of my English work and suddenly my account with English was stopped and I was told I had completed my course, and I didnt need anymore help when obviously I did. The marking they did on my paper was literally two lines of 'more quotes' or 'remember dates' and nothing specific.
I am also doing history and in the exam criteria you only need to learn four modules, when they tried to tell me that I needed to know all nine off by heart.
I paid for this service but my parents have ended up paying for two tutors twice a week for £52.50 an hour.
I found this website appalling, unhelpful and a waste of money. I would never recommend this site to anyone.

headline: Really bad company , don't  learn with them
reviewBody: All they care about is money and they don't actually care about your studies , will not be referring to anyone I know and will not be going back to them !!!!!!

headline: Great experience
reviewBody:
Although I needed no help from a tutor during the course, as I have been repairing motorcycles for a few years. It was quite satisfying and enjoyable course to do especially as I wouldn't have had the time to go to college due to my work commitments. On the motorcycle maintenance course, if you are a novice motorcycle mechanic, I would recommend doing the practical exercises as stated in the course.
However there was quite a lot of spelling mistakes and some of the questions on the test papers didn't correspond to the test papers online.
All in all I have passed and quite happy to get another lifetime achievement under my belt.

headline: appalling, con artist company.
reviewBody: They take your money then leave you. When you complain they take no notice. I phoned within the cancellation period to say that there were no online resources, I was told they will be up and running, I gave them the benefit of the doubt, yet, Nothing. It was a ploy to get you signed up and pay,  then desert you. The tutor didn't introduce her/himself and the managers do not care. They have your money so they don't want to know about any complaints. I have been emailing and phoned them for months. They get rude. Horrid Horrid experience. I have learnt no more by using ICS, I have the A level Psychology books which I learn from, the material is no extra, nor is the support. Do not use. Waste of money. Appalling.

headline: Bunch of patronising amateurs playing at being a learning provider. Abolute RIP OFF.
reviewBody:
From my booking the course, to the receiving of it, to the content of it, to the price of it, to the lack of communication, support, help or tutoring (NONE).
It was the biggest pile of crap and waste of money.
I would never go near this company again while they have the patronising, useless, condescending staff working  there.
And the ridiculous prices for what you actually get.
But who cares eh?
They obviously have enough gullible idiots trying to better themselves like me that will fall into the trap of ICS and learn only after, once it has all been paid for and there is nothing you can do about it.
I read terrible reviews and went ahead still, I wish I had listened.
I can't even stand seeing their name on my folder, I have bought a new one to replace it to now keep my course in.
I rushed through my course and did not enjoy it because I just wanted rid of them.
I got 85 per cent final mark with no tutor whatsoever.
I should have just bought some books on the subject and taught myself.
I would be 500 pound better off.
Make your own minds up but I told you so.
And ICS, don't post me one of your patronising replies. I don't want one and I don't want to hear from you again.
My mind is made up.

headline: Poor administrative service - disappointed
reviewBody: I have been trying to sort out what should be a simple enrolment form with ICS Learn  for the past three weeks.  My monthly repayments have been confirmed by letter as £146.99, and I have repeatedly received an enrolment form stating that my monthly repayments are £162.22.  I sent the enrolment form back to be correctly/re-issued, only to receive another incorrect version.  I am also unable to submit any assignments for marking until I have signed my enrolment form!!   Such frustration!  For the amount of money I am paying them, I am disappointed at the sloppy administration.  If it is rectified, I will be happy again so fingers crossed!

headline: Poor layout - repetative assigments.
reviewBody: I feel that my skills just did not increase from the first to the last assignment. My tutor was excellent, but was unable to help me too much due to the restrictions set by ICS. I would not use ICS to learn again.

headline: Pricy and not enough support
reviewBody:
In the beginning, I was willing to pay for the price because of the convenience and flexibility but later I realized that it is pricy for the service and support I got. My main tutor is good but the second tutor assigned to me is very slow in checking my assessment. I missed one resubmission because of how slow the process is. They are extremely slow in sending back the results, I always have to chase for it.

On the other hand, I learned something (although I could probably have learned it through self-study). My tutor - Ms. Kate Wake would give me some important notes and constructive opinions. 

Unfortunately, I would say that overall I am not pleased with I got and will not be pursuing my studies through ICS. Hope the service will be improved probably by giving ALL the students some introductory call/session and there's should be more open communication between tutor and student.

headline: Very expensive for a short course, I didn't need any support but at the end of the final assessment my score was only a pass, when all other assignments had been higher grades, very disappointed
reviewBody: I would stress that this isn't a cheap investment and you really are left to get on with the studies and are set assignments. I wouldn't recommend it again.

headline: Excellent way to study at home
reviewBody:
I studied the Hospitality Management course (BTEC). I found the study material to be a bit out of date - it had clearly been written about 10 years ago. However, don't let that put you off this particular course because I noticed the syllabus has changed since I bought mine in January 2012, so I assume the course material will have also been updated. 
The tutors were good, my essays were always marked and returned to me within a few days. I was quite pressed for time towards the end of my course and my tutor was particularly helpful, marking my last two papers and one resubmission particularly quickly so that I finished the course by the deadline.
I found the prices to be the most competitive on the internet, and it was very helpful to be able to pay over 10 months.
All in all, I would thoroughly recommend ICS and would use them again for any home studying.

headline: Fantastic
reviewBody:
As a whole my experience has been great. Not only are they patient with regards to submission meaning that it doesn't matter how often you send an assisgment they are also very prompt in returning papers. 
Having studied a few courses with ICS i feel that the experience is getting better with each course and i do hope to study again with ICS as i feel that a home study course is better than college because you can work to your own pace
I would (and do) recommend ICS to anyone that says to me that they want to study but doesn't have time to go to college

headline: Easy to understand course notes, but poor assessment examples
reviewBody: I found that the course notes given at the start of the course were easy to read and comprehend. The majority of the references provided were useful. However the assessment examples given at the end of each section were not as detailed as those actually used by CIM. I would suggest attempting previous examination questions provided through CIM.

headline: Something so simple can change your life!
reviewBody:
I found getting course information easy and it didn't take me long to find the course I wanted. I telephoned the office and everything was processed very quickly. Even though I am overseas my materials arrived shortly after I signed up, although this wasn't included in the cost of the course.
I submitted my first assignment, it was nerve racking and waited. Nothing for 3 weeks. I hadn't heard back from my tutor queries either. On contacting the office by email I had my problem sorted in about 3 days and my support period extended because of the delay. However,  I wanted to submit a submission today and the system is down for maintenance. I hope this doesn't take too long as I rely on the email system to submit pieces of my work. I am really enjoying the course but the technical problems have taken the shine off it a little.

headline: access to tutors!
reviewBody:
Your services are very good but you lack one basic imporetant services. I find it very disappointing not talking to my tutor since I started my course in january. I have alwyas request for my tutor but never had a meeting wiht her.Altohugh she have marked my test papers but I would  like to have a private meeting with her once.
Regardless of not meeting with my tutor all your services are excellent.

thank you 
kalipha

headline: Not bad, could be better at times
reviewBody: Whenever I've phoned up the staff have always been friendly and helpful, plus there's a live chat service too which is good. However, there have been times when I've sent an email request and got no reply and sometimes when testpapers are sent for marking, that take ages to come back. You can pay in instalments, which is handy, plus the courses are varied. If you pay in instalments, its interest free and you can pay over 10 months.

headline: Unacceptable.
reviewBody: I have been a student with ICS since last year I have been trying to work towards a Diploma in Dog Obedience. And I'm very unhappy with the way ICS has handled my complaints and advice. I used the 'Ask Tutor' section on the website awaiting a reply that would atleast be a day or two, I waited 5 days and rang up you company and they replied with the tutor has atleast "7 days to reply" which I thought was a ridiculous time scale as your awaiting an answer and it could took an unbelivable time to get an answer to you. But I waited another two days and said "I'm not getting a reply so I'm with holding my direct debits" as I thought this was unacceptable of the company. I eventually got a reply after 15 days which left me very unhappy and not want to continue with my course if I was been seen to this slowly. Overal, I don't think I received the help that I needed during this course and I'm very unhappy with the way your company has dealt with everything I will not be taking up another course with ICS again and not referring the company to any family or friends. I hope you take this into consideration thank you.

headline: Web design fail
reviewBody: Web design course that I did nearly broke my £600 laptop from all the software that it told me to download. I now have 437 virises. Don't use ics for a web design course. It's also out of date the software it tells you to download they don't have because newer versions are out.

headline: such a long wait
reviewBody: have to wait weeks for replys,tutoring is awful

headline: Very good course and customer cervice & online services/resources were spot on!
reviewBody: I found this course to be very useful and the material was easy to understand. Over all I fully enjoyed the course. The ICS  tutors were rapid at marking/responding to coursework. The only thing I have had a problem with is recieving my certificate. I requested it back in December 2012 and ICS have responded to let me know there would be/is a delay but I wouldn't expect it to take 3 months or more! Other than that minor glitch, everthing else to do with ICS and thier online services were excellent.

headline: Enjoyable
reviewBody: Loving doing my course and some1 is always on hand to help
